string.name: STR_DIC_TEST02
string.body: Aikern Valt;He was born into a region at war and married a wicked woman who beats him daily. His only saving grace is his charming looks.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA01
string.body: Elpas;A Mercenary Sentinel guarding the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA01] in Poeta. Being innocent and honest, he always takes good care of others.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA02
string.body: Asteros;A priest of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA02] in Poeta. He is well-respected by the village residents.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA03
string.body: Polinia;A priest helping [%dic:STR_DIC_LA02] at [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA02] in Poeta. She records the missions the mercenary troops have carried out, and settles accounts with them.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA04
string.body: Mune;A seamstress working in the armor shop at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA02] in Poeta. She has a generous personality and is good at Tailoring.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA05
string.body: Uno;A skilled cook in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA02] in Poeta. His only concern is that his wife, [%dic:STR_DIC_LA07], does not pay much attention to the family.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA06
string.body: Ager;The owner of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA209] in Poeta. He stays in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA02] now, after being driven out of his farm by Kerubs.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA07
string.body: Feira;An angler fishing at [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA03] in Poeta. She is the wife of [%dic:STR_DIC_LA05] and is engrossed in fishing.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA08
string.body: Pranoa;A farmer living near [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA03] in Poeta. The Kerubs are hindering his ability to work his farm.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA09
string.body: Geolus;An Ecologist at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA15] in Verteron. He is researching the contamination of the forest, along with his assistant [%dic:STR_DIC_LA160].

string.name: STR_DIC_LA10
string.body: Namus;A lumberjack making a living from cutting trees at [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA04] in Poeta. He's also skilled at making potions.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA11
string.body: Melponeh;A scholar at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA05] in Poeta. She has studied the history of the Krall and Kobolds. She's got a mercenary attitude toward her work.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA12
string.body: Pernos;A mysterious old hermit dwelling near the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA06] in Poeta.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA13
string.body: Parine;A resident of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09]. She worries constantly about everything.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA14
string.body: Alteno;He is studying Soul Healing at [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09], but his progress is very slow. It's putting a strain on his marriage to [%dic:STR_DIC_LA16].

string.name: STR_DIC_LA15
string.body: Drasia;A Food Merchant of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09]. She firmly believes that she is good at cooking, but others would tell you otherwise.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA16
string.body: Enia;The wife of [%dic:STR_DIC_LA14] and a resident of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09]. Her husband is studying to be a Soul Healer, which takes all of his time. She worries that their marriage is suffering because of it.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA17
string.body: William;A Guardian Centurion of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09]. He stands guard outside the Brigade General's headquarters building, along with his tamed Griffon.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA18
string.body: Hyacinte;A Guardian of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09]. He is in charge of the financial affairs of the Guardians stationed in the Fortress, and is always concerned over shortages of supplies.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA19
string.body: Spatalos;The Brigade General of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09]. He lost his wife and son in the Krall War, and has become correspondingly ruthless in his pursuit of victory.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA20
string.body: Manos;An old man living in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09]. He is the father of [%dic:STR_DIC_LA23] and the brother of Belbua.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA21
string.body: Poa;A Mercenary Scout standing between the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA06] and [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA08] in Poeta. He believes in his work and is quite cautious.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA22
string.body: Selene;A priest of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09]. She looks kind, but at the same time she is rather arrogant. She advises newcomers at the Verteron Citadel.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA23
string.body: Qydro;The son of [%dic:STR_DIC_LA20] and a resident of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA10] in Verteron. He might drink a bit too much, but he respects the elderly and writes to his father frequently.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA24
string.body: Abolos;Watch Leader at [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA10] in Verteron. He became the Leader because there was nobody else suitable, but he is a thoughtful leader in his own way. He has a tamed Griffon at his side at all times.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA25
string.body: Naia;A resident of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA10] in Verteron. She is rather dissatisfied with her husband [%dic:STR_DIC_LA28] as he seems to do nothing but waste time.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA26
string.body: Santenius;A priest of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA10] in Verteron. He is quite pious.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA27
string.body: Estino;A Guardian protecting the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA11] in Verteron.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA28
string.body: Lostes;A member of the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA10] Watch in Verteron, and [%dic:STR_DIC_LA25]'s husband. He talks a good game but is often not up to the things he brags about. He hangs around in the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA15].

string.name: STR_DIC_LA29
string.body: Lepios;An Ecology Researcher who studies the contamination of the Tolbas Forest in Verteron. Since being wounded while collecting data, he has been staying in the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA16].

string.name: STR_DIC_LA30
string.body: Roseino;A Guardian protecting the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA17] in Verteron. She is a capable and dedicated soldier who fervently studies the cause of the contamination. Despite her average looks, she is popular among the men in the neighboring village.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA31
string.body: Dronoa;A pilgrim at [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA18] in Verteron. He ran into a bit of trouble during the Great Pilgrimage with his wife [%dic:STR_DIC_LA71].

string.name: STR_DIC_LA32
string.body: Cerios;A Guardian protecting the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA20_1] in Verteron. He is obedient and responsible.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA33
string.body: Morai;A Guardian protecting the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA20_1] in Verteron. She uses ambiguous expressions and seems to hide something.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA34
string.body: Zephyros;A Guardian protecting the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA21_1] at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA21] in Verteron. He really hates Potcrabs.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA35
string.body: Notos;A Guardian protecting the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA21_1] at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA21] in Verteron. He is suspicious as well as curious. He seems to have some sort of relationship with Morai.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA36
string.body: Kales;A farmer raising crops in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA01] in Poeta. He is a simple man and [%dic:STR_DIC_LA03]'s cousin.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA37
string.body: Ino;A Mercenary Scout who used to guard the Timolia Mine with [%dic:STR_DIC_LA21] in Poeta. He was captured by the Krall and imprisoned within the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA08].

string.name: STR_DIC_LA38
string.body: Khidia;A Protector of the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA21_1] in the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA21]. She has the ability to hear the energy of Aether. She was a member of Temple under the command of Lord [%dic:STR_DIC_LA57].

string.name: STR_DIC_LA39
string.body: Meteina;A Guardian protecting the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA11] in Verteron. She speaks Krallic very well and is good at interrogating captured Krall.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA40
string.body: Bellia;A Protector of Illusion found in [%dic:STR_DIC_ELA24] of [%dic:STR_DIC_ELA07]. She teaches skills to Sorcerers and Spiritmasters.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA41
string.body: Lonian;A Merchant selling general goods at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA05] in Poeta. He has a cynical personality, and is good at managing financial affairs. He and Namus don't seem to get along.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA42
string.body: Mirdiena;A Flight Transporter in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09]. As a Human she used to roam all over Atreia, but now she spends her days helping others travel.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA43
string.body: Nola;A scarecrow at [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA24] of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA14] in Verteron. Surprisingly, it can speak.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA44
string.body: Gaione;A Tog wandering about [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09]. It's known to have once been a Guardian.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA45
string.body: Gaphyrk;A Shugo captured by the Krall and imprisoned in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA12] in Verteron. He seems to have fallen for a Kobold named Mimiti.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA46
string.body: Dimos;A librarian who manages the Library of the Sages in [%dic:STR_DIC_ELA07]. He thinks he is suffering from chronic asthma due to the dust on the books in the library.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA47
string.body: Jumentis;The preceptor of Rangers and Assassins found in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA29] of the Sanctum. When it comes to the study of poisons, no one else can compare.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA48
string.body: Quintus;A Guardian in the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA37] of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. Since ascending as a Daeva, he has done many good works for the benefit of Humans.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA49
string.body: Hygea;A Guardian of Life found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_ELA24] of [%dic:STR_DIC_ELA07]. She teaches skills to Clerics and Chanters.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA50
string.body: Maniparas;A merchant of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA10] in Verteron. He was raised as an only child, and as a result is somewhat spoiled and selfish.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA51
string.body: Daminu;Chieftain of the Elim Tribe at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA04] in Poeta. He is the ruler of the forest. He is found in the center of the forest.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA52
string.body: Poppy;A Porgus cherished by [%dic:STR_DIC_LA159], a shepherd at Tolbas Village in Verteron. It has disappeared without a trace.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA53
string.body: Tutty;A pet Porgus raised by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Pernos] in Poeta. It has disappeared without a trace.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA54
string.body: Kato;A Guardian who made the deadly poison, [%dic:STR_DIC_QILA34]. Nobody knows his whereabouts since he's left [%dic:STR_DIC_ELA07].

string.name: STR_DIC_LA56
string.body: Ariel;Leader of the Five Seraphim Lords who rule Elysea. The Empyrean Lord of Light.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA57
string.body: Nezekan;The Empyrean Lord of Justice, one of the Five Seraphim Lords who rule Elysea.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA58
string.body: Vaizel;The Empyrean Lord of Freedom, one of the Five Seraphim Lords who rule Elysea.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA59
string.body: Kaisinel;The Empyrean Lord of Illusion, one of the Five Seraphim Lords who rule Elysea. He is the patron deity of Sorcerers and Spiritmasters.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA60
string.body: Yustiel;The Empyrean Lord of Life, one of the Five Seraphim Lords who rule Elysea.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA61
string.body: Amus;The owner of an armor shop at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA02] in Poeta. He is fond of the color purple.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA62
string.body: Forest Protector Noah;An Elim standing at the entrance of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA04] in Poeta. He is sleeping.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA63
string.body: Elote;An Elim at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA20] in Verteron. He is guarding the neighboring forest.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA64
string.body: Ibion;A peddler doing business in the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA19_1] in Verteron. He is particularly fond of Kinah.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA65
string.body: Vascus;A Mysterious Stone gatherer at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA19_1] in Verteron. He used to believe that he would ascend once he accumulated enough experience through pilgrimage, but he has since settled into his role as a gatherer.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA66
string.body: Stony the Stone Fist;A Rock Spirit at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA19_1] in Verteron. It is a loyal servant of [%dic:STR_DIC_LA65].

string.name: STR_DIC_LA67
string.body: Lunax;A Guardian protecting [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA20] in Verteron. He worries for the safety of the pilgrims in the area.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA68
string.body: Melampus;A Mercenary fighter guarding the entrance to [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA02] in Poeta. He became a mercenary only for money, and doesn't have any sense of duty.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA69
string.body: Ampeis;A Kalion Mercenary Liaison guarding the entrance of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA04] in Poeta. He earns a decent income by selling mushrooms on the side.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA70
string.body: Minalinerk;A Shugo merchant of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA02] in Poeta. No one knows where he came from. He seems to sell items that were thrown away by others.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA71
string.body: Anasia;A pilgrim of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA18] in Verteron. She is on the Great Pilgrimage with her husband [%dic:STR_DIC_LA31].

string.name: STR_DIC_LA72
string.body: Gaurinerk;A Shugo trade broker in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09]. He dreamed of joining the Black Cloud Traders, but ended up moving to Verteron and establishing a thriving brokerage a business.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA73
string.body: Nadaelo;An Armor Merchant of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09]. A bit of a miser, he started his business by selling armor and later learned how to make armor himself.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA74
string.body: Anaka;A resident of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09]. She has a bright personality and cares about the other residents of the Citidel. She seems to have a crush on [%dic:STR_DIC_LA153].

string.name: STR_DIC_LA75
string.body: Ivis;The owner of the weapon shop in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09]. He takes pride in his work and doesn't seem concerned about turning a profit. He is quite generous and the weapons he sells are a good value.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA76
string.body: Eradis;A Food Merchant of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA10] in Verteron. He should be proud of his excellent cooking skill, but instead he's ashamed because his family expected him to ascend as a Daeva like his siblings.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA77
string.body: Alto;A shepherd herding Porguses at [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA10] in Verteron. Filled with intellectual curiosity, he reads books and meditates while the livestock grazes. His ambition is to study Aetheric Science when he grows up.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA78
string.body: Perinens;A Guardian of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09]. She is the mother of two kids, Serin and Polor, but prefers to let [%dic:STR_DIC_LA145] take care of them.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA79
string.body: Mairon;A resident of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09]. He is amiable and a little bit careless. He always worries about [%dic:STR_DIC_LA30] because she works in such a dangerous place.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA80
string.body: Lavirintos;The Commander of the Miragent Holy Templars found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA29] of [%dic:STR_DIC_ELA07]. As the first son of a family which has produced Daevas for generations, he has never doubted his life as a Guardian.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA81
string.body: Xenophon;A military researcher who studies at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA38] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. Known to be a brilliant strategist.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA82
string.body: Meliodas;A Guardian on duty at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA17] in Verteron. He is suspicious but kind at heart.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA83
string.body: Macus;A Protector of Justice found in [%dic:STR_DIC_ELA24] of [%dic:STR_DIC_ELA07]. He teaches skills to the Gladiators and Templars. He is favored by [%dic:STR_DIC_LA57]. No one knows his background.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA84
string.body: Eumelos;A Protector of Freedom found in [%dic:STR_DIC_ELA24] of [%dic:STR_DIC_ELA07]. He teaches skills to the Rangers and Assassins. He follows [%dic:STR_DIC_LA58] and dreams of meeting Vaizel in person.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA85
string.body: Marmeia;A young woman who has made it her life's work to understand the Krall. She is found at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA39] of [%dic:STR_DIC_ELA07]. She is often complimented on her cute freckles and youthful looks.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA86
string.body: Ulaguru;A Krall captured by [%dic:STR_DIC_LA85] for her research. He is at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA39] of [%dic:STR_DIC_ELA07].

string.name: STR_DIC_LA400
string.body: Asak;An Ulgorn Raider. He weeds out Spriggs with [%username].

string.name: STR_DIC_LA401
string.body: Guheitun;A task force leader of the Ulgorn Raiders. He is feared more than the Raider Boss due to his short temper.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA402
string.body: Galar;An Ulgorn Raider at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1_1] in Ishalgen. He watches over laborers at the entrance of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1_2].

string.name: STR_DIC_LA403
string.body: Joreston;A priest of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1_2] in Ishalgen. He is far more practical than spiritual.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA404
string.body: Linevir;She is a Soul Healer at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1_2].

string.name: STR_DIC_LA405
string.body: Sheofin;He's the flight transporter of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1_2].

string.name: STR_DIC_LA406
string.body: Hephe;A weapon merchant of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1_2]. Though a member of the Ulgorn Raiders, he also sells weapons.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA407
string.body: Tobu;The Second-in-Command of the Ulgorn Raiders, he can be found in the center of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1_2]. He is Ulgorn's right hand because he's very smart and good at figures.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA408
string.body: Dalor;An armor merchant of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1_2]. He is in charge of selling armor to the Ulgorn Raiders. Although he is skilled at making armor, and under orders to do so, he doesn't seem to enjoy it.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA409
string.body: Kaindal;A Raider who patrols inside the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1_2]. Although he is in the position of supervising the laborers, he's too timid to browbeat them.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA410
string.body: Glifko;A Raider who patrols inside the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1_2] in Ishalgen. He is very content with a quiet life.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA411
string.body: Ungfu;A Raider selling food at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1_2] in Ishalgen. He seems discontented.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA412
string.body: Negi;A Raider who enjoys fishing at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1_12]. She used to be a librarian before giving in to her more violent instincts and becoming a Raider.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA413
string.body: Motgar;A laborer working at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1_13] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1_4] of Ishalgen. He is very lazy, always trying to find an excuse to rest.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA414
string.body: Kard;A gatherer at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1_15], he is worried about being conscripted as a mercenary.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA415
string.body: Derot;A task force leader in charge of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1_16] at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1_5] in Ishalgen. He's good at making money.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA416
string.body: Mijou;A Raider at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1_16] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1_5] of Ishalgen. She's proud of her skills and doesn't care about money.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA417
string.body: Nalto;A Raider stranded near the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1_9]. He can't recall the last time he had a break from duty.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA418
string.body: Dabi;A Raider who is keeping an eye on Motgar at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1_13] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1_4] of Ishalgen.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA419
string.body: Delle;A Raider guarding the entrance to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1_20].

string.name: STR_DIC_LA420
string.body: Jephani;A Raider guarding the entrance to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1_7].

string.name: STR_DIC_LA421
string.body: Munin;A prescient Daeva, now imprisoned in a crystal at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1_19]. He was exiled after some sort of accusations in Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Lateni
string.body: Lateni;A combat administration officer in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_26].

string.name: STR_DIC_LA422
string.body: Thrud;A Protector of Divinity residing in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_1]. He has a strong sense of responsibility and is very persistent.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA423
string.body: Nemnef;She is a Soul Healer residing in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_1]. She dislikes it when people say that Soul Healers all look alike.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA424
string.body: Suthran;The Brigade General of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_1]. He's quite brusque when he thinks his time is being wasted.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA425
string.body: Valurion;An Archon Centurion of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_1]. She had a falling out with her brother [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Ballos] and they don't speak anymore.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA426
string.body: Meiyer;An Archon Centurion of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_1]. She handles operations issues for the Altgard region.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA427
string.body: Morn;An Archon Centurion of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_1]. He has been studying the Mau culture and language for at least a hundred years.

string.name: STR_DIC_LA428
string.body: Lenat;He is a flight transporter at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_1].

string.name: STR_DIC_LA429
string.body: Tulberg;He is an Archon Sentinel patrolling the inside of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_1].

string.name: STR_DIC_LA430
string.body: Heidunn;An Archon Sentinel guarding the west entrance of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_1].

string.body: Lakirnja;She is an Archon Sentinel dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_1].

string.body: Kelsvit;He is an Archon Sentinel dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_1].

string.body: Nirmirn;She is a Medicine Merchant at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_1].

string.body: Dortos;He's an Armor Merchant at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_1].

string.name: STR_DIC_LA435
string.body: Lunber;He is a Weapon Merchant in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_1].

string.name: STR_DIC_LA436
string.body: Donabe;She is a General Goods Merchant of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_1].

string.name: STR_DIC_LA437
