string.body: Fasimedes;Governor of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. He is in the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA29] of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Lavirintos
string.body: Lavirintos;The Commander of the Miragent Holy Templars found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA29] of [%dic:STR_DIC_ELA07]. As the first son of a family which has produced Daevas for generations, he has never doubted his life as a Guardian.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Jupion
string.body: Jupion;A Guardian of Light. She is in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA29] of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Likasas
string.body: Likesan;A Guardian of Light. He is in the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA29] of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Boreas
string.body: Boreas;Preceptor of Gladiators and Templars. He is in the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA29] of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Juventus
string.body: Jumentis;The preceptor of Rangers and Assassins found in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA29] of the Sanctum. When it comes to the study of poisons, no one else can compare.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Hecate
string.body: Charna;Preceptor of Sorcerers and Spiritmasters. She is in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA29] of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Thrasymedes
string.body: Thrasymedes;Preceptor of Clerics and Chanters. He is in the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA29] of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Iocaste
string.body: Iocaste;An armor merchant of the Abyss. She is in the west room of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA29] of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Clymene
string.body: Clymene;A merchant selling Stigma Stones. She is in the east room of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA29] of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Dairos
string.body: Dairos;An Abyss contribution recordkeeper in the west room of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA29] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. He is modest and reticent.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Orphe
string.body: Miriya;A stigma master who installs Stigma Stones. She is in the east room of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA29] of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. She is known to have a dual personality.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Elephenor
string.body: Elephenor;A job supplies merchant at the Lyceum of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. She works hard for the assigned job.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Pisinae
string.body: Pilianae;A Guardian protecting the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA30] of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. She is pious to Empyrean Lords.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Unirus
string.body: Unirus;A Guardian protecting the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA30] of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. He is pious to the Five Empyrean Lords. He has never participated in any battles, which is disgraceful for a Guardian. He doesn't show it but he certainly feels the pressure.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ikeas
string.body: Akeas;A Guardian protecting the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA30] of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. He is success-oriented.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ulbert
string.body: Ulbert;A Guardian protecting the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA30] of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. He has experienced many things in the Abyss.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Gwenspena
string.body: Gwenspena;A Legion item merchant at the Legions Board in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. She has a business-like manner.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Rhea
string.body: Leah;A Daeva who achieved enlightenment at an early age. You can find her near the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA30] of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Polyidus
string.body: Polyidus;A Teleporter in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. He is at the Sanctum Gate near the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA30]. He is meticulous.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Tunotos
string.body: Tunotos;A merchant selling weapons at [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA30] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. He is a flatterer by nature.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Evestina
string.body: Evestina;A merchant selling armor at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA30] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. Sanctum employed this Human merchant for her efficiency in handling jobs.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Karax
string.body: Kane;A Manastone Remover, he is at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA30] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Berus
string.body: Berus;A Godstone Socketer, he is at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA30] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27], now retired. He is modest and discreet.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Laokones
string.body: Laokones;He is at the shop near [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA31] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. He came to Sanctum because he was widely recognized for having outstanding skills in the modification of weapons.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Judisina
string.body: Judisina;She is in the store near [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA31] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. She is a customized consumables merchant. [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Dairos] found her flattering Daevas in her hometown and brought her to Sanctum.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Pulo
string.body: Pulo;A shield merchant at [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA31] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. He had been [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Servillia]'s servant in his hometown, but came to meet her on equal footing in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27] after having gone through various incidents.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Brantes
string.body: Brantes;An accessory merchant at [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA31] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. She used to be a jeweler but now crafts weapon accessories.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Himusus
string.body: Himusus;A general goods merchant at [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA31] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. He inherited the business from his uncle, who founded it when [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27] was built.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Servillia
string.body: Servillia;A medicine merchant at [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA31] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. She is arrogant to Humans but kind to Daevas. The daughter of Daeva parents, she was treated like a princess as a child but failed to ascend.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Compai
string.body: Compai;An Information Officer at the center of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA31] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. His voice is loud and resonant.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Phorkius
string.body: Payurkus;A Salvationist in front of the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA33] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. He solicits funds for the Daeva-Human Equality Movement, but hasn't raised much so far.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Mikero
string.body: Valendir;A bard found between the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA30] and [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA31] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. If you ask him nicely, he will recite a poem.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Erdos
string.body: Erdos;A cloaking skill practicioner at [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA31] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. He is confident that he can master the skill if he keeps trying. He invites people he encounters while traveling to come back to Sanctum.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ericina
string.body: Ericina;A lawyer at [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA31] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. She encountered [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Erdos] and came to Sanctum as a result. She is talkative and guileful.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Pusfene
string.body: Pusfene;A clown at [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA31] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. While traveling around Poeta performing, she became acquainted with [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Erdos] and came to Sanctum.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Kumnen
string.body: Kumnen;A clown at [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA31] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. He is humorous. He accompanied [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Pusfene] to Sanctum.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Leinon
string.body: Leinon;A clown at [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA31] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. He is humorous. He accompanied [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Pusfene] to Sanctum.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Netes
string.body: Mich;A child. He runs around [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27] with his friends [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Neru] and [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Enria]. Born in Sanctum, he grew up admiring Daevas. He is playful and sometimes impolite.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Neru
string.body: Kris;A child. He runs around [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27] with his friends [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Netes] and [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Enria]. He is a native of Sanctum. He is usually well-behaved.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Enria
string.body: Jordan;A child. She runs around [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27] with her friends [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Netes] and [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Neru]. She is the daughter of a priest.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ebona
string.body: Alynsia;A Daeva of Abundance. She is at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA32] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. She is warm and kind to everybody.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Bustant
string.body: Bustant;A warehouse manager at [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA32] in Sanctum. He takes his job very seriously.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Lukania
string.body: Lukania;A warehouse manager at [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA32] in Sanctum. She is an honest person.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_c1
string.body: Taraerinerk;A Shugo trade broker at [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA32] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. He says he's giving you a big discount, but seems to charge quite a bit.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_c2
string.body: Angparinerk;A Shugo sales agent. He is at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA32] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_c3
string.body: Heerunerk;A cube factory craftsman at [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA32] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. He competes with Yiehmonerk in his business.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_c4
string.body: Yiehmonerk;A cube factory craftsman at [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA32] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. He competes with Heerunerk in his business.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Pauton
string.body: Pauton;A Legion Warehouse Manager in the deepest room of the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA32] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. He is in charge of the warehouse because he was recommended as the most reliable Human by Legion masters.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Jucleas
string.body: Jucleas;A Protector of Divinity in the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA33]. The Empyrean Lords wanted to place a reliable person at the Lyceum. They appointed quiet and reticent Jucleas as the Protector of Divinity.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Sibylla
string.body: Sibylla;A priest in the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA33]. Possessed by an ancient soul, she came to have an ability to pour out predictions and forget immediately.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Aithra
string.body: Aithra;A priest in the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA33]. She is said to be too zealous.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Telemos
string.body: Telemos;A Soul Healer standing at the entrance of the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA33]. He works hard.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Perikles
string.body: Perikles;A Daeva of Insight in the Lyceum of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. He is wise and thoughtful.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Macus
string.body: Macus;The Preceptor of Gladiators and Templars in the Lyceum of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. A favorite of [%dic:STR_DIC_LA57] whose background is still kept in the dark.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Eumelos
string.body: Eumelos;A Protector of Freedom found in [%dic:STR_DIC_ELA24] of [%dic:STR_DIC_ELA07]. He teaches skills to Rangers and Assassins. He follows [%dic:STR_DIC_LA58] and dreams of meeting him in person.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Bellia
string.body: Bellia;A Protector of Illusion in the Lyceum of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. She teaches skills to Sorcerers and Spiritmasters.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Karon
string.body: Karon;A job supplies merchant at [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA29] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Hygea
string.body: Hygea;A Guardian of Life found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_ELA24] of [%dic:STR_DIC_ELA07]. She teaches skills to Clerics and Chanters.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Tercus
string.body: Tercus;A gladiator guarding the entrance to [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA34] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Leonidas
string.body: Leonida;A gladiator guarding the entrance to [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA34] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. She is cool-headed and fights to the finish.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Nepis
string.body: Nepis;An Arena master inside [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA34] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. He enjoys the battles.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Epeios
string.body: Epeios;An Arena master at the entrance of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA34] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. He believes experience is important in battle.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Kreon
string.body: Kreon;A bard at the Fountain of Light in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. He takes his craft seriously and looks down on [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Mikero] as a frivolous poet.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Bellasia
string.body: Bellasia;A Daeva of Water in the Sky Garden of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. Before ascending as a Daeva, she devoted herself to revering Water Spirits.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Akeri
string.body: Akeri;A transformation skill trainee standing at the entrance of the Fountain of Light in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. She wants to become a master of the transformation skill.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Acimemnon
string.body: Agamemnon;A Guardian Temple Templar patrolling from [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA31] to [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA35] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. He regards it as an honor.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Avrus
string.body: Avrus;A Guardian Temple Templar patrolling the area between the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA29] and [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA35] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. There is a rumor that he used to be a thief who ascended as a Daeva after repenting his deeds.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Fermina
string.body: Fermina;A Daeva of Song in the Sky Canal of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. She lives for the joy of singing to Daevas she never met before.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Himeros
string.body: Himeros;She ascended as a Daeva while on the run after causing a scandal with the son of a respected Daeva in her hometown. Now she passes the time paintign with Aether.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Tersites
string.body: Thersites;A Daeva of Betrayal. He strolls on the Sky Bridge located between the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA37] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA_garden] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. He seems very sad.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Myrtil
string.body: Myrtil;A Daeva of Art. She is with her assistant Faye near the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA35] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. She often worries about the lack of art appreciation among Daevas.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Phhe
string.body: Faye;Myrtil's assistant, studying art in the Sky Canal of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. She almost worships Myrtil.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Rumias
string.body: Lumias;A Daeva residing in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. Recently he lost his wife, and one of his two sons ascended as a Daeva. He worries about his youngest son, the only family member who still remains a Human.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Nigtato
string.body: Nitato;A Guardian living in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27] and guarding the eastern entrance to the Artisans Hall. He looks kind but often seems to be hypocritical.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Zumia
string.body: Zumia;A Guardian living in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27] and guarding the eastern entrance to the Artisans Hall. She used to be a farmer in the Akarios Village, and is the cousin of [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Polinia].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Noris
string.body: Noris;A Guardian living in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27] and guarding the western entrance to the Artisans Hall. He wants to travel every corner of Atreia.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Numakas
string.body: Numakas;A Guardian living in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27] and guarding the western entrance to the Artisans Hall. He is so timid and shy that he stammers when he speaks to a stranger.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_zakeron
string.body: Zakeron;A Guardian living in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27] and guarding the southern entrance to the Artisans Hall. He has been studying cooking with Hestia and longs to be a famous chef someday.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Manuka
string.body: Manuka;A Guardian living in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27] and guarding the southern entrance to the Artisans Hall. A family-oriented person, he misses his wife and children who live far away.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Demeter
string.body: Demeter;An Essencetapping Master at the Elyos Square in Sanctum. Passionate about gathering rare herbs, Demeter is one of the most knowledgeable herbalists in Sanctum.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Sabotes
string.body: Sabotes;Demeter's assistant. The two have been friends since they were humans, and once Demeter ascended to become a Daeva, Sabotes followed.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Bacchus
string.body: Jhaelas;An Aethertapping master residing in the Artisans Hall in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. Nobody knows more about Aethertapping than him.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Maire
string.body: Maire;A sincere young man helping Jhaelas. He resides in the Artisans Hall in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Hestia
string.body: Hestia;A Cooking Master residing inside the Artisans Hall of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. Her fare is never omitted from the offerings that Sanctum provides to the Seraphim Lords.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Luelas
string.body: Luelas;A Cooking Merchant residing inside the Artisans Hall of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. He is very meticulous.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Diana
string.body: Diana;An Alchemy Master residing inside the Artisans Hall of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. She regards alchemy as a solemn technology. Her brother is the Alchemy Merchant [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Darius].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Darius
string.body: Darius;An Alchemy Merchant residing inside the Artisans Hall of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. Brother of the Alchemy Master [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Diana], he realized her extraordinary abilities early on and has assisted her ever since.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Anteros
string.body: Anteros;A Weaponsmithing Master residing in the Artisans Hall in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. He complains that today's Daevas have no persistence and give up Weaponsmithing too easily.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Nakia
string.body: Nakia;A Weaponsmithing Merchant in charge of selling materials in the Artisans Hall in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. She works very hard, waiting for the day she can craft weapons herself.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Vulcanus
string.body: Vulcanus;The Master Armorsmith in charge of crafting armor for Daevas. He resides inside the Artisans Hall in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. He believs that good armor comes from the harmony of function, comfort, and beauty.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Menomes
string.body: Menomes;The Armorsmithing Merchant in charge of selling materials inside the Artisans Hall in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Utisda
string.body: Utsida;Handicrafting Master in charge of crafting accessories for Daevas inside the Artisans Hall in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. He thinks that artistic sense is the most important thing in Handicrafting.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_c5
string.body: Chiwurinerk;A Handicrafting merchant residing in the Artisans Hall in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. He is a typical Shugo who finds pleasure in earning Kinah.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_c6
string.body: Furinerk;A Shugo worker helping Utsida inside the Artisans Hall of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. He seems nice enough but he occasionally glares at Daevas.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Daphnis
string.body: Daphnis;A Tailoring master at the Artisans Hall in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. She believes very strongly in the value of Tailoring to the war effort.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Proserpina
string.body: Proserpina;A Tailoring merchant helping [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Daphnis]'s business inside the Artisans Hall of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Demodocos
string.body: Demodocos;A Daeva of Fortunetelling in the Artisans Hall of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. Some of his dire predictions have been accurate.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Himeira
string.body: Himeira;A Daeva who dresses humbly and stands in the Artisans Hall of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. Her assignment is to guard the shaft that leads to [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA29].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Alcmene
string.body: Aurnia;A Daeva of Melancholy in the Artisans Hall of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. She is always gloomy and complains about everything.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Losadis
string.body: Losadis;A Legion founding manager of the Legion Administration Office at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LC1]. She knows almost all Legions.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Inofe
string.body: Inofe;A Legion emblem manager of the Legions Board at [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA37] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. She is pleased to help you.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ophenes
string.body: Ophenes;A Daeva of Divine Accessories at the Caps and Straps at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA37] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. She is the first Daeva in her family.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Perena
string.body: Perena;A Daeva of Divine Accessories at the Caps and Straps at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA37] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. She has an exceptional sense of beauty.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Benes
string.body: Benes;A Divine Clothing Merchant at the Angelic Frippery at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA37] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. She can imbue her clothing with the power of Aether.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Arcinia
string.body: Arcinia;A Fine Clothing merchant at Angelic Frippery at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA37] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. She has been selling Luxury Clothing made by Benes since she came to Sanctum.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Junes
string.body: Jooma;She sells the highest quality dyes and can be found at the Angelic Frippery at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA37] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. She thinks every color has its own mystic power.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Esca
string.body: Esca;A Daeva of Divine Weapons at the Fine Weapon shop at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA37] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. She and her brother [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Euchenor] supplied weapons to Deltras and the Storm Legion.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Euchenor
string.body: Euchenor;A Daeva of Divine Weapons at the Fine Weapon shop at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA37] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. He and his sister [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Esca] supplied weapons to Deltras and the Storm Legion.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Soana
string.body: Soana;A Daeva at the Protect Your Hide at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA37] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. The armor crafted by Soana is known to have dangerous side effects when worn by Humans.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Hesione
string.body: Hesione;A Daeva at the Protect Your Hide at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA37] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. She spends her evenings partying at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLAadd] and has several boyfriends.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Aegist
string.body: Aegist;A Daeva of Divine Shields residing at the Protect Your Hide at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA37] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. He is obsessed with creating the very finest shields in all of Atreia.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Heve
string.body: Islene;She oversees the banquet hall at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA37] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. As a Daeva of Banquets, her ultimate goal is to cook for the Seraphim Lords.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Aktus
string.body: Aktus;A worker of the banquet hall at [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA37] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. You can buy delicious food from him.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Rayra
string.body: Layla;A Daeva at the banquet hall at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA37] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. She is dedicated to honoring brave Daevas through serving them good food.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Quintus
string.body: Quintus;A Guardian in the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA37] of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. Since ascending as a Daeva, he has done many good works for the benefit of Humans.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Alkestis
string.body: Alkestis;A Daeva who enjoys tending the flowers on the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA37] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. She claims it is a good way to restore your spirits.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Nephalion
string.body: Nephalion;A Guardian protecting [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. He patrols the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA37]. He's very concerned with finding spies.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Atia
string.body: Atia;A Guardian protecting [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. She fancies herself the most skilled guard patrolling the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA37].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ballos
string.body: Ballos;A Guardian protecting the eastern entrance of the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA37] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. He is the younger brother of [%dic:STR_DIC_LA425] in the Verteron Citadel, but they had a falling out and don't speak anymore.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Kareinus
string.body: Kareinus;A Guardian in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. He has a terrible allergy to the Starleaf Fen trees that grow right behind his post at the eastern entrance of the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA37].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Dione
string.body: Dione;A Guardian protecting the western entrance of the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA37] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. Though a capable fighter, she is incredibly clumsy in all other matters. She's banned from the Empyrean Festival for life for spilling the Holy Water several years ago.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Minyae
string.body: Minyae;A Guardian in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. She is very conservative in her ideas, and zealously prevents Humans from walking on the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA37].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Vatonia
string.body: Fuchsia;A Daeva in the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA38] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. She has read every book in the library and retains every word. She refuses to admit how many languages she is fluent in.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Biesa
string.body: Biesa;A librarian in the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA38] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. He is very excited by the wide variety of books available.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Dimos
string.body: Dimos;A librarian who manages the Library of the Sages in [%dic:STR_DIC_ELA07]. He thinks he is suffering from chronic asthma due to the dust on the books in the library.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Xenophon
string.body: Xenophon;A military researcher who studies at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA38] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. Known to be a brilliant strategist.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Nestor
string.body: Nestor;A scholar at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA38] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. He studies history with an emphasis on the Humans who lived in each epoch.

string.name: STR_DIC_Seirenia_city
string.body: Seirenia;A scholar at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA38] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. She is an expert in Asmodian studies, and there's a rumor that she occasionally has trysts with an Asmodian Archon.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Haimon
string.body: Haimon;A supervisor at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA39] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. They say he's got a nose for contraband. Nothing gets past him unless it's obscured by the smell of Kinah.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Lukian
string.body: Lukian;A dock laborer at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA39] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27], he wants his son [%dic:STR_DIC_N_basmos] to become a dock worker, but his wife [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Lufe] disagrees.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_basmos
string.body: Basmos;The son of [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Lufe] and [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Lukian], he's recently started a job at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA_tempest] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. He's torn over the two futures his parents want for him.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_c7
string.body: Torirunerk;A Shugo of the Black Cloud Traders. He deals in lumber at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA_tempest] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_c8
string.body: Yaorunerk;A Shugo of the Black Cloud Traders. He works at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA_tempest] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. He believes firmly in contracts, and in enforcing penalties.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_c9
string.body: Gaoshunerk;A Shugo of the Black Cloud Traders found at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA_tempest] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. He has been caught smuggling goods from Asmodae in the past.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Emir
string.body: Emir;A citizen of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. She's always hanging around outside the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA39], but she won't say why. She is one of those rare Humans who get along well with Shugos.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Lufe
string.body: Lufe;A citizen of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27], she is concerned that her son [%dic:STR_DIC_N_basmos] is following her husband [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Lukian] into a career as a dock worker. She would prefer that the boy work toward ascension.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_c17
string.body: Mapirerk;A Shugo Worker of the Black Cloud Traders. He was kicked out from his previous Traders because of his poor performance.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Tikeron
string.body: Tikeron;He's a Guardian Templar protecting the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA39] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Lemias
string.body: Lemias;He's a Guardian Templar protecting the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA39] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Lityerses
string.body: Lityerses;A Human with influence over many illicit activities going on in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. He can be found at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA40], surrounded by Humans of questionable character.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Benorun
string.body: Benorun;Found at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA40], he's the kind of Human who wants to help you make a lot of Kinah fast. Just give him all your money and leave everything to him.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Deke
string.body: Deke;Found at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA40], he entices people to gamble. He used to run a pool, betting on which Human in Sanctum would ascend next.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Menon
string.body: Menon;Found at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA40], she's a trustworthy woman who would like to help you avoid being cheated by disreputable individuals. You should probably give her all your Kinah for safekeeping.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_c18
string.body: Kunberunerk;A Shugo running a shipyard. He does everything to make Kinah.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ludina
string.body: Ludina;The owner of the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLAadd]. She is a shrewd businesswoman and an excellent bartender, but tends to be attracted to bad men.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Genon
string.body: Genon;A waiter at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLAadd]. He's a romantic at heart, and at one time he wanted to be a poet, but he became a waiter to pay his bills.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Dela
string.body: Della;She's a regular customer at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLAadd]. The waiter [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Genon] claims she's never bought a single drink for herself. [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Ludina] tolerates her drunken behavior because they were childhood friends.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Py
string.body: Py;A citizen of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27] who frequents the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLAadd]. She's kind of an excitable kid, but cute.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Mino
string.body: Mino;A well-known Daeva of Song in the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA40]. She and [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Bella] the Daeva of Dance compete fiercely for attention, and hate each other.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_c10
string.body: Paorunerk;A Shugo storyteller who spends time in the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLAadd]. He is always willing to spin a tale for a willing listener.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_c11
string.body: Feyshunerk;A Shugo in the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA40]. He is new to Sanctum and afraid of high places.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_c12
string.body: Layrunerk;A Shugo in the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA40]. He wishes the rules for transporting goods into Sanctum were not quite so tight.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Menoa
string.body: Menoa;A patron of the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLAadd]. He's one of the few people who can stand talking to [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Py] for a long time. He is a friend of [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Lapis].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Lapis
string.body: Lapis;A Daeva in the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA40]. Even though she longs to be like [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Bella] the Daeva of Dance, she just doesn't have the talent.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Mustapino
string.body: Mustapino;He's a fan of [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Bella] and watches her perform in the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA40]. One of his neighbors was recently arrested on suspicion of being a Lepharist Revolutionary.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Bella
string.body: Bella;A well-known Daeva of Dance in the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA40]. She is a popular celebrity, along with her hated rival [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Mino] the Daeva of Song.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Mara
string.body: Mara;A Human resident of Sanctum, she enjoys watching [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Bella] perform. She's very proud of her brother [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Kodinaus], who ascended as a Daeva.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Iana
string.body: Iana;A Guardian who patrols the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA40]. She is wise beyond her station.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Kodinaus
string.body: Codinaus;A Guardian standing in the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA40]. He doesn't tolerate injustice. He is [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Mara]'s brother.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Mameia
string.body: Marmeia;A young woman who has made it her life's work to understand the Krall. She is found at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA39] of [%dic:STR_DIC_ELA07]. She is often complimented on her cute freckles and youthful looks.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ulaguru
string.body: Ulaguru;A Krall captured by [%dic:STR_DIC_LA85] for her research. He is at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA_tempest] of [%dic:STR_DIC_ELA07].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Morgana
string.body: Morgana;A Guardian who patrols the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA40]. His family members are all Daevas, so he raises his children with great discipline to prepare them for ascension.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Kadmos
string.body: Kadmos;A guardsman in the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA40]. He is pleased with his post's proximity to [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Mino] and [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Bella].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Laitos
string.body: Laitos;A citizen who harbors ill feelings towards Daevas because they look down on Humans. He is rallying people in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA40] to revolt.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_c13
string.body: Ruoshinerk;A Shugo making his way in the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA40]. He hasn't gotten used to Sanctum yet, and still gets lost a lot.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_c14
string.body: Maorinerk;A Shugo who works in the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA40]. He is involved in legal disputes with several customers over the quality of his products, but he claims it's a Daeva plot.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_c15
string.body: Kazmonerk;A Shugo working in the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA40]. He used to run a business in Asmodae and had to leave his wife there when he was sent to Sanctum by the Black Cloud Traders. He misses her terribly.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_c16
string.body: Kierunerk;A Shugo belonging to the Black Cloud Traders in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA40]. He has a great talent for business.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Lustiena
string.body: Lustiena;A Daeva who walks near the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA35]. She is concerned for Humans who might fall form Sanctum's heights.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Eris
string.body: Hether;She walks the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA37] encountering many Daevas and telling them the gossip she's heard about them from their friends. She seems to enjoy instigating fights.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Libitina
string.body: Libitina;A woman who came to Sanctum following [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Mikero]. He had to bring her to the city because of a promise he made to her while quite drunk. She wanders near the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA31].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Arion
string.body: Arion;A Daeva of Prophecy you can find at the Sky Canal in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. He acquired the ability to predict the future after being struck by lightning on a rainy day.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Nidia
string.body: Nidia;A citizen of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27] who can be found around the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA_tempest], she has no respect for Daevas because there's no labor involved in earning ascension.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Etere
string.body: Etere;She goes for a walk around [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA31] every day, as she hasn't been assigned any duties since she ascended.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ikipio
string.body: Ipikio;A scholar who studies spores, molds, and fugus. He's recently gotten access to the secret library on the second floor of the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA38] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Leno
string.body: Leno;A researcher in the secret library on the second floor of the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA38] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. She cares a great deal for preserving knowledge.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Atifure
string.body: Atifure;A waitress at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLAadd], she is responsible for keeping track of the inventory of drinks and food.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Tures
string.body: Tures;A waiter at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLAadd], he's a pleasant fellow.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Basarieno
string.body: Basarieno;A Guardian in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Pidas
string.body: Pilas;A scholar in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Tigares
string.body: Tigares;The Daeva of Cosmetics can be found at the Angelic Frippery at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA37] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. He sells skin-sprays and hair dyes in a rainbow of colors.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Zeidi
string.body: Zeidi;A friendly Warehouse Keeper.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Rinos
string.body: Rinos;A Daeva of Duels who monitors and supervises every detail in the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA34].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Entes
string.body: Entes;A friendly Daeva Teleporter.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Beomas
string.body: Beomas;A Daeva who has not yet been assigned a mission. He spends most of his time in the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA37A] of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA37] eating and drinking.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Euripides
string.body: Euripides;The Daeva of Life Transformation can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLAadd]. If you have the right item, he'll use his magic to change your gender.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Idomeneus
string.body: Idomeneus;A priest and a teacher who helps others enchant their wings.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Maenia
string.body: Maenia;The Daeva of Appearance can be found at the Angelic Frippery at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA37] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Umenae
string.body: Umenae;A cook.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Gerania
string.body: Gerania;Known as the best document restoration expert in Elysea. She is now restoring the ancient documents of Daevas in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Regmos
string.body: Regmos;A Daeva of Flame who prefers not to be too hot. He spends time in the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA_garden].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Phokas
string.body: Phogus;A port manager of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA39] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA35]. He controls all the cargo coming into and out of the port.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Coeus
string.body: Coeus;A weapon expert at [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA38] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27]. He knows everything about weapons.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Gromoros
string.body: Gromoros;An Abyss researcher at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA38] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_c20
string.body: Daarunerk;A Shugo renowned for his vast knowledge. He is in the Secret Library on the second floor of the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA38] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_c21
string.body: Ayurinrinerk;A member of the Tigraki Workshop who trades with masters at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA36] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_LC1_23
string.body: Mikurunrunerk;A Shugo envoy of the Black Cloud Traders staying in the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA40]. He is kind and affable.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_LC1_24
string.body: Peperinrinerk;A Shugo envoy of the Black Cloud Traders staying in the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA40]. She gets the attention of every Shugo because of her beauty.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_LC1_25
string.body: Mikarinerk;A Shugo envoy of the Black Cloud Traders staying in the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA40]. He is reliable and has a strong sense of duty.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Elpis
string.body: Elpas;A Mercenary Sentinel guarding the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA01] in Poeta. Being innocent and honest, he always takes good care of others.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Kales
string.body: Kales;A farmer raising crops in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA01] in Poeta. He is a simple man and [%dic:STR_DIC_LA03]'s cousin.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_CLM_Farmer
string.body: Farm Worker 1(nonspeaking);Farm Worker, A2. Akarios Plains

string.name: STR_DIC_N_CFM_Farmer
string.body: Farm Worker 2(nonspeaking);Farm Worker, A2. Akarios Plains

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF1_Mercenary_1
string.body: Mercenary 1 fighting against Kerubs;Mercenary (for display),A2. Akarios Plains

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF1_Mercenary_2
string.body: Mercenary 2 fighting against Kerubs;Mercenary (for display),A2. Akarios Plains

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF1_Mercenary_3
string.body: Mercenary 3 fighting against Kerubs;Mercenary (for display),A2. Akarios Plains

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF1_Mercenary_4
string.body: Mercenary 4 fighting against Kerubs;Mercenary (for display),A2. Akarios Plains

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Mires
string.body: Mires;A Mercenary member at [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA01] in Poeta. He thinks highly of himself.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Asteros
string.body: Asteros;A priest of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA02] in Poeta. He is well-respected by the village residents.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Polinia
string.body: Polinia;A priest helping [%dic:STR_DIC_LA02] at [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA02] in Poeta. She records the missions the mercenary troops have carried out, and settles accounts with them.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Mune
string.body: Mune;A seamstress working in the armor shop at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA02] in Poeta. She has a generous personality and is good at Tailoring.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Uno
string.body: Uno;A skilled cook in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA02] in Poeta. His only concern is that his wife, [%dic:STR_DIC_LA07], does not pay much attention to the family.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ager
string.body: Ager;The owner of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA209] in Poeta. He stays in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA02] now, after being driven out of his farm by Kerubs.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Amus
string.body: Amus;The owner of an armor shop at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA02] in Poeta. He is fond of the color purple.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Pula
string.body: Fulla;A Soul Healer of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA02] in Poeta. She can read the mind of other people but seldom opens her heart to others.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Melampus
string.body: Melampus;A Mercenary fighter guarding the entrance to [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA02] in Poeta. He became a mercenary only for money, and doesn't have any sense of duty.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Toleo
string.body: Toleo;A Mercenary at [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA02] in Poeta. He brags that his excellent skills have earned the confidence of the Mercenary Captain.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Kalio
string.body: Kalio;The Captain of the Kalion Mercenaries, who stands in front of the Nobelium in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA02] in Poeta. He is broad-minded and generous, and organized the Mercenaries.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Brutus
string.body: Brutus;A Mercenary fighter at [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA02] in Poeta. He is the last Human in a Daeva family. However, he thinks that it is an honor even for a Human to do his best in a battle.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Uteiron
string.body: Utenion;A Mercenary fighter at [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA02] in Poeta. He only works as a mercenary in order to earn money for parties.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Kustanon
string.body: Kustanon;A flight transporter of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA02] in Poeta. He was the disciple of a Daeva for a long time, studying flight transportation, but he never managed to ascend as a Daeva.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Daines
string.body: Daines;A Teleporter of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA02] in Poeta.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Kunandes
string.body: Kunandes;A warrior instructor at [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA02] in Poeta. Although he was an excellent mercenary, he now works as an instructor because of an ankle injury.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Auron
string.body: Gilden;A Scout instructor at [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA02] in Poeta.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Esera
string.body: Esera;A Mage instructor at the Nobelium of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA02] in Poeta. She is known to have been a prodigy at using the Aether of fire element.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Kagas
string.body: Kagas;A Priest instructor at the Nobelium of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA02] in Poeta. A lover of liquor, he is always drunk.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Muranes
string.body: Muranes;Mercenary Vice Captain standing on the way from [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA02] to [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA03] in Poeta. She is ambitious and not always kind to her subordinates.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Feira
string.body: Feira;An angler fishing at [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA03] in Poeta. She is the wife of [%dic:STR_DIC_LA05] and is engrossed in fishing.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ben
string.body: Ben;An angler fishing at [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA03] in Poeta. Originally he lived in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09], but he was attracted by Cliona Lake and settled down at the Akarios Village.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Pranoa
string.body: Pranoa;A farmer living near [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA03] in Poeta. The Kerubs are hindering his ability to work his farm.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Namus
string.body: Namus;A lumberjack making a living from cutting trees at [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA04] in Poeta. He's also skilled at making potions.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ampeis
string.body: Ampeis;A Kalion Mercenary Liaison guarding the entrance of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA04] in Poeta. He earns a decent income by selling mushrooms on the side.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Nier
string.body: Nier;A Mercenary Scout in Daminu Forest in Poeta. She patrols alongside [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Fredge].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Fotis
string.body: Fredge;A Mercenary Scout in Daminu Forest in Poeta. He patrols alongside [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Nier].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Melpone
string.body: Melponeh;A scholar at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA05] in Poeta. She has studied the history of the Krall and Kobolds. She's got a mercenary attitude toward her work.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Lonia
string.body: Lonian;A Merchant selling general goods at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA05] in Poeta. He has a cynical personality, and is good at managing financial affairs. He and Namus don't seem to get along.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ozzz
string.body: Oz;A Mercenary Outpost Guard at [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA05_1] in Poeta. As his general store had gone bankrupt, he applied for a mercenary job.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Tula
string.body: Tula;Mercenary Vice Captain at [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA05_1] in Poeta. He is benevolent and fair compared to Muranes.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Aello
string.body: Aero;A flight transporter at [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA05_1] in Poeta.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Naeru
string.body: Naeru;A Soul Healer at [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA05_1] in Poeta.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Pernos
string.body: Pernos;A mysterious old hermit dwelling near the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA06] in Poeta.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Poa
string.body: Poa;A Mercenary Scout standing between the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA06] and [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA08] in Poeta. He believes in his work and is quite cautious.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ino
string.body: Ino;A Mercenary Scout who used to guard the Timolia Mine with [%dic:STR_DIC_LA21] in Poeta. He was captured by the Krall and imprisoned within the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA08].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Purine
string.body: Parine;A resident of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09]. She worries constantly about everything.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Alteno
string.body: Alteno;He is studying Soul Healing at [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09], but his progress is very slow. It's putting a strain on his marriage to [%dic:STR_DIC_LA16].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Drasia
string.body: Drasia;A Food Merchant of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09]. She firmly believes that she is good at cooking, but others would tell you otherwise.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Enia
string.body: Enia;The wife of [%dic:STR_DIC_LA14] and a resident of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09]. Her husband is studying to be a Soul Healer, which takes all of his time. She worries that their marriage is suffering because of it.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Kinesos
string.body: William;A Guardian Centurion of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09]. He stands guard outside the Brigade General's headquarters building, along with his tamed Griffon.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Hyacinte
string.body: Hyacinte;A Guardian of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09]. He is in charge of the financial affairs of the Guardians stationed in the Fortress, and is always concerned over shortages of supplies.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Spatalos
string.body: Spatalos;The Brigade General of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09]. He lost his wife and son in the Krall War, and has become correspondingly ruthless in his pursuit of victory.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Selene
string.body: Selene;A priest of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09]. She looks kind, but at the same time she is rather arrogant. She advises newcomers at the Verteron Citadel.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ipis
string.body: Ivis;The owner of the weapon shop in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09]. He takes pride in his work and doesn't seem concerned about turning a profit. He is quite generous and the weapons he sells are a good value.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Nadaelo
string.body: Nadaelo;An Armor Merchant of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09]. A bit of a miser, he started his business by selling armor and later learned how to make armor himself.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Adelia
string.body: Anaka;A resident of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09]. She has a bright personality and cares about the other residents of the Citidel. She seems to have a crush on [%dic:STR_DIC_LA153].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Mairon
string.body: Mairon;A resident of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09]. He is amiable and a little bit careless. He always worries about [%dic:STR_DIC_LA30] because she works in such a dangerous place.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ordais
string.body: Ordais;A resident of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09]. He dreams of becoming a weapon merchant one day, succeeding his father Ivis. He often talks of silly things.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Palaemon
string.body: Palaemon;A Soul Healer of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09]. He is kind.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Alaus
string.body: Alisdair;A Guardian Centurion of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09]. When he was first assigned to Verteron, he complained about the humidity, but now Verteron has become his second home.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ian
string.body: Irian;A General Goods Merchant of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09]. He has a pleasant personality and is kind to everyone.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ispio
string.body: Ispio;A Medicine Merchant of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09]. He is a very studious person, always interested in learning about new potions.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Kairon
string.body: Kairon;A Guardian on post in the northeast entrance of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09]. He is one of the most reliable Guardian watchmen.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Perinens
string.body: Perinens;A Guardian of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09]. She is the mother of two kids, Serin and Polor, but prefers to let [%dic:STR_DIC_LA145] take care of them.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Spiros
string.body: Spiros;A Guardian patrolling the inside of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09]. He is very popular with the ladies.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Aremine
string.body: Aremine;A Guardian Sentinel of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09]. She does the job assigned to her faithfully.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Crisius
string.body: Crisius;A Guardian Sentinel of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Despoina
string.body: Despoina;A Guardian Sentinel of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Famis
string.body: Pamis;A Guardian Sentinel of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Mesarion
string.body: Mesarion;A Guardian Sentinel of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ursuras
string.body: Ursuras;A Guardian Sentinel of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Efrosini
string.body: Efrosini;A Guardian Sentinel of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Antheia
string.body: Antheia;A Guardian Sentinel of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09]. She is scouting around the cliff of the fortress. She became a Daeva after having been raised by the Elim in the forest.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Mirdiena
string.body: Mirdiena;A Flight Transporter in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09]. As a Human she used to roam all over Atreia, but now she spends her days helping others travel.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Taiotus
string.body: Stone;The Information Officer of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09]. He enjoys playing games when he's not making announcements. He has a very loud voice.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Hynops
string.body: Hynops;A Guardian on the roof of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09]. You can reach him by flying. He is very busy dealing with the Hoverstones coming out of the Abyss Gate.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Urakron
string.body: Urakron;A Teleporter of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09]. Rumor has it that he has a grudge against [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Kustanon] in Poeta.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Gano
string.body: Gano;He gathers herbs near [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA24]. He used to live in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27] but moved to [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA10] after he became homesickness. He likes children, and often takes care of Perinens' kids, Serin and Polor.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ondanius
string.body: Ondanius;A gatherer collecting herbs near [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA24] in Verteron. He frequently sells rare herbs to the Black Cloud Traders, thanks to his connections with the Shugos.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Qydro
string.body: Qydro;The son of [%dic:STR_DIC_LA20] and a resident of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA10] in Verteron. He might drink a bit too much, but he respects the elderly and writes to his father frequently.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Abolos
string.body: Abolos;Watch Leader at [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA10] in Verteron. He became the Leader because there was nobody else suitable, but he is a thoughtful leader in his own way. He has a tamed Griffon at his side at all times.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Naia
string.body: Naia;A resident of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA10] in Verteron. She is rather dissatisfied with her husband [%dic:STR_DIC_LA28] as he seems to do nothing but waste time.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Santenius
string.body: Santenius;A priest of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA10] in Verteron. He is quite pious.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Leto
string.body: Leto;A Guardian in front of the Nobelium of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA10] in Verteron. She was dispatched from [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Eradis
string.body: Eradis;A Food Merchant of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA10] in Verteron. He should be proud of his excellent cooking skill, but instead he's ashamed because his family expected him to ascend as a Daeva like his siblings.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Maniparas
string.body: Maniparas;A merchant of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA10] in Verteron. He was raised as an only child, and as a result is somewhat spoiled and selfish.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Nemia
string.body: Nemia;A resident of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA10] in Verteron. She takes good care of her husband [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Hianu].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Beris
string.body: Beris;A member of the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA10] Watch in Verteron. He is a bit vain.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Lusis
string.body: Lusis;A member of the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA10] Watch in Verteron. He is a friend of [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Beris] and always energetic.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Imerun
string.body: Imerun;A member of the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA10] Watch in Verteron. He thinks highly of Humans who protect themselves.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Airote
string.body: Airote;A member of the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA10] Watch in Verteron. She is a bit impatient with her superiors.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Saminel
string.body: Saminel;A member of the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA10] Watch in Verteron. He volunteered for the Watch for the sake of his family's honor, but his martial art skills are pretty weak.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Sukatus
string.body: Segatus;A member of the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA10] Watch in Verteron. He is never distracted when he is on duty.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Pilamonia
string.body: Pilamonia;A Soul Healer of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA10] in Verteron.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Krodis
string.body: Krodis;A farmer living in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA10] in Verteron. Recently he discovered Kobolds looting his crops.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Neltonia
string.body: Neltonia;A Human angler of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA10] in Verteron. She believes her fishing skill is as good as any Daeva's.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Hanontus
string.body: Hanontus;A farmer of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA10] in Verteron. He is pious.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Poliane
string.body: Polor;A child living at [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA10] in Verteron. He is [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Perinens]'s son.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Pernensos
string.body: Serin;A child living at [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA10] in Verteron. She is [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Perinens]'s daughter.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Alto
string.body: Alto;A shepherd herding Porguses at [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA10] in Verteron. Filled with intellectual curiosity, he reads books and meditates while the livestock grazes. His ambition is to study Aetheric Science when he grows up.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Lamor
string.body: Cannon;A young shepherd living at [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA10] in Verteron. He guards Porguses in the village.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Estino
string.body: Estino;A Guardian protecting the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA11] in Verteron.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Meteina
string.body: Meteina;A Guardian protecting the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA11] in Verteron. She speaks Krallic very well and is good at interrogating captured Krall.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Gapir
string.body: Gaphyrk;A Shugo captured by the Krall and imprisoned in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA12] in Verteron. He seems to have fallen for a Kobold named Mimiti.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Lepios
string.body: Lepios;An Ecology Researcher who studies the contamination of the Tolbas Forest in Verteron. Since being wounded while collecting data, he has been staying in the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA16].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Lostes
string.body: Lostes;A member of the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA10] Watch in Verteron, and [%dic:STR_DIC_LA25]'s husband. He talks a good game but is often not up to the things he brags about. He hangs around in the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA15].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Gogohas
string.body: Geolus;An Ecologist at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA15] in Verteron. He is researching the contamination of the forest, along with his assistant [%dic:STR_DIC_LA160].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Hianu
string.body: Hianu;A hunter at [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA15] in Verteron. He is getting tired of his wife [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Nemia]'s excessive interference.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Illos
string.body: Illos;An intern researcher who studies the ecology of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA15] in Verteron along with [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Gogohas]. He does his share of work diligently.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF1_Giant
string.body: Humongous Giant;Zumion Canyon.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_NPC_LF1a_Fethlot
string.body: Considerate Lagos;An Abex in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA18] that can talk.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Dronoa
string.body: Dronoa;A pilgrim at [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA18] in Verteron. He ran into a bit of trouble during the Great Pilgrimage with his wife [%dic:STR_DIC_LA71].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Anasia
string.body: Anasia;A pilgrim of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA18] in Verteron. She is on the Great Pilgrimage with her husband [%dic:STR_DIC_LA31].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Roseino
string.body: Roseino;A Guardian protecting the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA17] in Verteron. She is a capable and dedicated soldier who fervently studies the cause of the contamination. Despite her average looks, she is popular among the men in the neighboring village.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Meliodas
string.body: Roseino;A Guardian protecting the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA17] in Verteron. She is a capable and dedicated soldier who fervently studies the cause of the contamination. Despite her average looks, she is popular among the men in the neighboring village.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Leipos
string.body: Vascus;A Mysterious Stone gatherer at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA19_1] in Verteron. He used to believe that he would ascend once he accumulated enough experience through pilgrimage, but he has since settled into his role as a gatherer.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ibion
string.body: Ibion;A peddler doing business in the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA19_1] in Verteron. He is particularly fond of Kinah.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Irona
string.body: Irona;A Flight Transporter at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA19_1] in Verteron.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Eninte
string.body: Eninte;A beautiful lady you can find at [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA19_1] in Verteron. She is suffering from a broken heart.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Morai
string.body: Morai;A Guardian protecting the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA20_1] in Verteron. She uses ambiguous expressions and seems to hide something.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Cerios
string.body: Cerios;A Guardian protecting the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA20_1] in Verteron. He is obedient and responsible.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Lunax
string.body: Lunax;A Guardian protecting [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA20] in Verteron. He worries for the safety of the pilgrims in the area.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Anontrite
string.body: Anontrite;An Administration Officer at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA20_1] in Verteron. She was dispatched from Sanctum to assist coin-related tasks.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Titania
string.body: Titania;A Soul Healer at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA20] in Verteron.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Kimena
string.body: Kimena;A Guardian Legionary patrolling in the air above [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA20] in Verteron. She and [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Levius] are from the same hometown.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Levius
string.body: Levius;A Guardian Legionary patrolling in the air above [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA20] in Verteron. She and [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Kimena] are from the same hometown.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Klitie
string.body: Khidia;A Protector of the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA21_1] in the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA21]. She has the ability to hear the energy of Aether. She was a member of Temple under the command of Lord [%dic:STR_DIC_LA57].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Phorcys
string.body: Phorcys;A Guardian Centurion who enjoys fishing at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA21] in Verteron. She is known to be the follower of Lord [%dic:STR_DIC_LA59].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Zephyros
string.body: Zephyros;A Guardian protecting the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA21_1] at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA21] in Verteron. He really hates Potcrabs.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Notos
string.body: Notos;A Guardian protecting the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA21_1] at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA21] in Verteron. He is suspicious as well as curious. He seems to have some sort of relationship with Morai.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Belfinu
string.body: Belfinu;A Flight Transporter of the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA21] in Verteron.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Une
string.body: Une;A Guardian Legionary stationed in the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA21].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Kurion_Q
string.body: Kurion;Known to be a task force member of the Lepharist Revolutionaries.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Puppy
string.body: Poppy;A Porgus cherished by [%dic:STR_DIC_LA159], a shepherd at Tolbas Village in Verteron. It has disappeared without a trace.

string.name: STR_DIC_Seirenia_Q
string.body: Seirenia;A mysterious beauty who enjoys bathing in the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA04_1] of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA4].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_NPC_Fungo
string.body: Shroomy;A mushroom found at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA06]. It is a friend of Pernos.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_NPC_Fungky
string.body: Shroomin;A mushroom found at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA06]. It is a friend of Pernos.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_NPC_Fungchu
string.body: Shroomba;A mushroom found at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA06]. It is a friend of Pernos.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_NPC_Fungpy
string.body: Shroomer;A mushroom found at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA06]. It is a friend of Pernos.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_NPC_Stony
string.body: Stony the Stone Fist;A Rock Spirit at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA19_1] in Verteron. It is a loyal servant of [%dic:STR_DIC_LA65].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Krall_Warrior_Q
string.body: Krall Scrapper;Event Spawn Krall Scrapper.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Manos
string.body: Manos;An old man living in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09]. He is the father of [%dic:STR_DIC_LA23] and the brother of Belbua.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Tree_Move_Noah
string.body: Forest Protector Noah;An Elim standing at the entrance of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA04] in Poeta. He is sleeping.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Tree_Keeper
string.body: Protector of Daminu;The Elim protecting Daminu, the owner of the Daminu Forest in Poeta.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Tree_Sleeping
string.body: Dormant Tree Clan;Daminu Forest in Poeta.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Tree_NoMove_Daminu
string.body: Daminu;Chieftain of the Elim Tribe at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA04] in Poeta. He is the ruler of the forest. He is found in the center of the forest.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Tree_Move_Elote
string.body: Elote;An Elim at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA20] in Verteron. He is guarding the neighboring forest.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Tree_LF1a_1
string.body: Mileno;An Elim at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA20] in Verteron. He is guarding the neighboring forest.

string.body: Numitorem;An Archon guarding the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_5] in Pandaemonium. He still loves his ex-girlfriend [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Gundrun].

string.body: Latatusk;A Daeva at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_5] in Pandaemonium. He is a master of Essencetapping.

string.body: Zyakia;A Tailoring master at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_5] in Pandaemonium.

string.body: Ulut;A Daeva of Chance at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_14] in Pandaemonium. He despises gambling for money.

string.body: Limpaksi;A Daeva of Despair at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_14] in Pandaemonium. She spreads an ominous rumor that the thirteenth Empyrean Lord will destroy the world.

string.body: Sorante;A legion officer working at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_6] in Pandaemonium. She takes care of the process of founding Legions.

string.body: Garun;A Legion insignia seller at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_6] in Pandaemonium. He helps craft insignias.

string.body: Eiren;A Daeva of Divine Clothing at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_7] in Pandaemonium. She is very proud of her divine clothing.

string.body: Kinot;A Daeva of Dyeing Skill at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_7] in Pandaemonium. He has a good color sense.

string.body: Kroia;A Daeva of Divine Weapons at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_7] in Pandaemonium. She takes care of odd jobs and leaves sales to [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Yuret].

string.body: Hoki;A Daeva of Divine Panoply at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_7] in Pandaemonium. One of [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Kinterun]'s students.

string.body: Niz;A Daeva of Divine Panoply at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_7] in Pandaemonium. She has a deep affection for armor.

string.body: Merar;A Daeva of Divine Shields at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_7] in Pandaemonium. He likes reading books.

string.body: Selesti;A Daeva of Food in the banquet hall of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_7] in Pandaemonium. She governs all of the banquets held in Pandaemonium.

string.body: Kitanya;A worker of the banquet hall of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_7] in Pandaemonium. Thanks to her affable manner, she is very popular.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Dorein
string.body: Dorein;A server at the danquet hall of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_7] in Pandaemonium. She's easygoing and is good at making friends with the female guests.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Lidorasa
string.body: Lidorasa;A Daeva of Vanity hanging around the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_7] in Pandaemonium. Even if she can't afford it, she's always got to have the latest thing.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Douke
string.body: Rebert;A Daeva of Criticism walking about the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_7] in Pandaemonium. The public trusts him, but merchants despise him.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Perin
string.body: Perin;An Archon guarding the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_7] in Pandaemonium. He swears revenge on [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Fjorgin], who betrayed him.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Hupre
string.body: Hupre;An Archon guarding the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_7] in Pandaemonium. He is very attached to [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Kitanya].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Sierun
string.body: Sierun;An Archon guarding the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_7] in Pandaemonium. She had a hard life as an orphan, which is reflected in her gloomy mood.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shurenia
string.body: Shurenia;An Archon guarding the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_7] in Pandaemonium. She is smart and thinks quickly on her feet.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Namiya
string.body: Namiya;An Archon guarding the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_7] in Pandaemonium. She likes eating snacks.

string.body: Kadisa;An Archon guarding the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_7] in Pandaemonium. When [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Namiya] leaves for a snack break, Kadisa covers her absence.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Lusena
string.body: Lusena;A Daeva living in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_0].

string.body: Asei;A Daeva living in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_0].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Valensti
string.body: Valensti;A pickpocket who decided to take a break until the Archons lower their alert level. She wanders about Pandaemonium, never staying in one place.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Deyla
string.body: Deyla;A Daeva of Deduction searching every corner of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_5] in Pandaemonium. She is investigating a recent robbery case.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Amjuturan
string.body: Amjuturan;She wanders about Pandaemonium, talking incessantly. She is [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Lindhog]'s wife.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Aur
string.body: Aur;A Daeva of Wandering who knocks about from place to place in Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Argat
string.body: Argat;He hangs around the banquet hall of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_7] in Pandaemonium. Being a wine lover, he is always drunk.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Niberan
string.body: Niberan;A Human who came to Pandaemonium dreaming she'd return home loaded with honors. She is now homesick.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Kanensa
string.body: Kanensa;A Daeva of Wind who calls for a fair wind at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_13] in Pandaemonium. People say that airships can take off and land safely in any weather thanks to her.

string.body: Arlion;A Daeva of Flight standing outside the banquet hall of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_7] in Pandaemonium. He controls the movements of airships.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Sekidona
string.body: Sekidona;A woman hanging around the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_13] in Pandaemonium. She is watching for her husband who left for battle awhile ago.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Aldbol
string.body: Aldbol;A resident who is waiting for an airship at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_13] in Pandaemonium. He is going to visit his parents who live on the outskirts of the city.

string.body: Osvi;An ex-pickpocket walking about the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_13] in Pandaemonium. He insists that he's reformed, but he's still suspicious.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Annju
string.body: Annju;A suspicious Human walking about the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_13] in Pandaemonium. He is dripping with sweat.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Zerpi
string.body: Zerpi;A suspicious Human walking about the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_13] in Pandaemonium. He seems nervous.

string.body: Venbol;A worker at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_13] in Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Versel

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Selod
string.body: Selod;A traveler looking around the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_13] in Pandaemonium. He came to see Pandaemonium with people from his village.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Koir
string.body: Koir;A traveler looking around the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_13] in Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Djupi
string.body: Djupi;A resident standing at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_13] in Pandaemonium. He came to Pandaemonium dreaming of a better life, but he is now going back home after struggling to live in the city.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Denesere
string.body: Denesere;A resident who is waiting for an airship at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_13] in Pandaemonium. She is waiting for her mother who sent a message that she will be coming for a visit.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Donoerin
string.body: Donoerin;A Human strolling about the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_13] in Pandaemonium. She is an actress auditioning for a role in the theater.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Delua
string.body: Delua;A nervous traveler found at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_13] in Pandaemonium. She worries about her husband and children back at home.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Denir
string.body: Denir;A Human walking about the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_13] in Pandaemonium. A persecution maniac.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Alrura
string.body: Alrura;A resident who is waiting for an airship at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_13] in Pandaemonium. She came to the Airship Dock to pick up fresh produce delivered directly from the farm.

string.body: Eramir;A Daeva of Amusement at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_13] in Pandaemonium. He is performing at the Airship Dock to entertain the visitors arriving in Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Emvelu
string.body: Emvelu;She's advertising for a tavern at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_13] in Pandaemonium. She's pitching to visitors stepping off the airships.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Etunapi

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Evesup
string.body: Evesup;An Archon guarding the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_13] in Pandaemonium. He is looking for any suspicious visitors.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ersa
string.body: Ersa;An Archon guarding the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_13] in Pandaemonium. She is disgruntled about the lax policies set by her superiors.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Feden
string.body: Feden;An Archon guarding the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_13] in Pandaemonium. He is so alert, he can spot suspicious activity immediately.

string.body: Fjuedil;An Airship Dock manager in charge of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_13] in Pandaemonium. He is suffering from overwork.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Feglie
string.body: Feglie;An Archon guarding the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_13] in Pandaemonium. She is proud of her job of keeping watch on the airship boarding gates.

string.body: Girditan;A guardsman guarding the gates of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_13] in Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Genpels
string.body: Jeckrow;A barkeep at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_14] in Pandaemonium. He is a little rough but quite generous.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Genmjola
string.body: Genmjola;A regular customer of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_14] in Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Germu
string.body: Glerm;A regular customer of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_14] in Pandaemonium. He likes the relaxing atmosphere.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Reia
string.body: Reia;A worker at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_14] in Pandaemonium. She is very amiable.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Legina
string.body: Malfaisante;A barkeep at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_14] in Pandaemonium. She looks harmless, but past unruly customers know better.
