string.body: Gwendag;A pilgrim hanging around the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_1] in Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Hebennjot
string.body: Hebennjot;A resident hanging around the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_1] in Pandaemonium. He is very kind.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Hiyask
string.body: Hiyask;A pilgrim hanging around the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_1] in Pandaemonium. She came to Pandaemonium to embark on the Great Pilgrimage.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Heltinjola
string.body: Heltinjola;A resident hanging around the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_1] in Pandaemonium. Both of her parents are Daevas, but she has not yet ascended.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Heimdall
string.body: Heimdall;An Archon guarding the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_1] of Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Isdal
string.body: Isdal;A merchant selling weapons at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_2] in Pandaemonium. He sometimes alienates customers with his crude manner of speaking.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Igsrun
string.body: Igsrun;An Armor Merchant at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_2] in Pandaemonium. He is very preoccupied with money.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Kiengart
string.body: Kiengart;A Manastone Remover at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_2] in Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Genoti
string.body: Genoti;A Godstone Socketer at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_2] in Pandaemonium, now retired. He made his living by bestowing mysterious powers upon weapons.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Kerupnise
string.body: Keruthis;An Item Remodeller at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_2] in Pandaemonium. She makes her living by modifying the appearance of weapons.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Njomi
string.body: Njomi;A merchant of remodeled expendables at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_2] in Pandaemonium. She sells the expendables needed to remodel weapons and armor.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Kenikin
string.body: Kenikin;A child playing around [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_3].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Lasesbini
string.body: Lasesbini;A child playing around [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_3].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Lindhog
string.body: Lindhelm;An Information Officer of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_3] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_0], whose job is to announce all of the important news of Asmodae. He is [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Amjuturan]'s husband.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Doman
string.body: Doman;A teleporter at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_1] in Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Araison
string.body: Araison;A bard reciting poems in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_3]. He is silver-tongued and handsome.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Agamo
string.body: Agamo;A Daeva of Music singing songs of blessing on the bridge near the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_6] in Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Hike
string.body: Hika;A fanatic follower of Araison who spends most of her time in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_3].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Sehman
string.body: Sehamm;A traveler looking around [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_3].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Teska
string.body: Teska;A resident nervously waiting for someone in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_3]. She is angry with her friend who is making her wait for so long.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Epren
string.body: Epren;A fanatic follower of Araison. She spends most of her time in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_3].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Wunarai
string.body: Wunarai;A pilgrim wandering about the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_10] in Pandaemonium. Having come to Pandaemonium on a pilgrimage, she is now thinking about settling down in the city.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Geiena
string.body: Geiena;A fanatic follower of Araison. She spends most of her time in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_3].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Niseria
string.body: Niseria;A Shadow Executor at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_15] in Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Hirei
string.body: Hirei;An Archon guarding [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_3]. She is very proud of her job.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Nekai
string.body: Nekai;A merchant selling general goods at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_2] in Pandaemonium. She is a bit of a flirt.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Haink
string.body: Haink;A merchant selling shields at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_2] in Pandaemonium. He doesn't seem very focused on making money.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Mareke
string.body: Mareke;A merchant selling accessories at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_2] in Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Mimir
string.body: Cavalorn;An Arch Sage at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_12] in Pandaemonium. He is a walking encyclopedia of Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Kasir
string.body: Kasir;A prophet at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_12] in Pandaemonium. He is confined in the secret library.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Kushar
string.body: Kushar;A scholar at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_12] in Pandaemonium. He is researching the Lepharist Revolutionaries.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Dolf
string.body: Dolf;A worker at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_12] in Pandaemonium. He can tell you the location of every single book in the library.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Sereniti
string.body: Phosphor;A scholar at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_12]. She is honest and meticulous.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Moreinen
string.body: Moreinen;A scholar at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_12] in Pandaemonium. She almost lives in the Temple of Knowledge.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Hirot
string.body: Matuskei;A good-natured fellow who spends most of his time at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_14] in Pandaemonium. He is usually drunk.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Brakan
string.body: Brakan;A Daeva of Fortunetelling in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_10] in Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Hasadin
string.body: Sterlin;A Daeva of Philosophy in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_10] of Pandaemonium. He is always mumbling about strange concepts.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Soudan
string.body: Jakwillem;A Daeva at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_10] in Pandaemonium. He is a retired Brigade General.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Kiperson
string.body: Kiperson;An Archon guarding the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_10] in Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Gagan
string.body: Makka;An Archon guarding the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_10] in Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Herpa
string.body: Haven;A tavern tout shouting in front of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_14] in Pandaemonium. Her beauty attracts many customers.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Teo
string.body: Teo;A resident wandering about the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_10] in Pandaemonium. His wife henpecks him all the time.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Merot
string.body: Merot;A resident of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_10] in Pandaemonium. He suspects the Shugo are selling Elyos products.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Neusa
string.body: Neusa;A librarian working at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_12] in Pandaemonium. She loves books.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Momorena
string.body: Momorena;A resident of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_10] in Pandaemonium. She is distrustful.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Oridana
string.body: Oridana;A peddler doing business in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_10] of Pandaemonium. She came to Pandaemonium to buy new goods.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Sireine
string.body: Sireine;An Archon guarding the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_10] in Pandaemonium. She is kind.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Vrege
string.body: Vrege;An Archon guarding the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_10] in Pandaemonium. She wants to experience various things.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Eiperin
string.body: Eiperin;An Archon guarding the road to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_13] of Pandaemonium. She tends to despise half-bred Daevas.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Lajur
string.body: Lajur;An Archon guarding the gate of an unnamed building in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_10] of Pandaemonium. He controls access to the building.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Yura
string.body: Yura;An Archon guarding the gate of an unnamed building in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_10] of Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Sadena
string.body: Sadena;A Daeva residing in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_9] of Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Frana
string.body: Frana;A Daeva found on the second floor of a building in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_9] of Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Tonorea
string.body: Tonorea;The leader of a small bandit group lurking around the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_10] in Pandaemonium. She is tough.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Heidrun
string.body: Heidrun;An Archon guarding the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_10] in Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ragfrid
string.body: Ragfrid;An Archon guarding the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_10] in Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Johanert
string.body: Johanert;A member of the Tonorea Bandits. He is idling with other members in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_10] of Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Alviss
string.body: Alviss;A member of the Tonorea Bandits. He is idling with other members in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_10] of Pandaemonium.

string.body: Gororunerk;A trade broker at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_4] in Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_DC1_3
string.body: Ondarinerk;A cube factory craftsman at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_4] in Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_DC1_4
string.body: Nekorunerk;A cube factory craftsman at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_4] in Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_DC1_5
string.body: Obirunerk;A Handicrafting merchant at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_5] in Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_DC1_6
string.body: Cheishunerk;An Airship Dock worker at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_13] in Pandaemonium. He tends to look down on the Black Cloud Traders.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_DC1_7
string.body: Kodarunerk;An Airship Dock worker at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_13] in Pandaemonium. He seems lazy to the core.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_DC1_8
string.body: Micorunerk;A smuggler doing business during the day at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_14] in Pandaemonium. At night he wanders about back alleys of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_10].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_DC1_9
string.body: Myorunerk;A Traders worker guarding the cargo at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_10] in Pandaemonium. He doesn't like being told that he is lazy.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_DC1_10
string.body: Kamorunerk;A supervisor working at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_13] in Pandaemonium. He tends to brag about his position as a supervisor.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_DC1_11
string.body: Chauminminerk;A Traders worker guarding the cargo at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_13] in Pandaemonium. He laments the absence of opportunity in the Traders.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_DC1_12
string.body: Lyeanenerk;A Traders worker guarding the cargo at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_13] in Pandaemonium. She always thinks about pleasure, not work.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_DC1_13
string.body: Maochinicherk;A medicine merchant at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_2] in Pandaemonium. He is very proud of his goods.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Talmenu
string.body: Talmenu;A Daeva of a prominent family living at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_9] in Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Annemari
string.body: Annemari;A Daeva standing near the pond at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_9] in Pandaemonium. She is the daughter of High Priest [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Balder].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Arekedil
string.body: Arekedil;A Sentinel patrolling the inside of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_1]. He is searching for the truth about his childhood.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Dune
string.body: Duna;A philosopher without a specific job. She spends most of her time chatting with other Daevas in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_11].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Daskair
string.body: Daskair;A Daeva at the banquet hall in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_7] in Pandaemonium. He always seems to be in agony over something.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Gantrug
string.body: Gantrug;A philosopher who gives philosophy lectures at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_10] of Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Icaronix
string.body: Icaronix;A mysterious figure who you can meet in the Sliver of Darkness.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Srudgelmir
string.body: Khrudgelmir;A Shadow Judge residing at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_15] in Pandaemonium. He is a scrupulous person who dislikes being spoken to without a valid reason.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Jafnhar_Wrong
string.body: Jafnhar;A mysterious, former Shadow Judge whose exact position and current whereabouts are unknown.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Karollin
string.body: Karollin;A Daeva found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_11]. She is awaiting the return of her son who is fighting in the Abyss.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_NPC_Huron
string.body: Huron;A merchant selling wings at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_3]. She never gives a discount.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Gunter
string.body: Gunter;An antique document restoration expert at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_12] in Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ecus
string.body: Ecus;A Legion member who claims to have fought beside you at Karamatis in the past.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_DC1_18
string.body: Chantinerk;The youngest of all Shugo envoys of the Black Cloud Traders at the Airship Dock in Pandaemonium. He takes care of odd jobs.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_DC1_19
string.body: Moorinerk;A Shugo envoy of the Black Cloud Traders at the Airship Dock in Pandaemonium. He is an opportunist who has no qualm about switching sides for profit.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_DC1_20
string.body: Habirunerk;A Shugo envoy of the Black Cloud Traders at the Airship Dock in Pandaemonium. A talented Shugo with great potential who considers [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Shugo_DC1_21] his rival.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_DC1_21
string.body: Teirunerk;A Shugo envoy of the Black Cloud Traders at the Airship Dock in Pandaemonium. He is a veteran with much experience.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_DC1_22
string.body: Payrinrinerk;The leader of the Black Cloud Traders Envoy. Cherishes a ribbon that she received as a gift when young.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Hnoss
string.body: Hnoss;A Balaur Researcher in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_12] in Pandaemonium. He is inside the Secret Library in the corner of the Temple of Knowledge.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_DC1_23
string.body: Chopirunerk;A Shugo of the Tigraki Workshop dispatched to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_5] in Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Anita
string.body: Jylla;An Shadow Executor in the Shadow Court in Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Sichel
string.body: Sichel;An Accessory Distributor at the Capitol Building of Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Timogand
string.body: Daskin;A Daeva of Costume Art in the Fine Boutique in Pandaemonium. He is kind and cultured but rarely reveals his true thoughts.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Mione
string.body: Marra;A Daeva of Costume Art in the Fine Boutique in Pandaemonium. She is whimsical yet maintains a professional demeanor.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Izwin
string.body: Oubliette;A gatekeeper guarding the door of the Hidden Library in the Temple of Knowledge in Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Keas
string.body: Keas;An administration officer working at the New Heiron Gate. He is in charge of rewarding magic class Daevas with coins.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Vair
string.body: Kehleb;A Shadow Executor guarding the entrance of the Shadow Court. He absolutely detests Daevas from Vanahal.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Diomedes
string.body: Diomedes;A Priest in the Nobelium of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_OP]. Longing for power, he desires to empower himself with ancient relics.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Telemachus
string.body: Telemachus;A Brigade General in charge of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_OP]. Although he looks young, he is a battle-hardened veteran who ascended sometime near the Cataclysm.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Aurelius
string.body: Aurelius;A Centurion assisting the Brigade General in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_OP]. He is well-spoken and intellectual. He is a history buff who volunteered to come here because of the relics.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Valerius
string.body: Valerius;A Centurion assisting the Brigade General in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_OP]. He respects [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Telemachus] so much that he followed him to the Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ferenna
string.body: Ferenna;An Administration Officer in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_OP] who is in charge of awarding Coins to Daevas.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Maximianus
string.body: Malonimus;A Centurion assisting the Brigade General in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_OP]. He looks down on [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Telemachus] who he believes behaves brashly because of his early ascension.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Magras
string.body: Magras;A Guardian Sentinel protecting [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_OP]. He behaves carefully around Centurion Malonimus.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Benos
string.body: Benos;A Guardian Sentinel protecting [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_OP]. He finds many things in the world interesting. Diokles also owes him money over a bet he won.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_TusKeos
string.body: Tuskeos;A Guardian Sentinel protecting [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_OP]. He dreams of the outside world.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Prorite
string.body: Prorite;A Guardian Sentinel protecting [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_OP]. Occasionally, she regrets having become a Guardian.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Dalanius
string.body: Dalanius;A Guardian Sentinel protecting [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_OP].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Hebestis
string.body: Hebestis;A Guardian Sentinel protecting [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_OP]. He is friendly with the Shugo merchant [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Shugo_LF2_5].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Laike
string.body: Laike;A Guardian Sentinel protecting [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_OP].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Memnes
string.body: Memnes;A Guardian Sentinel protecting [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_OP]. He is very interested in [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Telemachus].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Xtus
string.body: Axus;A Guardian Sentinel protecting [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_OP].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Pavlos
string.body: Pavlos;A Guardian Sentinel protecting [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_OP]. He is lazy and apathetic.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Diokles
string.body: Diokles;A Guardian Sentinel protecting [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_OP]. Having such a high-ranking officer so nearby stresses him out.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Thyestes
string.body: Thyestes;A Guardian Sentinel protecting [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_OP].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Gaia
string.body: Gaia;A Daeva of Earth in the Nobelium of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_OP]. She came to Eltnen to investigate the desertification of the region.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Machaon
string.body: Machaon;A Soul Healer standing next to the Obelisk of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_OP]. As a disciple of Radamanthys, he serves his master faithfully.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Onesimus
string.body: Onesimus;A teleporter near the terrace of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_OP]. He cares a lot about Sonirim.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Nadeia
string.body: Naomi;A flight transporter found near the terrace of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_OP].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Clio
string.body: Clio;A Daeva of Song who sings the Songs of Blessing at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_OP]. Her songs refresh the senses.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Hiblrion
string.body: Hibrion;A Weapon Merchant doing business at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_OP]. He is complains a lot about the Shugos who supply him with shoddy materials.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Krato
string.body: Krato;An Armor Merchant at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_OP]. He takes great pride in the Armor Shop he runs. It has been in his family for generations.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Kyros
string.body: Kyros;An Information Officer who announces the current news of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_OP]. He believes that speaking in a loud voice is the most important quality for an Information Officer.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Octavia
string.body: Octavia;A Human living in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_OP]. She is a clever and ambitious woman. Her plan is to marry someone with power.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Admeta
string.body: Admeta;A Human living in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_OP]. She tries to seem like a cultured person. She has absolutely no doubt that she will become a Daeva.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Adelphie
string.body: Adelphie;A Human living in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_OP]. Though she is a friend of Admeta, she is sick of her putting on airs.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Pallas
string.body: Pallas;A Human living in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_OP]. He never holds a stable job so his income is very erratic.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Hegemene
string.body: Hegemene;A resident of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_OP]. She is an aspiring artist who is learning to sing from Clio, but her talent is rather mediocre.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Daedalus
string.body: Daedalus;A flight instructor teaching Daevas how to fly in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_OP]. He is very passionate about flying.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Phomona
string.body: Phomona;A Forest Daeva on the road from [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_OP] to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_A1]. The central government dispatched her to revive the dying forest.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Tree_Move_Biadri
string.body: Biadri;An Elim standing on the road from [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_OP] to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_A1].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Tree_Move_Zelaka
string.body: Zelaka;An Elim standing on the road from [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_OP] to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_A1]. He is deeply worried about the forest.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Androkles
string.body: Androkles;A Guardian Sentinel guarding the path to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_OP]. He has a very interesting mindset.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Archelaos
string.body: Archelaos;A Guardian Sentinel guarding the path to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_OP]. He is tired of dealing with Androkles.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Tyndareus
string.body: Tyndareus;A Guardian Sentinel guarding the path to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_OP]. He thirsts for success.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Tran
string.body: Tran;A Guardian Sentinel guarding the path to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_OP]. He is devoted to his duty.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Tree_NoMove_Lodas
string.body: Lodas;The King of the Forest protecting the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_B] in Eltnen. After sending all of his people to safety he stayed behind to try to stop the desertification of Eltnen by himself.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Tree_Move_Demro
string.body: Demro;An Elim standing on the road from [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_A1] to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_A2] in Eltnen. He believes that they must give up the forest and send Lodas to a safe place.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Tree_Move_virdi
string.body: Virdi;An Elim standing on the road from [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_A1] to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_A2] in Eltnen. He believes that Lodas can revive the forest.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Iandeus
string.body: Iandeus;A Daeva of Life protecting the Fountain of Life in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_A1] of Eltnen. He thinks anything is possible.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Seora
string.body: Celestine;A Daeva of Life protecting the Fountain of Life in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_A1] of Eltnen. She is a little skeptical about her duty.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Novan
string.body: Novan;A Guardian Sentinel guarding the path from [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_A1] in Eltnen to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_G1]. He has a sharp ear.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Lakaias
string.body: Lakaias;A Guardian Sentinel guarding the path from [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_A1] in Eltnen to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_G1]. He was transferred because he couldn't adapt in the Abyss.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Justachys
string.body: Justachys;A Guardian Sentinel guarding the path from [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_A1] in Eltnen to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_G1]. He is short-tempered.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Herodes
string.body: Heropres;A Guardian Sentinel guarding the path from [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_A1] in Eltnen to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_G1]. He is very eager to make money and regularly trades with the Shugos.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Demokritos
string.body: Demokritos;A Guardian Scout Captain dispatched to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_C1_SUB_2] in Eltnen. He is from Eltnen and is familiar with the geography of the region.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Alexis
string.body: Alexis;A Scout dispatched to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_C1_SUB_2] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_C1]. He hears many things from a friend in Verteron.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Kalikrates
string.body: Kalitrates;A Scout dispatched to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_C1_SUB_2] in Eltnen. He was selected as a Scout due to his extraordinary eyesight.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Makarios
string.body: Makarion;A Scout dispatched to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_C1_SUB_2] in Eltnen. He is unhappy with the work environment.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Acaste
string.body: Acaste;A Scout dispatched to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_C1_SUB_2] in Eltnen. She is fed up with [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Makarios]'s complaints.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Sandinas
string.body: Sandinas;An Administration Officer dispatched to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_C1_SUB_2] in Eltnen. He is a little concerned about the lowered stature of administration Officers.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Kimeia
string.body: Kimeia;A Protector of Divinity who has sealed Sataloca's Heart in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_C1_SUB_1] in Eltnen. She has an eye for judging people.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Kimeia_Q1043
string.body: Kimeia;She is on post inside the Abyss Gate to prevent Balaur invasion into Eltnen.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Radamanthys
string.body: Radamanthys;A Priest assisting [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Kimeia] at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_C1] in Eltnen. He respects Kimeia.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ando
string.body: Ando;A priest assisting [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Kimeia] at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_C1] in Eltnen. He is excited to have new experiences.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Garperos
string.body: Garperos;A Daeva of Flame at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_C1] in Eltnen. He helps [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Kimeia] to control the fire energy around Sataloca's Heart.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Castor
string.body: Castor;The Brigade General of the Golden Bough Legion stationed at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_C2_SUB_1] in Eltnen. He is very proud of himself.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Trillian
string.body: Tellarius;A Centurion of the Golden Bough Legion stationed at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_C2_SUB_1] in Eltnen.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Axelion
string.body: Axelion;A Centurion of the Golden Bough Legion stationed at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_C2_SUB_1] in Eltnen. He is highly educated and very interested in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_C3].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Corybantes
string.body: Corybantes;A Golden Bough Legionary stationed at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_C2_SUB_1] in Eltnen. He is said to be tender-hearted.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Aron
string.body: Aron;A Golden Bough Legionary stationed at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_C2_SUB_1] in Eltnen. He is very proud of himself.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Mirage_Legionnaire_F
string.body: Golden Bough Legionary;A soldier of the Golden Bough Legion stationed at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_C2_SUB_1] in Eltnen.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Mirage_Legionaaire_M
string.body: Golden Bough Legionary;A soldier of the Golden Bough Legion stationed at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_C2_SUB_1] in Eltnen.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Melaina
string.body: Melaina;A resident wandering about the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_G2] in Eltnen. People say she is a little insane.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Tanis
string.body: Tanis;A Soul Healer at the entrance of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_E2_SUB_1]. He works hard to carry out his duties.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ophelia
string.body: Ophelia;A resident wandering about the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_G2] in Eltnen. You can find her at the Mystic Spring of Laquepin. She is impetuous and often regrets things she's said or done.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Actaeon
string.body: Actaeon;An archaeologist at the entrance of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_D] in Eltnen. He is very secretive and mysterious, wandering around to investigate relics.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Sirinks
string.body: Sirink;An archaeologist investigating the dried up Mystic Spring of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_D] in Eltnen. She is an assistant of [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Actaeon].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF2_ShugoPet_1
string.body: Shugo Bodyguard;Traders Camp

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF2_ShugoPet_2
string.body: Shugo Bodyguard;Traders Camp

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF2_ShugoPet_3
string.body: Shugo Bodyguard;Traders Camp

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Turiel
string.body: Turiel;A refugee sheltering in the camp located near the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_G2] in Eltnen. She became a vagabond after fleeing her hometown when it turned into a desert.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ernia
string.body: Ernia;A refugee in the camp near the Mystic Spring of Anathe in Eltnen. She is in a desperate situation.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF2_Refugee_1
string.body: Refugee;A refugee sheltering in the camp located in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_G2].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF2_Refugee_2
string.body: Refugee;A refugee sheltering in the camp located in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_G2].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF2_Refugee_3
string.body: Refugee;A refugee sheltering in the camp located in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_G2].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ophelos
string.body: Ophelos;A Daeva of Life guarding the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_G2_SUB_1] near the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_G2] in Eltnen. He has a strong sense of duty.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Esaias
string.body: Esaias;A Daeva of Life stationed in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_G2_SUB_1] near the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_G2] in Eltnen. He is a busybody and has many things on his mind.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Lemia
string.body: Lemia;A Guardian Sentinel who escorts the Daevas of Life at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_G2] in Eltnen. It's annoying to her that the pilgrims don't always follow her orders.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Leone
string.body: Leone;A Guardian Sentinel who escorts the Daevas of Life at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_G2] in Eltnen. You can find her at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_G2_SUB_1].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_NPC_Mabangta
string.body: Mabangtah;The leader of the Kaidan Kralls that disappeared from Eltnen. When the Balaur invaded Atreia and subjugated Krall tribes, he escaped with his elite soldiers to hold the pride of the Kaidan.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_NPC_Kaidan_Warrior
string.body: Expelled Kaidan Warrior;A Krall in the stronghold at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_E1].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_NPC_Kaidan_Scout
string.body: Expelled Kaidan Soldier;A Krall in the stronghold at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_E1].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Paion
string.body: Paion;A Guardian on post at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_G3_SUB_2] in Eltnen. She attributes her clumsiness to the hot weather.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Makis
string.body: Makis;A Scout of the outpost located on the northwestern hill of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_G3] in Eltnen. He is a plain fellow who is very interested in money.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Hylas
string.body: Hylas;A Guardian on post at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_G3_SUB_2] in Eltnen. He tends to be indolent.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Asclepius
string.body: Asclepius;A Guardian Centurion dispatched to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_G3] in Eltnen. He is fatigued from overwork.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Beramones
string.body: Beramones;A Guardian dispatched to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_G3_SUB_1] in Eltnen. She realizes that the situation in the village is bad, and is looking for a chance to extricate herself.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Arkel
string.body: Arkel;A Guardian dispatched to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_G3] in Eltnen. She works hard without complaining, believing that hard work will pay off eventually.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Aerope
string.body: Aerope;A Priest of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_G3_SUB_1] in Eltnen. Many residents come to her to speak of their grievances.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Siara
string.body: Lynor;A Soul Healer guarding the Obelisk of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_G3] in Eltnen. She is carrying out her duties faithfully.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Nomiki
string.body: Nomiki;A resident of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_G3] in Eltnen. She has thought of leaving the village.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Amade
string.body: Amade;A resident of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_G3] in Eltnen. He looks stern but tends to make a fuss over nothing.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Berenike
string.body: Berenike;A member of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_G3] Watch in Eltnen. A braggart looking for the opportunity to become the Watch Leader.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Oreia
string.body: Oreia;A member of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_G3] Watch in Eltnen. She dislikes Berenike and thinks he is a braggart.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Zellix
string.body: Zellix;A member of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_G3] Watch in Eltnen. He is optimistic.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Zinas
string.body: Zinas;A member of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_G3] Watch in Eltnen. He was a child prodigy who looked like he would ascend as a Daeva, but it hasn't happened yet.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Tenemi
string.body: Tenemi;A member of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_G3] Watch in Eltnen. She thinks highly of herself after visiting Verteron, and has a habit of mentioning Verteron whenever she opens her mouth.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Elias
string.body: Elias;A member of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_G3] Watch in Eltnen. He would rather use his fists than wield a weapon.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Jestina
string.body: Jestina;A member of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_G3] Watch in Eltnen. She is the widow of the former Watch Leader, and is considering leaving the village for the sake of her unborn baby.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Diamonte
string.body: Diamonte;A member of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_G3] Watch in Eltnen. She was a childhood friend of Isson, but she now goes about cursing her friend who has returned as a Lepharist Revolutionary.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Nikias
string.body: Nikias;A member of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_G3] Watch in Eltnen. He still regards Isson, who joined the Lepharist Revolutionaries, as a friend.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Tebersina
string.body: Tareash;A flight Teleporter of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_G3] in Eltnen. She wants to leave the village but cannot do so, as there is no one who can take over her duties.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Pietas
string.body: Pietas;A retired Daeva at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_G3] in Eltnen. She returned to her hometown to be of help, but hasn't been able to do much yet.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Hagne
string.body: Hannet;A General Goods Merchant at the Kyloa Temple. She feels sorry that she has to charge for her goods when everyone is going through such a difficult time. She also has a missing son.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Noiyus
string.body: Noiyus;A resident of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_G3] in Eltnen. He misses the good old days.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Magarites
string.body: Margarro;A resident of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_G3] in Eltnen. He wants to leave the village, but he doesn't have enough strength left in his body.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Dellome
string.body: Dellome;An old woman residing at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_G3] in Eltnen. She is of the mind that all the disasters have fallen on the village because of incompetent youngsters.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Deurone
string.body: Deurone;A Daeva of Life at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_I1_SUB_1] in Eltnen. She is a geology expert who is currently investigating the desertification of the Eltnen region.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Elram
string.body: Elram;A Guardian in the outpost southwest of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_I1] in Eltnen. Though he is pleased to have been assigned to a quiet place, he still works diligently opening new flight routes and awarding Coins.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Laigas
string.body: Laigas;A Guardian in the outpost southwest of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_I1] in Eltnen. He regards Deurone with contempt because he can't fight even though he is a Daeva.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Aeolus
string.body: Tumblusen;An Aetheric Field Protector guarding the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_E2_SUB_1]. His looks show the wisdom he has gained over the years.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Kibelle
string.body: Kibelle;A Guardian Sentinel protecting [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_E2] in Eltnen. She'd never be able to endure this post if not for the companionship of [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Dionera].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Dionera
string.body: Dionera;A Guardian Sentinel protecting [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_E2] in Eltnen. She makes a capable team with her girlfriend [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Kibelle].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Hierni
string.body: Hierni;A captured Human in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_H] in Eltnen. She speaks Krallic very well and has an eye for discovering Odium veins.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Gardugu
string.body: Captured Gardugu;A Krall captured at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_H] in Eltnen. He is Mabangtah's henchman.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_NPC_Mabangta_Fellow
string.body: Targatu;A Krall on the cliffs of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_K] tower in Eltnen, who is Mabangtah's secret agent. Only Mabangtah knows of his exact location.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_NPC_Griffonix
string.body: Griffonix;A leader of Griffons living in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_I1] in Eltnen. Its entire body is covered in [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1930A].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_NPC_LF2_Griffo
string.body: Dancing Feather;A young Griffon kidnapped by a Virago. You may find it at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_I1] in Eltnen.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_LF2_1
string.body: Gygaxunerk;A Shugo Broker in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_OP]. Arnesonerk's partner in business for many years.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_LF2_2
string.body: Arnesonerk;A Shugo Broker in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_OP]. Gygaxunerk's partner in business for many years.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_LF2_3
string.body: Ramorunerk;A Shugo working at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_C2_SUB_1] in Eltnen. Although he technically works for the Wind Breeze Shop, it isn't easy to find him because he is a peddler.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_LF2_4
string.body: Chicorinerk;A Shugo that sometimes shows up at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_J] in Eltnen. Although he works for the Wind Breeze Shop, he very rarely shows up there.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_LF2_5
string.body: Shaoranyerk;A Shugo selling general goods in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_OP]. Her deep, absorbing stare makes it difficult to refuse her.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_LF2_6
string.body: Girrinerk;A Shugo running an Apothecary in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_OP]. Unfortunately for him, he can't pursue his hobbies because of his wife.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_LF2_7
string.body: Neornyerk;A Shugo working at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_C2_SUB_1] in Eltnen. A branch office manager of the Wind Breeze Shop who is tough to deal with.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_LF2_8
string.body: Gorashunerk;A Shugo working at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_C2_SUB_1] in Eltnen. He is a son of [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Shugo_LF2_7], and barely does any work.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_LF2_9
string.body: Gyabrunerk;A Shugo working at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_C2_SUB_1] in Eltnen. He is an employee of the Wind Breeze Shop.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_LF2_11
string.body: Brirunyerk;A Shugo hiding at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_F2] in Eltnen who has a scheme to make some big Kinah. He is an employee of the Wind Breeze Shop and places more value on honor than most Shugos.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_LF2_10
string.body: Shumerurk;A Shugo found near [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_G2_SUB_1] in Eltnen who is searching for something. No one knows why he's there. He is an employee of the Wind Breeze Shop.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Marana
string.body: Marana;A Flight Instructor of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_C3] in Eltnen. She has decided to educate Daevas, as she believes that the Daevas of today aren't as adept at flying as Daevas in the past.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_pilifemos
string.body: Philipemos;A Human priest who used to guard the Kyola Temple in Eltnen. He has gone missing recently.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Brownie_Cook
string.body: Kobold Cook;He cooks food for the Krall at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_E1_SUB_1] in Eltnen. He cares about Mabangtah dearly.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_NPC_Manduri_Survivor
string.body: Melginie;A mysterious woman who has been held for ages in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_A1_SUB_1] in Eltnen and is still alive.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Anasya
string.body: Taera;A Guardian Sentinel guarding the passage connecting [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_A1] and the Outpost Ruins in Eltnen. She has a strong sense of duty as a Daeva.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_NPC_Heratos
string.body: Heratos;A Daeva of Life stationed at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_C2] in Eltnen. He was shattered after failing to carry out a mission, but he seems to be on the road to recovery.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_ArtifactGuard_Q1038
string.body: Kheldon;Artifact Protector.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Captured_Engineer_cage
string.body: Civil Engineer;An engineer known to be locked up in the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LF2_Lehpar_Cage] at the Lepharist Bastion in Eltnen. He is frightened.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Teos
string.body: Teos;A child staying in the refugee camp at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_G2] in Eltnen. He longs for his mother's embrace.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Agrips
string.body: Agrips;A Coin Administration Officer at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_G3_SUB_1] in Eltnen. He issues missions appropriate for each Daeva, and gives rewards from Sanctum to the Daevas who successfully complete the missions.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Lano
string.body: Lano;A Daeva of Fishing who fishes every day at the river near the Eltnen Fortress. It's said that the only thing he was ever good at was fishing.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Telamone
string.body: Telamone;A Soul Healer aiding the Daevas battling in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_A1].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_LF2_12
string.body: Igorerk;A Shugo living alone in an isolated place on the way from the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_I1] to the Lepharist Bastion in Eltnen. It's not known why he lives alone, but he seems very lonely.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_LF2_15
string.body: Korumonerk;A member of the Changarnerk Traders in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_E2_SUB_1]. He circles many regions delivering goods.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_LF2_13
string.body: Harumonerk;A Shugo of the Wind Breeze Shop you can find at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_B] or [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_C1_SUB_2] in Eltnen.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_LF2_14
string.body: Chiyorinrinerk;A Shugo of the Wind Breeze Shop, who wonders about [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_F1] or the refugee camp near [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_G2] in Eltnen and peddles his wares.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Perento
string.body: Perento;The Brigade General of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_A1]. An outstanding strategist who understands the situation in Heiron perfectly.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Sarantus
string.body: Sarantus;A Guardian Centurion in the Nobelium of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_A1]. Quick and hot-tempered, he gets upset easily when his men don't handle their tasks.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Barsita
string.body: Barzon;A Guardian Centurion of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_A1]. He is often mistaken for lazy because of his laid-back attitude, but he is quite earnest in his duties.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Meiheira
string.body: Meiheira;A Guardian Centurion of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_A1]. She has a deep hatred for Balaur who killed many of her men.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Sofne
string.body: Sofne;A Protector of Divinity residing in the Nobelium of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_A1]. A Daeva who ascended before the Cataclysm, she has witnessed the entire history of Atreia and is a repository of wisdom and knowledge.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Sulates
string.body: Sulates;A priest residing in the Nobelium of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_A1]. A native of Heiron, he doesn't spare his effort to let Sanctum know the difficulties of the Elyos.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Gatuso
string.body: Gasuto;A Guardian Sentinel of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_A1]. He is a newcomer, brimming with enthusiasm. But his abilities aren't yet good enough to support his zeal.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Loktania
string.body: Loktania;A Guardian Sentinel of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_A1]. As Gasuto's senior, she has her hands full.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Sisandra
string.body: Sisandra;A Guardian Sentinel on post at the entrance of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_A1]. She has a habit of marrying Human men, as she doesn't think she can be with just one person for her entire Daevic lifetime. Her third husband passed away recently.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Altiana
string.body: Altiana;A Guardian Sentinel protecting the Nobelium of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_A1]. She is rapidly climbing up the ladder of success thanks to her charisma.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Mato
string.body: Mato;A Guardian Sentinel patrolling inside [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_A1]. He was very pleased to be assigned here as there are many female colleagues.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Dolla
string.body: Dolla;A Guardian Sentinel on post inside [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_A1]. She is not to be underestimated despite her timid appearance. She's a completely different person in combat.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Kisia
string.body: Kisia;A Soul Healer of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_A1]. Frequent battles have saddled her with near-constant fatigue.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Amene
string.body: Amene;One who is in charge of flight transportation in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_A1]. She has a strong sense of responsibility for her job.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Barantus
string.body: Barantus;One who in charge of long-distance Teleportation in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_A1]. He is devoted to his duty.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Belakade
string.body: Belakade;An Administration Officer dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_A1]. She is very good at administrative tasks.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Kasarello
string.body: Kasarello;A Guardian Sentinel on post at the entrance of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_A1]. He is a skilled swordsman, so his colleagues incessantly ask for lessons, leaving him with little time to rest.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Daruka
string.body: Daruka;A Guardian Sentinel patrolling inside [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_A1]. He used to work in the Abyss, but was reassigned after the invasion of the Balaur. He is here to give lessons to the Guardians in this area.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Eopede
string.body: Eopede;A Guardian Sentinel patrolling inside [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_A1]. She is good at magic, and was recruited from an Abyss unit. She is teaching the Guardians of the Fortress, but she is a demanding instructor.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Phuthollo
string.body: Phuthollo;A Fortress resident at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_A1]. His family has been living here since his father settled here, and although he is aware that the Fortress is in turmoil at the moment, he is confident that the Guardians can protect it.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Genes
string.body: Genes;A Fortress resident of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_A1]. He is terrified that the Balaur have invaded, but he doesn't know what to do or where to go.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Henobe
string.body: Henobe;A Fortress resident of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_A1]. He came to New Heiron Gate after escaping from Agairon Village. He thought he had come to a safe haven, but the invading Balaur have driven him to despair.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ephos
string.body: Ephos;An Information Officer of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_A1]. He was appointed to the position when the former officer ran away.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Jukabe
string.body: Jukabe;A weapon merchant of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_A1]. He came to Heiron to make a big fortune during the war.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Kelber
string.body: Kelber;An armor merchant of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_A1]. Persuaded by his brother Jukabe, he came to Heiron to make a fortune with him.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Resha
string.body: Resha;A food merchant of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_A1]. Her food isn't that great but the generous portions and cheap price make up for the low quality.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Molina
string.body: Molina;A Fortress resident of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_A1]. An extremely practical young lady who is determined to have a Daeva for her husband in order to ensure her own safety during this hectic time.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Nekentos
string.body: Nekentos;A Fortress resident of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_A1]. He is seriously concerned about the current situation.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Orhes
string.body: Orhes;A medicine merchant of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_A1]. She is a native of the area and does not seem to have any intention of leaving there.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Gunes
string.body: Gunes;A Fortress resident of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_A1]. He is seriously concerned about the current situation of Elysea. He always listens carefully to what the Information Officer says, and then expresses his views on important issues to those around him.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Graa
string.body: Graa;A Daeva of Zephyr dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_A1]. She is in charge of patrolling and collecting information. She organizes the information sent by her men from every corner of Heiron and sends it to Sanctum.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Tegis
string.body: Tegis;A Daeva of Zephyr dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_FTW] in Heiron. He is very proud that he is doing something so important. Everyone else just thinks he's doing a job just like everyone else.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Nibeon
string.body: Nibeon;A flight transporter at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_FTW] in Heiron. He is devoted to his duty.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Anto
string.body: Anto;A Soul Healer at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_FTW] in Heiron. He does his best to complete the tasks he is entrusted with.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Senir
string.body: Senir;A Food Merchant at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_FTW] in Heiron. A native resident, he is a hidden master of Cooking.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Maximus
string.body: Maximus;A General Goods Merchant at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_FTW] in Heiron. A retired Daeva, he has been hiding his identity since he moved to the village. He is very reticent for anyone to know who he is.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Aifemis
string.body: Aifemis;A resident of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_FTW] in Heiron. She breaks many hearts with her innocent looks. She's currently trying to seduce several men at the same time.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Endyon
string.body: Endyon;A Guardian Sentinel of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_FTW] in Heiron. The absence of a Centurion leads him to consider himself the leader of the Guardians, and he is very proud of it.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Catid
string.body: Catid;A Guardian Sentinel dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_FTW] in Heiron. He understands how serious it is that only two Guardians must protect the village. He thinks [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Endyon] is pathetic.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Hideros
string.body: Hideros;A guard of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_FTW] in Heiron. He is smitten with [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Aifemis].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Lantis
string.body: Lantis;A guard of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_FTW] in Heiron. Realizing how desperate his village is, he has decided to protect it as best he can.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Camana
string.body: Camana;A resident of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_FTW] in Heiron. She is a martial artist, and although she hasn't joined the Watch she is prepared to help in the battle if needed.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Hellione
string.body: Heraloene;A resident of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_FTW] in Heiron. A native of the area, he is determined to stay and fight if he must.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Zetus
string.body: Zetus;A resident of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_FTW] in Heiron. An old man with poor hearing, he was labeled as an eccentric when he was younger.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Lupigena
string.body: Lupigena;A member of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_FTW] Watch in Heiron. She is brave and the de facto leader of the Watch.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Aimillia
string.body: Aimillia;A guard protecting [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_FTW] in Heiron. She is docile and performs well in the given tasks.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Menaxia
string.body: Menaxia;An intern researcher of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_FTW] in Heiron. She is very diligent and enthusiastic.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Gorgos
string.body: Gorgos;The Blue Fleet Admiral dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_FTW] in Heiron. Losing most of his fleet was a blow to his pride. He doesn't want to admit how desperate his situation is now, so he takes his anger out on his adjutants.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Gella
string.body: Gella;A Blue Fleet adjutant dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_FTW] in Heiron. She is on edge after being on the receiving end of one of Admiral Gorgos' frequent tirades.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Voluptes
string.body: Voluptes;A Blue Fleet adjutant dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_FTW] in Heiron. He tries to take care of all the miscellaneous affairs, so as not to bother the admiral.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ekseus
string.body: Ekseus;The Quartermaster of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_FTW] in Heiron. He is doing all he can to get through this difficult situation.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Skanas
string.body: Skanas;A Blue Fleet sailor patrolling [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_FTW] in Heiron. He is counting his lucky stars after coming back alive from the brink of Vanishment.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Rojani
string.body: Rojani;A sailor of the Blue Fleet dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_FTW] in Heiron. She was shocked to see all of her fallen comrades raised as Banshees. Now she believes it is better to die as a Human.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Meteria
string.body: Meteria;A Blue Fleet sailor at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_FTW] in Heiron. She is arrogant. She doesn't believe that someone like her, who was once a famous Daeva in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27], could be defeated by the Asmodian Daevas of Storm.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Eudora
string.body: Eladora;A Blue Fleet sailor at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_FTW] in Heiron. She thought she could die without regret after having lived for so many years, but when she faced Vanishment her desire for life was rekindled.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Kleio
string.body: Kleio;A Blue Fleet sailor dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_FTW] in Heiron. He is ever optimistic even in the toughest of circumstances.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Alexius
string.body: Rexius;A Blue Fleet sailor at Jeiaparan Village in Heiron. He is still in shock after coming very close to disappearing forever.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Lisidike
string.body: Liske;A researcher studying the Puitonen Bogs of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_014] in Heiron. She is in agony over whether she should quit her research and bear arms to fulfill her duty as a Daeva since the situation is pretty critical.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Miobera
string.body: Miobera;An archaeologist researching at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_014] in Heiron. She devotes herself single-mindedly to her study regardless of what is happening around her.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Antione
string.body: Antione;A priest of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_FTW] in Heiron. She is in panic over the invasion that may occur at any time.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Euripia
string.body: Euripia;An Administration Officer dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_FTW] in Heiron. She is distressed because [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Demodocos] prophecied that misfortune would follow if she came here.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Tolemos
string.body: Tolemos;A magic administration officer at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_FTW] in Heiron.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Aphesius
string.body: Aphesius;An Aetheric Field Protector in charge of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D1]. He is very capable and has a strong sense of responsibility. He blames himself for not detecting the Abyss Gate in advance.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Klaus
string.body: Klaus;A Guardian Centurion protecting the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D1]. He has been dispatched to the Observatory only recently. He swears to protect the Observatory, since he failed to prevent the Abyss Gate from opening.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Gairos
string.body: Gairos;A Guardian Sentinel on post at the entrance of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D1]. If he had his way he would have eradicated all the Krall, but the lack of men has forced him to stand guard and he is frustrated by it.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Rahelio
string.body: Rahelio;A Guardian Sentinel protecting [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D1]. He obeys orders well as every soldier is supposed to.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Terentius
string.body: Terentius;A Guardian Sentinel protecting [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D1]. He has been guarding the Observatory alone, but is now relieved that a Centurion has recently arrived.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Panaita
string.body: Panaita;A Guardian Sentinel protecting [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D1]. She was going to be transferred to Sanctum where her husband is working, but just before her transfer the Abyss Gate opened and now she has to stay at the Observatory.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Erato
string.body: Erato;A priest guarding the altar at the rear of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_FTW] in Heiron. She studies the rituals of Sapiens.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Mirborante
string.body: Mirborante;A Soul Healer in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D1]. He has been doing his job for ages and now he can heal souls with his eyes closed.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Seiana
string.body: Splendora;A Flight Transporter of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D1]. Still clumsy at her job, she has to refer to the flight transportation manual regularly.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Tree_Nomove_Trajanus
string.body: Trajanus;The Elim who is the owner of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_DTW] in Heiron. He is wise and thoughtful. He considers it the most important mission to protect the Great Holy Tree, and he doesn't pay attention to Humans any more than necessary.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Tree_Move_Terba
string.body: Terba;An Elim at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_DTW] in Heiron. She is very hostile to both Humans and Daevas. She blames the Elyos for all of the current problems.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Tree_Move_Mersephon
string.body: Mersephon;An Elim at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_DTW] in Heiron. He is proud that his branches are more beautiful and abundant than the other Elim.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Kravis
string.body: Kravis;A Daeva of Zephyr dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_DTW] in Heiron. He likes to drink, and is very playful.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Luke
string.body: Luke;A Daeva of Zephyr dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_DTW] in Heiron. He is a little tired of his frivolous colleagues.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Edoras
string.body: Edoras;A Daeva of Zephyr at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_DTW] in Heiron. He makes a lot of jokes that only he laughs at.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Tree_Move_Prangos
string.body: Prangos;An Elim at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_DTW] in Heiron. He used to be bothered by the moss and mushrooms that grew around him, but now he has become rather attached to them.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Tree_Move_Sarumok
string.body: Sarumok;An Elim at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_DTW] in Heiron. As he is indifferent to the Elyos and his surroundings, he has no idea that his very existence is currently under threat.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Trou
string.body: Trou;A priest dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_DTW] in Heiron. He is a religious fanatic. He thinks everything is the will of the Empyrean Lords.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Arkos
string.body: Arkos;A flight transporter assigned to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_DTW] in Heiron. He quietly does the job assigned to him.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Sirilis
string.body: Sirilis;A Soul Healer assigned to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_DTW] in Heiron. He is very popular because he is always cheerful.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_NPC_EarthElemental_1
string.body: Terra Spirit;Arbolu's Haven Guard.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_NPC_EarthElemental_2
string.body: Terra Spirit;Arbolu's Haven Guard.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_NPC_EarthElemental_3
string.body: Terra Spirit;Arbolu's Haven Guard.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_NPC_EarthElemental_4
string.body: Terra Spirit;Arbolu's Haven Guard.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_NPC_EarthElemental_5
string.body: Terra Spirit;Arbolu's Haven Guard.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Erone
string.body: Erone;A Daeva of Life appointed to protect [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_DTW] in Heiron. She possesses a strong sense of duty.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Rusiridite
string.body: Rusiridite;A Daeva of Life at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_DTW] in Heiron. She believes that all life is equal.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_NPC_Ageios
string.body: Ageios;A Protector of Earth guarding [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_DTW] in Heiron.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Lomulias
string.body: Lomulias;An administration officer at the Arbolu's Haven village in Heiron. He loves nature and leads a simple and honest life.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_NPC_Karanus
string.body: Karanus;A Protector of Earth guarding [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_DTW] in Heiron.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_NPC_EarthElemental_6
string.body: Terra Spirit;Arbolu's Haven Guard.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Tree_Move_Little_1
string.body: Young Elim;An Elim in Arbolu's Haven.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Tree_Move_Little_2
string.body: Young Elim;An Elim in Arbolu's Haven.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Rance
string.body: Rance;A Guardian Sentinel of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_DTW] in Heiron. He hates the undead.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF3_Skeleton_Q1643
string.body: Animated Skeleton;Arbolu's Haven.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF3_Soul_Q1643
string.body: Animated Soul;Arbolu's Haven.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Nerison
string.body: Nerison;A Daeva of Zephyr dispatched to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_C5] in Heiron. His main mission is to deal with the Lepharists.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Kalendros
string.body: Finn;A Daeva of Zephyr dispatched to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_C5] in Heiron. He is so timid that he can hardly look anyone in the eye.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Seniferes
string.body: Garrett;A Daeva of Zephyr dispatched to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_C5] in Heiron. He is quite irritable.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Hestonos
string.body: Riley;A Daeva of Zephyr dispatched to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_C5] in Heiron. He has several hobbies.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Kalione
string.body: Kalione;A scholar at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_C5] area in Heiron. She studies the effects of the Lepharists' experiments.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Kuobe
string.body: Kuobe;A Guardian Sentinel assigned to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_C5] in Heiron. She reluctantly keeps Kalione safe.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Aiokina
string.body: Aiokina;A Guardian Sentinel protecting [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_C5] in Heiron. She is very tired.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Fenne
string.body: Riala;A Daeva of Zephyr assigned to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_C5] in Heiron. She is overworked.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Neisthea
string.body: Neisthea;A Protector of Divinity at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_001] in Heiron. She enjoys the rugged beauty of the area.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Iorene
string.body: Iorene;A priest dispatched to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_001] in Heiron. She has sarcastic tendencies.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ibelia
string.body: Ibelia;A Daeva of Zephyr dispatched to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_001] in Heiron. She doesn't realize that other people aren't as interested in history as she is.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Senemonea
string.body: Senea;The ecologist in charge of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_002] in Heiron. She is determined to discover the secrets of the Klaws.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Piera
string.body: Piera;A Daeva of Zephyr at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_002] in Heiron. She is there to protect Senea.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Okonus
string.body: Okonus;An ecology researcher at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_002] in Heiron. He has been afraid of Frillnecks ever since he was a child.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Sillen
string.body: Sillen;An ecology researcher at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_002] in Heiron. She loves plants.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Zeuclid
string.body: Zeuclid;A Daeva of Zephyr dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_002] in Heiron. He is on a secret mission from Lord Vaizel.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Prokopios
string.body: Prokopios;A Daeva of Zephyr dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_002] in Heiron. He was raised in Eltnen.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF3_Ghost
string.body: Wandering Ghost;A spirit wandering around the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D6] in Heiron. He doesn't know that he's dead.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Gamedes
string.body: Gamedes;A Daeva of Zephyr dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_005] in Heiron. He is there to destroy the undead, but has recently gotten into fishing.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Berone
string.body: Berone;The former owner of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_005] in Heiron.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_LF3_10
string.body: Suganerk;A Changarnerk Trader dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_005] in Heiron. He is searching for the fabled Hundred-Slot Cube.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Piros
string.body: Piros;A Guardian Sentinel at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_004] in Heiron. He is fighting a tough battle against the Krall.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Brosia
string.body: Brosia;A Guardian Sentinel at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_004] in Heiron. She is like a shining beacon of courage.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Atalante
string.body: Atalante;A Daeva of Zephyr dispatched to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_004] in Heiron. The Guardians resent the fact that she does not help them out.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_LF3_1
string.body: Koorunerk;A Shugo Broker at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_A1]. His business is booming.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_LF3_2
string.body: Karinerk;A Shugo Broker in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_A1]. His business is booming.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_LF3_3
string.body: Dokurunerk;A food merchant at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_DTW] in Heiron. He has some rather predatory business practices.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_LF3_4
string.body: Nagirinerk;A general goods merchant at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_DTW] in Heiron. She is embarassed by Dokurunerk's shamelessness.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_LF3_5
string.body: Aririnirerk;A general goods merchant in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_A1] who is extremely busy thanks to a high demand for his wares.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_LF3_6
string.body: Namarinerk;A Changarnerk Traders member at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_014] in Heiron. He is aflame with enthusiasm to open a new market.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_LF3_7
string.body: Mojarunerk;A Changarnerk Traders member at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_014] in Heiron. He is a rare Shugo who does not have a glib tongue.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_LF3_8
string.body: Shoranarerk;The regional manager of the Changarnerk Traders at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_014] in Heiron. Her charm is simply irresistible. It would be no exaggeration to say that she has charmed her way into the position of regional manager.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF3_Shugo_Pet1
string.body: Shugo Bodyguard;Puitonen Bogs .

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF3_Shugo_Pet2
string.body: Shugo Bodyguard;Puitonen Bogs .

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_LF3_9
string.body: Cheerinrinerk;A Shugo hiding in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_009] in Heiron. What she's doing there is none of your business.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Xanthe
string.body: Firescar;A woman standing under the waterfall of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D2] in Heiron. She does not know why she is there.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_NPC_LF3_Baranus
string.body: Lamidros;A spy who infiltrated the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_010] in Heiron disguised as a Monitor. He is probably rethinking his career choices right now.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Roina
string.body: Roina;A general goods merchant at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D1].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_NPC_LF3_Ettin
string.body: Wailing Moroch;A huge Ettin in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_A2]. His hunger is insatiable.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_NPC_LF3_GraveKnight
string.body: Cursed Ganges;An undead wandering about the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D4] in Heiron. He knows he is dead but he doesn't remember how it happened.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF3_Ghost_Q1628
string.body: Weeping Ghost;She haunts the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_F5] and [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_F2] in Heiron, anxiously searching for someone.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_NPC_Krall_Hokuma_Q1664
string.body: Hokuma;A Kishar Krall near the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_007] in Heiron. He was injured by one of his own.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Tessia
string.body: Tessia;A Guardian Centurion dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_DTW] in Heiron. She is seriously concerned about the situation.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_LF3_11
string.body: Tabrinerk;A peddler captured by the Balaur in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_E2] in Heiron. He perserveres despite his misfortune.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_c19
string.body: Amporonerk;A Shugo working at the docks along the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA35] of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA27].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_UndeadManager_Kacias
string.body: Kacias;An undead at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D8] in Heiron. He is fretting about the Manor's state of disrepair.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_UndeadMaid_Q1055
string.body: Spina;An undead at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D8] in Heiron. She used to be a maid when she was alive.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_UndeadHerdboy_Q1055
string.body: Mempion;An undead at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D8] in Heiron. When he was alive, he was a herder.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_UndeadVigilante_Q1055
string.body: Kalkas;An undead at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D8] in Heiron. He was a watchman in life.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_UndeadFarmer_Q1055
string.body: Ladon;An undead at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D8] in Heiron. He farms eternally.

string.name: STR_DIC_Undead_all
string.body: Manor Worker;The undead staff of Medeus Manor: [%dic:STR_DIC_N_UndeadVigilante_Q1055], [%dic:STR_DIC_N_UndeadHerdboy_Q1055], [%dic:STR_DIC_N_UndeadMaid_Q1055], and [%dic:STR_DIC_N_UndeadFarmer_Q1055].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Nargis
string.body: Nargis;A Lepharist captured at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_A1]. He is constantly shouting warnings of doom.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Esnu
string.body: Esnu;A legendary Seiren said to seduce Humans with her beautiful voice and strip away their souls.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_1057npc
string.body: Fallen Lapontos;He fell near [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_C2] while he was escaping from the Lepharist Research Center with Nargis.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_AkanNamed_50_Al
string.body: Bollvig;An Asmodian who came to Elysea to slaughter the Elyos, but found only tragedy </br>He resides in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_F3].

string.body: Bolverk;A Protector of Divinity of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_OP]. He is rather hedonistic, for a priest.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Aegir
string.body: Aegir;The Brigade General of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_OP]. He accepted assignment there rather than spend another year in the Abyss.

string.body: Bragi;A Centurion at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_OP]. He is fearless and strong, a true Asmodian.

string.body: Nina;A Centurion serving under Brigade General [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Aegir] at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_OP]. She drinks as hard as she fights.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Vili
string.body: Vili;A Centurion serving under Brigade General [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Aegir] at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_OP]. His loyalty is commendable.

string.body: Yilli;A Sentinel of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_OP]. She hates the Lepharists for their lies.

string.body: Demirin;A Sentinel of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_OP].

string.body: Audumlea;A Sentinel of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_OP]. Unusually for an Asmodian, she doesn't appreciate the cold.

string.body: Signi;A Sentinel guarding the Nobelium of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_OP]. As a native of Morheim, she knows quite a lot about Tripeeds.

string.body: Asgeirr;A Sentinel guarding the Nobelium in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_OP]. Raised in Vanahal, he is ignorant of the outside world.

string.body: Asmundr;A Sentinel guarding the front gate of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_OP]. He is an infamous ladies' man.

string.body: Falkor;A Sentinel patrolling [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_OP]. He is an excellent hunter.

string.body: Unar;A Sentinel patrolling the sky above [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_OP].

string.body: Orhe;A teleporter at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_OP].

string.body: Neior;A Daeva of Medicine at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_OP]. An expert with folk remedies, he is currently working on a new medicine based on Tripeeds.

string.body: Arnkell;A Weapon Merchant in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_OP].

string.body: Feimdal;An Information Officer of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_OP]. He took the job to try and meet powerful and important Daevas.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Frenai
string.body: Frenai;A resident of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_OP]. She used to live in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_D1] but moved to the Fortress for personal reasons.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ipoderr
string.body: Ipoderr;A resident of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_OP]. He thinks kittens are cute.

string.body: Hapenill;A resident standing in front of the general store in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_OP]. She is vain.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Sveinn
string.body: Sveinn;A beggar walking around [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_OP]. He may not have much left, but he's still got his pride.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Bergthora
string.body: Bergthora;A resident of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_OP]. Sometimes when she gets drunk she says things she doesn't mean.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_DF2_1
string.body: Magorinerk;A trade broker in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_OP]. People often think he and Hugorunerk must be brothers because they look so much alike.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_DF2_2
string.body: Hugorunerk;A trade broker in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_OP]. Despite appearances, he's not Magorinerk's brother.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_DF2_5
string.body: Nicoyerk;A general goods merchant in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_OP]. She greets every day with a smile.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_DF2_6
string.body: Bicorunerk;A potion merchant in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_OP]. He dislikes giving discounts.

string.body: Morian;An Archon of Dusk in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_OP].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Otter
string.body: Otis;A Food Merchant in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_OP]. He has some curious superstitions involving rain.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Thrall
string.body: Grall;A warehouse manager at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_OP].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Nott
string.body: Nott;An Administration Officer of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_OP]. He is inside the Nobelium.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Spedor
string.body: Spedor;A trainee practicing his skills under the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_A1_1] in Morheim. He cannot be distracted from his meditations no matter how hard you poke him.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Fathir
string.body: Favyr;A Daeva of Luck found at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_A1_1] in Morheim. He places bets on everything.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Tree_Move_Anoramas
string.body: Anoramas;An Elim at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_A3] in Morheim. He worries when his leaves turn brown.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Tree_Move_Kaindor
string.body: Keindor;An Elim at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_A3] in Morheim. He is willing to do whatever it takes to survive.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Tree_Move_Nabalu
string.body: Nabaru;An Elim at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_A3] in Morheim. His best friend is a Fungie.
