string.body: Vivi;A talking Sprigg near the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_A4] in Morheim. He considers himself a philosopher.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Gundalpun
string.body: Kellan;The owner of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_A3_1] in Morheim. His favorite color used to be gray, but now it's white.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Legalus
string.body: Lorando;He stays at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_A3_1] in Morheim. Though vain, he is an excellent archer.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Lif
string.body: Lif;A Daeva fishing in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_A4] in Morheim. She says that fishing gives her life purpose.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Tofa
string.body: Tofa;A Shadow Executor at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_B1_1] in Morheim. He is something of a know-it-all.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Gelundorf
string.body: Gelundorf;A Sentinel guarding the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_B1_1] in Morheim. He looks out for the little guy.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Seqilund
string.body: Seqilund;A Sentinel guarding the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_B1_1] in Morheim. He puts salt on everything he eats because he says it tastes better.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Jorund
string.body: Jorund;A Sentinel guarding the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_B1_1] in Morheim. He is the kind of person who believes in fairy tales.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Hakon
string.body: Hakon;A Sentinel guarding the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_B1_1] in Morheim. He vacations in Elysea every year so he can relax by killing Elyos.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Grander
string.body: Grander;A flight transporter at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_B1_1] in Morheim.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Aprily
string.body: Aprily;A quartermaster at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_B1_1] in Morheim. She is often teased for having such an Elyos name.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Maxeldor
string.body: Maxeldor;A Soul Healer at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_B1_1] in Morheim.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Fulla
string.body: Cliessa;An Administration Officer at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_B1_1] in Morheim.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_DF2_8
string.body: Orashunerk;A Shugo cook in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_B1_1]. He may be craftier than he seems.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Hermod
string.body: Hermod;A ghost found at a crash site in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_B1] in Morheim. He is as easily confused in death as he was in life.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Kimci
string.body: Kimssi;A dwarf at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_C1] in Morheim. He is hot-tempered and talkative.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_NPC_KimciFriend_1
string.body: Baba Ring;A Skurv traveling with Kimssi. He is enthusiastic but simple-minded.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_NPC_KimciFriend_2
string.body: Baba Pung;A Skurv traveling with Kimssi. He will follow anyone who feeds him his favorite foods.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_NPC_KimciFriend_3
string.body: Baba Tak;A Skurv traveling with Kimssi. He is the fun-loving one.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_NPC_KimciFriend_4
string.body: Baba Tik;A Skurv traveling with Kimssi. Sometimes he says things that make no sense.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_NPC_KimciFriend_5
string.body: Baba Tong;A Skurv traveling with Kimssi. He wants to be Baba Ring's friend.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Utgar
string.body: Utgar;An Archon of Dusk stationed at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_C2] in Morheim. He claims to have many important secret missions.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Embla
string.body: Embla;An Archon of Dusk stationed at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_C2] in Morheim. She is always complaining about the heat.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Gangleri
string.body: Gangleri;A Shadow Executor stationed at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_C2] in Morheim. He is investigating a very important case.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Magni
string.body: Magni;An Elim at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_C3] in Morheim. He became an Agrint but was cured by a bolt of lightning.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_DF2_3
string.body: Padinerk;A member of the Kidorun Grave Robber Band who is cursed to appear in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_C5] only during the day. He is in love with Sarinerk.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_DF2_4
string.body: Sarinerk;A member of the Kidorun Grave Robber Band who is cursed to appear in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_C5] only at night. She is in love with Padinerk.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Tekor
string.body: Tekor;A resident of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_D1] in Morheim. He owns a small Tripeed farm.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Karina
string.body: Karina;A resident of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_D1] in Morheim. She works for Balom.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Mirka
string.body: Mirka;A Centurion of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_D1] in Morheim. She is dedicated to eradicating the Lepharists.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Kamer
string.body: Kamer;A Sentinel patrolling [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_D1] in Morheim. He watched his child grow old after he ascended.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Adhis
string.body: Adhis;A Sentinel patrolling [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_D1] in Morheim. She is sometimes reluctant to carry out her missions.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Rikesh
string.body: Rikesh;A priest of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_D1] in Morheim. She refuses to give in to pressure.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Aktum
string.body: Aktum;A Soul Healer of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_D1] in Morheim. He is a little dumb.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Egrain
string.body: Igraine;A resident of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_D1] in Morheim. She works at the Balom Farm.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Virashak
string.body: Virashak;A resident of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_D1] in Morheim. He taught himself cooking to impress a girl he liked.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Raukus
string.body: Raukus;A Watch member guarding the entrance of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_D1] in Morheim. He resents that Letum was promoted over him.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Mirmak
string.body: Mirmak;A member of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_D1] Watch in Morheim. He is always trying to impress Letum.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Volatis
string.body: Volatis;A member of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_D1] Watch in Morheim. He is always saying bad things about Mirmak.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Contineo
string.body: Contineo;A member of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_D1] Watch in Morheim. He used to own a Tripeed farm, but joined the Watch after his farm went belly-up.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Securis
string.body: Securis;A Watch member guarding the southern entrance of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_D1] in Morheim. He is keenly aware of politics.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Letum
string.body: Letum;The Watch leader of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_D1] in Morheim. She is arrogant and assertive. Some men like that about her.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Balom
string.body: Balom;A resident of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_D1] in Morheim. He is the real power in the village.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Capone
string.body: Cabon;A resident of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_D1] in Morheim. She works at the Balom Farm.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Dezaren
string.body: Dezaren;A resident of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_D1] in Morheim. She is a workaholic.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Kiril
string.body: Kiril;A teleporter in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_D1] in Morheim.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Royaa
string.body: Roya;An Administration Officer of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_D1] in Morheim. She enjoys helping people and solving problems.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Grammati
string.body: Grammati;A General Goods Merchant in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_D1] in Morheim. Her father is a Daeva.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Valumcus
string.body: Valumcus;A Food Merchant in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_D1] in Morheim.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Vetrano
string.body: Vetrano;A resident of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_D1] in Morheim. He blames his fall from grace on Balom.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Bruike
string.body: Bruike;A resident of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_D1] in Morheim.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_DF2_9
string.body: Muorinerk;A Shugo in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_D1] in Morheim. He belongs to the Black Cloud Traders.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_DF2_7
string.body: Barosunerk;A Shugo outside the entrance of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_D1] in Morheim. He belongs to the Black Cloud Traders.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Modgud
string.body: Modgud;A Sentinel stationed at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_D3] in Morheim. He is working on a plan to deal with the Klaws.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Mothir
string.body: Mothir;A Sentinel stationed at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_D3] in Morheim. She enjoys relaxing in hot spring baths.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Gullveig
string.body: Gullveig;A guard of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_E1_1]. She has a strong sense of responsibility.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Angrboda
string.body: Angreboda;A guard at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_E1_1]. She is an exquisite beauty.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Tyr
string.body: Tyr;An Aetheric Field Protector at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_E1_1]. He is an easy-going person and enjoys jokes.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Hreidmar
string.body: Hreidmar;A spirit found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_E1] in Morheim. He guards the Nepra zealously.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF2_NPC_Ananta
string.body: Ananta;An adjutant to Chaikata, the Chieftain of the Silver Mane Tribe. She is hiding at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_E2_1] with the other survivors.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF2_NPC_Chaikata
string.body: Chieftain Chaikata;The Chieftain of the Silver Mane Tribe. He is hiding at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_E2_1], naturally.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF2_NPC_Kuriuta
string.body: Kuriuta;A Mau at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_E2_1] in Morheim. He is a faithful follower of Chaikata.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF2_NPC_BumbumKong
string.body: BuBu Kong;A Skurv at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_E2_1] in Morheim. He is one of the last BuBu tribesmen and is the father of BuBu Pat.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF2_NPC_BumbumPat
string.body: BuBu Pat;A Skurv hiding at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_E2_2] in Morheim. She is too young to understand the serious situation she's in.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF2_NPC_SilverMane_1
string.body: Survivor;A Silver Mane Mau survivor.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Temoji
string.body: Temoji;An Elim at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_E4] in Morheim. He wants vengeance against the Mau.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Taisan
string.body: Taisan;An Elim at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_E4] in Morheim. He has taken the form of a Gnarl in order to survive.

string.body: Guardian Spirit;An ancient Elyos soul wandering about the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_B1] in Morheim.

string.body: Baba Skurv;A Skurv travelling with Kimssi.

string.body: Gelkugin;A Shadow Executor in the Nobelium of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_D1] in Morheim. He is efficient to a fault.

string.body: Bulagan;A Fire Spirit in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_C5] in Morheim. It is a loyal servant of Agnita.

string.body: Agnita;A Daeva of Blaze who used to guard an ancient weapon. She is known to be imprisoned in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_toDF2_DFlame] at the Mt. Musphel in Morheim.

string.body: Gaganti;A Silver Mane Mau imprisoned in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_E4_2] in Morheim.

string.body: Luimerk;A Shugo in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_26] in Altgard.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Medea
string.body: Medea;She lives in a remote house along the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_A2] in Morheim. She claims to be a Daeva of Herbs, but nobody has ever actually seen her gather any herbs.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Jinus
string.body: Jinus;A Soul Healing Master in the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA33]. He is in love with Medea, a spy working deep undercover in Asmodae.

string.body: Purra?;This Tayga cub may be the missing pet belonging to Asgeirr of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_OP].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Kargate_Q2041
string.body: Kargate;A prophet of the Silver Mane Mau. He is inside the Abyss Gate, keeping an eye on the movements of the Balaur.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_DF2_13
string.body: Choirinererk;A Shugo peddler. She enjoys the heat around [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_C2] in Morheim. An insomniac, she keeps odd hours.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Kistig
string.body: Kistig;A Daeva who studied alchemy at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_A3_2] in Morheim until rampaging spirits forced him out. He would like to continue his studies.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Snor
string.body: Sora;A Soul Healer staying at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_A3_1] in Morheim with [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Gundalpun] and [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Legalus]. He insists there is no truth to the rumors.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Vali
string.body: Vali;A Daeva of Plants in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_D1] in Morheim. He has too much book learning and too little practical experience.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Malak
string.body: Malak;A Soul Healer in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_D3] in Morheim. He is curious about everything.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_LF3_12
string.body: Pobinerk;A Changarnerk Trader who was sent to do market research in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_C1] in Heiron. He has a lot to complain about.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ninis
string.body: Ninis;A mysterious sage in Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Flora
string.body: Flora;An astrologer in Sanctum. She is famous for being marvelously accurate.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Dein
string.body: Dein;A Consumable Item Distributor in Pandaemonium. He sells items managed by the city.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Melicertes
string.body: Melicar;A Consumable Item Distributor in Sanctum. He sells items managed by the city.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ias
string.body: Ias;A Daeva visiting Sanctum to help work on Daeva's Day. She's in Elyos Square.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Belenus
string.body: Belenus;A Daeva visiting Pandaemonium to help with the Daeva's Day festival. She's in Pandaemonium Plaza.
