string.name: STR_DIC_N_Gapion
string.body: Garion;A furniture-crafting merchant at Pernon's Furniture Studio.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Nerthus
string.body: Nerita;The Brigade General of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_A]. She is well-respected by everyone who serves under her. She's not too arrogant to party with her soldiers.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Hod
string.body: Hod;An Archon Centurion in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_A]. He has been entrusted with keeping up everybody's morale.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Loki
string.body: Loki;An Archon Centurion in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_A]. He suspects Nerita must be hiding something.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Mani
string.body: Mani;An Archon Centurion in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_A]. She has a very easy-going philosophy.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Rig
string.body: Rig;An Archon Sentinel in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_A]. Nerita trusts his judgment and experience and relies upon him for advice sometimes.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Modi
string.body: Modi;An Archon Sentinel in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_A]. He is determined to succeed on his own merits, not because his father is famous.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Nari
string.body: Nari;An Archon Sentinel guarding the entrance of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_A]. He really looks up to Nerita.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Caris
string.body: Karis;An Archon Sentinel guarding the entrance of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_A]. Her parents were murdered by Lepharists...and now she's out for revenge.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Derin
string.body: Derin;An Archon Sentinel in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_A]. Though she's from Vanahal, she detests the immorality of the privileged.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Efa
string.body: Epa;An Archon Sentinel in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_A]. She got really drunk at Nerita's last party and kept talking about how great she thought Nerita was.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Morwena
string.body: Morwena;An Archon Sentinel walking around [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_A]. She resents being overshadowed by other Daevas' accomplishments.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Nornen
string.body: Nornen;An Archon Sentinel in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_A]. She's served under Nerita before, so she knows how fun that is.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Suteken
string.body: Suteken;An Archon Sentinel in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_A]. He grew up in Besfer and mourns for his hometown.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Grundt
string.body: Grundt;A Protector of Divinity in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_A]. Rumor says he knows what Nerita's keeping secret.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Frigg
string.body: Rogja;A Soul Healer in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_A]. She speaks only if necessary.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Gylfi
string.body: Gylfi;A flight transporter in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_A]. He has a business-like manner.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Tartu
string.body: Tartu;A resident of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_A]. He drinks to forget what happened to him.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Regin
string.body: Regin;A resident of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_A]. He is nervous around Daevas.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ai
string.body: Ai;A resident of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_A]. He has a complicated relationship with Amma.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Afi
string.body: Afi;A resident of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_A]. He Ai's twin brother, and delights in tormenting him.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Fafnir
string.body: Ajelmo;A resident of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_A]. He may have Lepharist sympathies.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Amma
string.body: Amma;A resident of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_A]. She is a complicated woman.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Edda
string.body: Eda;A teleporter in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_A]. She thinks the teleporters' uniform is rather silly.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Gaamel
string.body: Gaamel;An information officer in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_A]. He prides himself on his accurate reporting.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Sturluson
string.body: Sturluson;A weapon merchant in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_A]. He underestimates his skills sometimes.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Kari
string.body: Kari;An armor merchant of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_A]. She runs the family business that she inherited from her grandfather.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Lapion
string.body: Lapion;A general goods merchant in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_A]. She is racist against Shugos.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Lifthrasir
string.body: Lifthrasir;A secretary in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_A]. He doesn't sleep as much as he should.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Mundilfari
string.body: Mundilfari;A potion merchant in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_A]. He always extols the virtues of fresh fruit.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Aurvandil
string.body: Aurvandil;A food merchant in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_A]. He gets a lot of attention from middle-aged ladies.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Gnalin
string.body: Gnalin;An Archon of Dusk in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_A]. Little is known about her because she doesn't have time to chat.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Bestla
string.body: Bestla;A Daeva of Construction who came to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_A] to stop it from collapsing. She studies ancient architecture.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Horu
string.body: Horu;A Daeva of Minerals in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_A]. He has a substantial rock collection.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Dristan
string.body: Droston;A warehouse manager at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_A]. He has a business-like manner.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Govanon
string.body: Govanon;An administration officer in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_A]. He likes trees.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Lewin
string.body: Lewin;An administration officer in the Nobelium of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_A]. She has nice hair.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Elli
string.body: Leanor;A resident of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_A]. She says was once a famous beauty.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_DF3_1
string.body: Agerunerk;A trade broker in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_A]. He is business-like.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_DF3_2
string.body: Magarinerk;A trade broker in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_A]. His secret desire is to swim in a giant pool filled with Kinah.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_DF3_6
string.body: Naironerk;A Quairerk Trader in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_A]. He is not as good at his job as everybody thinks he is.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Trista
string.body: Tristran;A Shadow Judge dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_A]. She has a no-nonsense attitude.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Cadoc
string.body: Cadoc;A Manastone remover of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_A]. HP Manastones are his favorite kind of Manastone.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Paeru
string.body: Paeru;A orphan in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_A]. Leanor takes care of him.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_DF3_10
string.body: Zhayorerk;A Shugo at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_C3_2] in Beluslan. When you scold him, he folds his ears back and twitches his nose.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_DF3_11
string.body: Guanyerk;A Shugo at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_C3_2]. A natural-born grave robber, some say he can smell treasure.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_DF3_12
string.body: Huarinrinerk;A Shugo at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_C3_2]. She has a keen eye for valuables.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_DF3_7
string.body: Jikurunerk;A branch manager of the Quairerk Traders at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_D1], near [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_D1_2] in Beluslan. He dislikes his subordinates.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_DF3_8
string.body: Gomurinerk;A Shugo of the Quairerk Traders at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_D1_2], near [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_D1] in Beluslan. He has a rather laid-back philosophy for a Shugo.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_DF3_9
string.body: Kamochinicherk;A Shugo at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_D1_2]. She is highly motivated to succeed.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Angwin
string.body: Angwin;An Archon Sentinel at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_D1_2]. She gets sick easily.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Geirod
string.body: Geirod;A Sentinel at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_D1_2]. He hates doing more work than he has to.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Etun
string.body: Etun;An Elim at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_D1_2]. He struggles to survive in the cold ground.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Kistenian
string.body: Kistenian;A Daeva of Flame at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_D1_2]. He has been assigned to melt and restore the frozen city to its former glory.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Tafi
string.body: Tafi;A Daeva of Flame at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_D1_2]. He's been testing out ghost-killing techniques.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Briana
string.body: Briana;A Daeva of Flame at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_D1_2]. She has had some bad experiences with Shugos.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Vonduca
string.body: Vonduca;The Leader of the Watch at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_E1]. She was chosen by popular demand.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Benyar
string.body: Benyar;A member of the Watch at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_E1]. He believes Humans should defend themselves.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Auhumla
string.body: Auhumla;A resident of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_E1] in Beluslan. She is afraid of dying.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Furiga
string.body: Furiga;A food merchant at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_E1] in Beluslan. She has to make do with a lack of ingredients.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Angr
string.body: Angr;A member of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_E1] Watch in Beluslan. He has learned some valuable lessons.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Baugi
string.body: Baugi;A member of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_E1] Watch in Beluslan. He is hiding from his past.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ocho
string.body: Ocho;A worthless member of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_E1] Watch in Beluslan. He doesn't even know how to swing a sword. He may as well just be a waste of food.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Denarynt
string.body: Denarynt;A resident of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_E1] in Beluslan. She left behind a life of luxury.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ladamantrun
string.body: Ladamantrun;A researcher at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_E1] in Beluslan. He helps Rubelik's research because he hopes it'll advance his own career.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Rubelik
string.body: Rubelik;An archeologist at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_E1] in Beluslan. He's not interested in the refugees, only the Seiren relics.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Morhen
string.body: Morhen;A priest at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_E1] in Beluslan. He does menial labor to help out the refugees.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Rotenan
string.body: Rotenan;A child in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_E1] in Beluslan. He's in shock after being attacked by his undead father.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Midheim
string.body: Midheim;A resident of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_E1] in Beluslan. She is thankful for the Watch's protection.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Rerua
string.body: Rerua;A resident of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_E1] in Beluslan. She complains because she is old.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Kunbernan
string.body: Kunbernan;A flight transporter in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_E1] in Beluslan. He thinks his uniform makes him popular with the ladies.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Karabe
string.body: Karabe;A Soul Healer in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_E1] in Beluslan. She shows concern even for the dead.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Lug
string.body: Lug;A Manastone remover in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_E1] in Beluslan. He is a card-carring member of the Manastone Removers Association.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Sleipnirr
string.body: Sleipnir;An Archon Centurion dispatched to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_E1] in Beluslan. He sometimes feels the refugees aren't very bright.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Noarynt
string.body: Noarynt;An Archon Sentinel dispatched to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_E1] in Beluslan. She has her hands full.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Baredo
string.body: Baredo;An Archon Sentinel dispatched to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_E1] in Beluslan. He loathes the Balaur.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Cinnia
string.body: Cinnia;An administration officer dispatched to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_E1] in Beluslan. She is very enthusiastic.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Coventina
string.body: Coventina;An administration officer dispatched to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_E1] in Beluslan. She doesn't enjoy her job.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_DF3_5
string.body: Reyrinirerk;A general goods merchant at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_E1]. She was sent there when her father discovered she'd been embezzling from the Quairerk Traders.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Valboner
string.body: Valconor;The ghost of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_E2_2] keeper.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF3_NPC_Irlein
string.body: Irelein;A Seiren on Calderon Hill. Nobody knows what a Seiren would want at a place like that.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Onelr
string.body: Kettar;A Mau researcher at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_F] in Beluslan. She respects the Mau as equals.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Borvo
string.body: Borvo;A Red Mane Shaman at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_F] in Beluslan. She knows many secret remedies.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Boudica
string.body: Boudica;A flight transporter at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_F] in Beluslan. She is business-like.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Lint
string.body: Lint;A Soul Healer at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_F] in Beluslan. She really cares about peoples' souls.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF3_NPC_Akigatan
string.body: Chieftain Akagitan;A Mau at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_F] in Beluslan. He is concerned about the future of the land and his people.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF3_NPC_Nargital
string.body: Nargatal;A Mau at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_F] in Beluslan. She is Akagitan's wife and wishes she could bear him an heir.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Freyja
string.body: Freyja;An Archon Centurion dispatched to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_F] in Beluslan. She wants to make a name for herself.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Savrina
string.body: Savrina;An Shadow Executor dispatched to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_F] in Beluslan. She used to specialize in counter-Balaur operations.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Rith
string.body: Ritenon;A Manastone Remover at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_F] in Beluslan. He has taken the job of removing Manastones because he doesn't like fighting.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Yoltmund
string.body: Yoltmund;An Archon of Dusk at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_F] in Beluslan. He was dispatched there at Thor's request.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Maponus
string.body: Maponus;An administration officer dispatched to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_F] in Beluslan. He feels his career's taken a turn for the worse lately.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Art
string.body: Art;An administration officer dispatched to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_F] in Beluslan. Despite his name, he does not love art.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF3_NPC_Laksyatil
string.body: Laksyatil;A Red Mane healer at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_F] in Beluslan. He knows many ancient Mau secrets.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF3_NPC_BabaKun
string.body: Baba Kun;A food merchant at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_F] in Beluslan. He loves Human food.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF3_NPC_BabaHun
string.body: Baba Hun;A general goods merchant at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_F] in Beluslan. He has strange ways of talking.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF3_NPC_LycanWarrior
string.body: Mau Fighter;A Mau at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_F] in Beluslan.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF3_NPC_LycanHunter
string.body: Mau Hunter;A Mau at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_F] in Beluslan.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Thor
string.body: Thor;Brigade General of the Drakan Punisher Legion, stationed at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_F]. He is a warrior without peer and has personally killed two thousand Balaur.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Delris
string.body: Delris;A Drakan Punisher adjutant at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_F] in Beluslan. She likes to charge directly into battle without thinking of the consequences.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Mostin
string.body: Mostin;A Drakan Punisher Legionary at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_F] in Beluslan. She loves reading and reads all the time. She's been an avid reader ever since she was three.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Epona
string.body: Epona;A Drakan Punisher Legionary at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_F] in Beluslan. She is quite the gossip, but you can't believe a word she says.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Peredur
string.body: Peredur;A Drakan Punisher Legionary at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_F] in Beluslan. Nobody's ever heard him say more than three sentences in a row.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Bowen
string.body: Bowen;A Drakan Punisher Legionary at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_F] in Beluslan. He has as many scars from cooking as from battle.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Methorn
string.body: Methorn;A Drakan Punisher Legionary at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_F] in Beluslan. He is an arrogant fool.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Skirnir
string.body: Skirnir;A Drakan Punisher Legionary at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_F] in Beluslan. He has little luck in love, but he never gives up searching for that special girl.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Dewi
string.body: Dewi;A spy at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_G2_5] in Beluslan. You'd better not tell anybody he's a spy or he'll be in trouble.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Betoni
string.body: Betoni;A ghost near the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_G2_3] in Beluslan. He failed in his duty to protect the Observatory.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF3_NPC_Hasyaditan
string.body: Hasyaditan;The Hoarfrost Chieftain, hiding at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_G2_3] in Beluslan. He seeks revenge on the Balaur for betraying his tribe.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF3_NPC_Arita
string.body: Arita;A Mau at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_G2_3] in Beluslan. After her tribe was betrayed by the Balaur, she developed some trust issues.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF3_NPC_Hikan
string.body: Hikan;A Mau hiding at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_G2_3] in Beluslan. He doesn't fully trust the Asmodians.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF3_NPC_Molota
string.body: Molota;A Mau shaman at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_G2_3] in Beluslan. She would do anything for her cubs.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Gwendolin
string.body: Gwendolin;The soul of the Aetheric Field Protector at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_G6_2]. She finds that being a ghost has its advantages.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_DF3_3
string.body: Mogironerk;A hard-to-find Shugo.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_DF3_13
string.body: Luurinerk;A Shugo at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_C3_2]. He says he is good at hiding, but in reality, everybody ignores him because he's boring.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Sorgrim
string.body: Sorgrim;An Archon dispatched to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_B_2] in Beluslan. He was sent there directly after he got back from a tour of duty in the Abyss, so he's a little cranky.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Svera
string.body: Svera;A priest dispatched to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_B_2] in Beluslan. She doesn't like grandstanding Daevas who reject menial tasks.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Stua
string.body: Stua;A spy at the Lepharist [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_C6_5] in Beluslan. Be careful not to blow her cover when you're talking to her, okay?

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Gigrite
string.body: Gigrite;A Protector of Divinity dispatched to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_B_2] in Beluslan. She tries to keep her reptile phobia secret, but everybody knows.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Gark
string.body: Gark;A Sprigg hiding in a corner of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_C1] in Beluslan. It is scared and hungry

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Alfgeir
string.body: Alfgeir;An Archon dispatched to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_B_2] in Beluslan. He enjoys his work.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Q2564A
string.body: Yarl;A Daeva of Flame at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_D1] in Beluslan. He rarely loses his temper.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Q2564B
string.body: Scoll;A Daeva of Flame at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_D1] in Beluslan. He is very sensitive and emotionally unstable.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Q2564C
string.body: Hefring;A Daeva of Flame at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_D1] in Beluslan. She is unhappy with the progress on melting the city.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Eldir
string.body: Eldir;A torch keeper at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_E1] in Beluslan. He takes his work very seriously.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Siegfried
string.body: Siegfried;A smart adjutant dispatched to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_F]. Epona says he has a thing for Delris, but you can't really believe her gossip.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Svafnir
string.body: Svafnir;A Centurion dispatched to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_G2_3] in Beluslan. He went from being a Mau scholar to an ambassador to the Mau.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Vanargand
string.body: Vanargand;A talking Granker in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_C2]. It doesn't like Asmodians.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Atla
string.body: Atla;A prisoner in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_G4_3]. She was kidnapped from Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Himmel
string.body: Hammel;A Lepharist prisoner held in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_A]. He stubbornly refuses to talk, but maybe he just hasn't been...properly persuaded.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_Fafner
string.body: Fafner;A spy who infiltrated [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_H] disguised as a Drakie.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_DF3_NPC_Mukaditan
string.body: Mukaditan;A Mau turncoat at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_G6] in Beluslan.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_DF3_NPC_Kalitan
string.body: Kalitan;A Red Mane Mau guarding the crossroad between the Red Mane Cavern and the Fang Troll Encampment in Beluslan.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_NPC_Lethe
string.body: Lethe;A spy inside the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_G4] in Beluslan.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_NPC_Stein
string.body: Strahein;A peasant who disappeared, leaving his son all alone. He may be held in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_G4].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ripley
string.body: Ripley;A Balaur prisoner who escaped from captivity. She hides in a forgotten section of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_H].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_DF3_4
string.body: Gamorinerk;An elusive Shugo.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Freki
string.body: Freki;A renegade Lepharist hiding at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_C3_3] in Beluslan.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_NPC_Debrie_Hild
string.body: Hild;A curious Ribbit sometimes seen in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_C3_3] in Beluslan.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Byggvir
string.body: Vigbir;A suspicious old man who can be seen lurking around the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_C3_3] in Beluslan.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Hresvelgr
string.body: Hresvelgr;A disciple of Munin at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_G2_3] in Beluslan. He obeys his master's wishes in all regards.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Juditio
string.body: Yuditio;An explosives specialist at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add5] at Teminon Landing. He's new to the field, but eager to learn.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Taranis
string.body: Michalis;The Governor of Reshanta, at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_2]. He is an austere and serious man, yet always willing to train a new Daeva.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Sakmis
string.body: Sakmis;The Brigade General of the Gray Wind Legion stationed at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_2]. She has no patience for distractions.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ascalon
string.body: Calon;The Brigade General of the Nezekan's Shield Legion stationed at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_2]. He has a great passion for fine blades.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Nereus
string.body: Nereus;A Centurion of the Gray Wind Legion stationed at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add1] in Reshanta. He values practicality over formality.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Euros
string.body: Eulos;An Abyss training instructor at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add1] in Reshanta. He instructs troops on the Abyss and the fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Erinyes
string.body: Erienne;A Centurion of the Gray Wind Legion at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add3]. She has broken many mens' hearts.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Soniksius
string.body: Soniksius;A Centurion of the Nezekan's Shield Legion at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add4]. He is obsessed with his appearance.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Cesilie
string.body: Cesilie;A Centurion of Nezekan's Shield Legion at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add4]. Her hardworking ways make her a rising star in the Legion.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Moia
string.body: Moia;A Soul Healer at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_2]. She is infamous for her strict ways.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Izelda
string.body: Izelda;A Teleporter at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_1] in Reshanta.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Tellus
string.body: Tellus;A Teleporter at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_1] in Reshanta.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Denegos
string.body: Denegos;A General Goods Merchant in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_2]. He came to the Abyss to try and make it big.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Zeth
string.body: Zeth;A Potion Merchant in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_2]. He is working on a good advertising slogan.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Obel
string.body: Obel;A warehouse manager on the second floor of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_2] in Reshanta. He became a skeptic after losing all his family in the past. He doesn't believe there is any meaning to life.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Lucius
string.body: Lucius;A Weapon Merchant in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_2]. Rumor has it he sells black-market goods.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Minon
string.body: Minon;An Armor Merchant in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_2]. He is a devout servant of Aion.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Flavius
string.body: Flavius;A Shield Merchant in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_2]. He has an obsession with shields. His favorite pasttime is to polish shields until they shine, then line them up and admire them.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Tenoeril
string.body: Tenoeril;A Food Merchant in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_2]. She is an optimist. She came to the Abyss in the hope of ascending as a Daeva.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Lasendi
string.body: Lasendi;A Manastone Remover in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_2] in Reshanta.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Makidna
string.body: Makidna;A combat Administration Officer in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_2] in Reshanta.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Magnus
string.body: Magnus;A magic Administration Officer in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_2] in Reshanta.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Achelos
string.body: Achelos;A combat Administration Officer in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_2] in Reshanta.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Melpomene
string.body: Melpomene;A magic Administration Officer in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_2] in Reshanta.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_AB1_L2
string.body: Ikarinerk;A trade broker in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_2] in Reshanta. He is [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Shugo_AB1_L1]'s husband.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_AB1_L1
string.body: Nayorinerk;A trade broker [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_2] in Reshanta. She is [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Shugo_AB1_L2]'s wife.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Lavinia
string.body: Lavinia;A warehouse manager on the second floor of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_2] in Reshanta.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Evander
string.body: Evander;A Protector of Teminon Legionary in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_2]. He is a by-the-book kind of soldier.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Hecabe
string.body: Hecabe;A Protector of Teminon Legionary guarding the entrance of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_2]. She is a perfectionist.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Eurytion
string.body: Eurytion;A Protector of Teminon Legionary at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_2] in Reshanta. He often gives backhanded complements.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Akastos
string.body: Akastos;A Protector of Teminon Legionary at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_2] in Reshanta. He is hoping to climb up the social ladder by fawning upon [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Taranis].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Akuba
string.body: Akuba;A Protector of Teminon Legionary at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_2] in Reshanta. He is fascinated by the beauty of the Abyss.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Puella
string.body: Puella;A Protector of Teminon Legionary at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_2] in Reshanta. She is a cynic.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ventus
string.body: Ventus;An Information Officer at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_2] in Reshanta. He worries that the Asmodians may have spies in Elysea.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Rentia
string.body: Rentia;An Information Officer at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_2] in Reshanta. She shows great compassion for others.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Terita
string.body: Terita;An Abyss messenger who delivers messages between [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_2] and [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add2] in Reshanta. She is quite a show-off.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Maius
string.body: Maius;An Abyss messenger at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_2] in Reshanta. He is needlessly superstitious.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Nani
string.body: Nani;A Protector of Divinity at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_2] in Reshanta. She is unquestioningly faithful.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Nalis
string.body: Nalis;A Protector of Teminon Legionary at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_2] in Reshanta. He used to be a flamboyant playboy, but settled down after ascending.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Aries
string.body: Aries;A Protector of Teminon Legionary at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_2] in Reshanta. He has no ambition. He just wants to go wherever the wind blows.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ara
string.body: Ara;A priest at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_2] in Reshanta. She has a habit of pretending to know everything.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Grus
string.body: Grus;A priest at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_2] in Reshanta. He does whatever [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Nani] tells him to do.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Virgo
string.body: Virgo;A Protector of Teminon Legionary at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_2] in Reshanta. He hasn't given up his dreams of becoming a bard.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Trian
string.body: Trian;A Protector of Teminon Legionary at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_2] in Reshanta. He is a typical soldier.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Rupus
string.body: Rupus;A Protector of Teminon Legionary at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_2]. He keeps hoping he'll be next in line for a promotion, but it's always somebody else. It's never Rupus.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Adellian
string.body: Adellian;A Protector of Teminon Legionary at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_2] in Reshanta. He really wants to serve in Verteron.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Amos
string.body: Amos;A Protector of Teminon Legionary patrolling [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_2] in Reshanta. He is gruff and abrasive.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Anika
string.body: Anika;A Protector of Teminon Legionary patrolling [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_2] in Reshanta. She has a crush on [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Amos], but he doesn't feel the same way.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Rastin
string.body: Rastin;A Protector of Teminon Legionary at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add2]. He is homesick for Eltnen and tired of the Abyss.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Arvid
string.body: Arvid;A Protector of Teminon Legionary at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add2]. He enjoys the excitement of battle.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Barono
string.body: Barono;A Protector of Teminon Legionary at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add2]. He is always hungry.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Belita
string.body: Belita;A Protector of Teminon Legionary at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add2]. She is looking for some new friends.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Bonitra
string.body: Bonitra;A Protector of Teminon Legionary patrolling the area between Taris Plaza and [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add3]. She's been at it a long time.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Bliss
string.body: Siunatu;A Protector of Teminon Legionary patrolling the area between [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add2] and [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add4]. His family hopes he'll become famous.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Caranos
string.body: Caranos;A Protector of Teminon Legionary patrolling the area between [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add2] and [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_2].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Claudia
string.body: Claudia;A quartermaster at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add3]. She has a strong sense of responsibility.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Clatanan
string.body: Clatanan;A quartermaster at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add3]. He hopes to stay out of battle.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Cymaon
string.body: Cymaon;A quartermaster at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add3]. He uses his position to his advantage.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Dellaron
string.body: Dellaron;A Protector of Teminon Legionary at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add3]. He is all talk and no action.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Darios
string.body: Darios;A Protector of Teminon Legionary at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add3]. He's concerned about [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Dellaron]'s carefree laziness.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Dinoes
string.body: Chrioz;A Nezekan Shield Legionary at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add4]. He has a lot on his mind.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Radone
string.body: Radone;A Nezekan's Shield Legionary at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add4]. She fights passionately in battle.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Elintos
string.body: Elintos;A Nezekan's Shield Legionary at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add4].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Elsana
string.body: Elsana;A Nezekan's Shield Legionary at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add4]. She is rethinking her life.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Pellatino
string.body: Pellatino;A Nezekan's Shield Legionary at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add4]. He misses the family he left behind.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Pleta
string.body: Pleta;A Nezekan's Shield Legionary at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add4]. He is a new recruit.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Grania
string.body: Grania;A Nezekan's Shield Legionary at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add4]. A calm soldier who quietly encourages other Legionaries.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Teres
string.body: Teres;A Nezekan's Shield Legionary at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add4]. She has little tolerance for others' mistakes.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Erysiphe
string.body: Erysiphe;A work supervisor at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add5]. She is harried by her deadlines.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Recondita
string.body: Recondita;A construction site worker at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add5]. She is afraid of the Balaur.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Horia
string.body: Horia;A construction site worker at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add5]. She's bland and unassuming.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Poma
string.body: Poma;A construction site worker at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add5]. He feels pity toward [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Horia] and [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Recondita], and treats them well.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Halonas
string.body: Halonas;A construction site worker at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add5]. He is strong and does good work.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_AB1_L3
string.body: Nagunerk;A Shugo worker at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add5].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_AB1_L4
string.body: Jominerk;A Shugo worker at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add5].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Sileni
string.body: Sileni;An Abyss training instructor at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add1] in Reshanta. She teaches about Aetheric Fields.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Adrastea
string.body: Adrastea;An Abyss training instructor at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add1] in Reshanta. She teaches about Castle Gates.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Lachesis
string.body: Lachesis;An Abyss training instructor at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add1] in Reshanta. She teaches about Guardian Generals.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Endaion
string.body: Erdias;An Abyss training instructor at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add1] in Reshanta. He teaches about artifacts.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Genius
string.body: Jenirius;An Abyss training instructor at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add1] in Reshanta. He teaches about Kisks.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Larentia
string.body: Larentia;An Abyss training instructor at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add1] in Reshanta. She teaches about the Dredgion.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Glaucos
string.body: Glaucos;An Abyss Contribution Recordkeeper on the first floor of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_2] in Reshanta. He manages weapons.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Nerites
string.body: Nerites;An Abyss Contribution Recordkeeper on the first floor of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_2] in Reshanta. He manages armor.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Deucalion
string.body: Deucalion;An Abyss Contribution Recordkeeper on the first floor of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_2] in Reshanta. He manages consumables.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Menoetios
string.body: Menoetios;An Abyss Contribution Recordkeeper on the first floor of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_2] in Reshanta. He manages accessories.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Tiberius
string.body: Tiberius;An Abyss layer teleporter on the upper level of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_56] in Reshanta.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Elaione
string.body: Elaione;A Protector of Teminon Legionary on the upper layer of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_56] in Reshanta.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Aleromia
string.body: Aleromia;A Protector of Teminon Legionary on the upper layer of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_56] in Reshanta.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Apnis
string.body: Apnis;A Protector of Teminon Legionary on the upper layer of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_56] in Reshanta.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Clinestra
string.body: Clinestra;A Protector of Teminon Legionary on the upper layer of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_56] in Reshanta.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Echo
string.body: Echo;An Abyss layer teleporter on the lower layer of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_56] in Reshanta.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Climis
string.body: Climis;A Protector of Teminon Legionary on the lower layer of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_56] in Reshanta. He is exhausted.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Kanomene
string.body: Kanomene;A Protector of Teminon Legionary on the lower layer of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_56] in Reshanta. Sometimes she gets strange feelings.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ineias
string.body: Ineias;A Protector of Teminon Legionary on the lower layer of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_56] in Reshanta. He wants a transfer.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Aread
string.body: Aread;A Protector of Teminon Legionary on the lower layer of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_56] in Reshanta. He hasn't seen Asmodians before.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Theon
string.body: Theon;An Abyss layer teleporter on the upper layer of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_57] in Reshanta. He is friends with [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Septimus].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Medais
string.body: Medais;A guard on the upper layer of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_57] in Reshanta. He is a sincere person.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ere
string.body: Delilah;A Protector of Teminon Legionary on the upper layer of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_57] in Reshanta. She's secretly hoping the Asmodians will attack soon.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Elian
string.body: Elian;A Protector of Teminon Legionary on the upper layer of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_57] in Reshanta.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Meladi
string.body: Meladi;A Protector of Teminon Legionary on the upper layer of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_57] in Reshanta. She can't wait to get her hands on the Asmodians.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Septimus
string.body: Septimus;An Abyss layer teleporter on the lower layer of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_57] in Reshanta. He is friends with [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Theon].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Hikelen
string.body: Hikelen;A Protector of Teminon Legionary on the lower layer of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_57] in Reshanta. He and [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Luciris] hate each other's guts.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Luciris
string.body: Luciris;A Protector of Teminon Legionary on the lower layer of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_57] in Reshanta. He and [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Hikelen] hate each other.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Metna
string.body: Metna;A Protector of Teminon Legionary on the lower layer of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_57] in Reshanta. She thinks the feud between [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Hikelen] and [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Luciris] is pathetic.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Masaia
string.body: Masaia;A Protector of Teminon Legionary on the lower layer of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_57] in Reshanta. She is devoted to her job.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Nemea
string.body: Nemea;A Daeva of Flame on the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_6] in Reshanta. She is studying the local wildlife.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Nike
string.body: Kenia;A Nezekan's Shield Legionary on the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_6] in Reshanta. She lost a lot of friends to the Dredgion.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Dactyl
string.body: Dactyl;A Nezekan's Shield Legionary on the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_6] in Reshanta. He is spirited.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Deidamia
string.body: Deidamia;An archaeologist at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_25] in Reshanta. She was dispatched by Sanctum to study the Abyss.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Lamia
string.body: Lamia;An ecologist at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_25] in Reshanta. She was dispatched by Sanctum to investigate the Abyss.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_AB1_L7
string.body: Tienshunerk;A Black Cloud Trader at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_25]. He is quite fearless for a Shugo.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Labdacus
string.body: Ladacus;A cursed Guardian at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add11] in Reshanta. He was cursed for disobeying orders.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Chrysaor
string.body: Chrysaor;A Centurion of the Nezekan's Shield Legion at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_26]. He looks to the future.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Damathus
string.body: Damathus;An adjutant of the Nezekan's Shield Legion at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_26]. He enjoys sunbathing.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Luna
string.body: Luna;A Nezekan's Shield Legionary at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_26]. You used to know her, it seems.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Naibera
string.body: Naibera;A Nezekan's Shield Legionary at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_26]. She is determined to retake the fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Liber
string.body: Liber;A Nezekan's Shield Legionary at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_26]. He's highly excitable.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Laius
string.body: Laius;A Centurion of the Gray Wind Legion at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_24]. He dislikes the Nezekan's Shield Legion.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Rodementhes
string.body: Rodementhes;An adjutant of the Gray Wind Legion at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_24]. He is somewhat naive.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Salii
string.body: Salii;A Gray Wind Legionary at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_24]. He has many complaints about [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Laius].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Satyr
string.body: Satyr;A Gray Wind Legionary at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_24]. He is an optimist in all things.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ruth
string.body: Ruth;A Gray Wind Legionary at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_24].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Livy
string.body: Livius;A scout of the Gray Wind Legion at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add13]. He seems cold but is actually compassionate.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Mercus
string.body: Mercus;A scout of the Gray Wind Legion at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add13]. He is a light sleeper.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_AB1_L5
string.body: Sierinererk;A Shugo of the Wind Breeze Shop at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add16]. She is a pacifist.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_AB1_L6
string.body: Sohonerk;A Shugo of the Wind Breeze Shop at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add16]. He is obsessed with Cubes.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Garpedo
string.body: Garpedo;A Protector of Teminon Legionary at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add16]. He wants the war to end.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Aimele
string.body: Aimele;A Protector of Teminon Legionary at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add16]. She is calm and cautious.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Sione
string.body: Sione;A Protector of Teminon Legionary at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add16]. She is always asking questions.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Menelaus
string.body: Menelaus;A Centurion of the Nezekan's Shield Legion at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_35]. He always keeps up on Sanctum politics.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Lyaeus
string.body: Lyaeus;An adjutant of the Nezekan's Shield Legion at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_35]. Though he always complains, he still does his job.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Myrrha
string.body: Myrrha;A Nezekan's Shield Legionary at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_35]. Her favorite motto is, "Enjoy it if you can't avoid it".

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Leager
string.body: Leager;A Nezekan's Shield Legionary at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_35].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Mors
string.body: Mors;A Nezekan's Shield Legionary at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_35]. He enjoys putting himself in dangerous situations.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Monerva
string.body: Minerva;A Centurion of the Gray Wind Legion at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_28].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Metis
string.body: Metis;An adjutant of the Gray Wind Legion at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_28]. She is very career-minded.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Baucis
string.body: Baucis;A Gray Wind Legionary at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_28]. He is in shock over his comrade's Vanishment.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Belus
string.body: Belus;A Gray Wind Legionary at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_28]. He has a crush on [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Monerva] and wants to know everything about her.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Sarpedon
string.body: Sarpedon;A Gray Wind Legionary at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_28].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Bellona
string.body: Bellona;A Centurion of the Protector of Teminon Legion at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_34]. She is a capable officer.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Battus
string.body: Battus;An adjutant of the Protector of Teminon Legion at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_34]. He is a young adjutant who has a strong sense of camaraderie.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Luptinai
string.body: Luptini;A Protector of Teminon Legionary at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_34]. She enjoys simple pleasures.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Bromius
string.body: Bromius;A Protector of Teminon Legionary at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_34]. He doesn't care much about promotions.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Vergil
string.body: Vergilius;A Protector of Teminon Legionary at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_34]. He is [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Bliss]'s father.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Lycian
string.body: Lycian;An archaeologist at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add15]. He is a genius scholar, but his everyday life is a mess.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Matuta
string.body: Matuta;An assistant of the archaeologist at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_51]. She looks after [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Lycian].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Saturn
string.body: Saturn;An Ancient Protector near the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_49] in Reshanta.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ab1_1011_Quest_Li
string.body: Hypnos;A Staff Operation Officer at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_46] in Reshanta.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ab1_1131_Quest_Li
string.body: Okeanos;A Staff Operation Officer at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_23] in Reshanta.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ab1_1132_Quest_Li
string.body: Iapetos;A Staff Operation Officer at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_20] in Reshanta.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ab1_1141_Quest_Li
string.body: Pontus;A Staff Operation Officer at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_13] in Reshanta.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ab1_1211_Quest_Li
string.body: Hemera;A Staff Operation Officer at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_49] in Reshanta.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ab1_Aiter
string.body: Raithor;A Daeva who has been missing in the Abyss since he went for a test flight.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ab1_1221_Quest_Li
string.body: Moirai;A Staff Operation Officer at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_33] in Reshanta.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ab1_1231_Quest_Li
string.body: Musai;A Staff Operation Officer at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_37] in Reshanta.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ab1_1241_Quest_Li
string.body: Taigeta;A Staff Operation Officer at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_30] in Reshanta.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ab1_1251_Quest_Li
string.body: Euridice;A Staff Operation Officer at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_43] in Reshanta.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ab1_1141_Light_28_An
string.body: Captured Elyos Prisoner;A captive in a prison camp on the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_15]. He is only imprisoned when the Balaur or Asmodians have captured Sulfur Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_AB1_1
string.body: Kohrunerk;A Black Cloud Trader at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_59] in Reshanta. He has many secrets.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_AB1_2
string.body: Garkbinerk;A Black Cloud Trader at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_59] in Reshanta. She may appear naive, but don't be fooled.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_AB1_3
string.body: Jakurerk;A Black Cloud Trader at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_59] in Reshanta. He is a Warg enthusiast.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_AB1_4
string.body: Gufrinerk;A Black Cloud port worker at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_59] in Reshanta. He feels decieved.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_AB1_5
string.body: Javirunerk;A Black Cloud airship captain at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_59] in Reshanta.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_AB1_6
string.body: Jielinlinerk;A Black Cloud Trader at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_59] in Reshanta. A capable and experienced sailor who can do any task given.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_AB1_11
string.body: Chieninenerk;A General Goods Merchant at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_59] in Reshanta. She is a hardworking merchant.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ab1_Shugo_pet
string.body: Trader's Bodyguard;A Troll guarding the Black Cloud Traders at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_59] in Reshanta.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Tree_moving_Triminos
string.body: Triminos;An Elim at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_9] in Reshanta. He came to the Abyss during the Cataclysm.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_AB1_7
string.body: Vindachinerk;The master of all cube makers, he learned his art from Lord Israphel. He hides to protect his secrets, but rumors say that he sometimes appears in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_48] area.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_AB1_8
string.body: Minonerk;A Shugo at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_44] in Reshanta. He is a pupil of Vindachinerk.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_AB1_9
string.body: Junjunbinerk;A Shugo at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_40] in Reshanta. She is a pupil of Vindachinerk. She believes she will be his successor.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_AB1_10
string.body: Kuenunerk; A Shugo of the Kidorun Grave Robber Band at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_51] in the lower part of Reshanta. He is strongly assertive.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_AB1_12
string.body: Jarumonerk;A Shugo of the Tigraki Workshop at [%dic:STR_DIC_E_AB1_name] in Reshanta. He is a superb craftsman who takes great pride in his work.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_AB1_13
string.body: Agemonerk;A Shugo of the Tigraki Workshop at [%dic:STR_DIC_E_AB1_name] in Reshanta. He likes to show off his knowledge.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_AB1_14
string.body: Gaochinerk;A Shugo of the Tigraki Workshop at [%dic:STR_DIC_E_AB1_name] in Reshanta. He is arrogant.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_AB1_15
string.body: Guuminerk; A Shugo merchant of the Tigraki Studio at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_1] in Reshanta.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_AB1_16
string.body: Sienrurerk; A Shugo merchant of the Tigraki Studio at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_3] in Reshanta.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_AB1_17
string.body: Nukurinerk;A Shugo of the Tigraki Workshop in Reshanta. He travels to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_36], [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_29], and [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_32] to procure materials for the Tigraki Workshop.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ab1_NPC_LugBug
string.body: Lugbug;A huge [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Ab1_NPC_Leibo_1] on [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add20] in Reshanta.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ab1_NPC_Leibo_1
string.body: Leibo;Mysterious creatures thought to be somehow associated with the Tower of Eternity. There are many of them at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add20] in Reshanta.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Votan
string.body: Votan;The Governor of Reshanta, at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_4]. He is a legendary strategist who killed many Elyos heroes as he worked his way up through the ranks.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Garvages
string.body: Jebal;The Brigade General of the Thunder Shout Legion at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_4]. He is full of bluster.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Herz
string.body: Hisui;The Brigade General of the Red Hasia Legion at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_4]. She is a stickler for rules.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Lasanya
string.body: Lisya;A Centurion of the Red Hasia Legion at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add6]. She delights in making the Elyos suffer.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Semotor
string.body: Semotor;A Centurion of the Red Hasia Legion at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add9]. He would like to see more action.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Andraste
string.body: Andraste;A Centurion of the Thunder Shout Legion at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add8]. She risks Vanishment in the Abyss for the thrill of it.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Lakadi
string.body: Lakadi;A Centurion of the Thunder Shout Legion at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add8]. He hopes to be considered for promotion.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ahin
string.body: Ahin;A Soul Healer on the second floor of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_4] in Reshanta. She has a nice personality.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Kepin
string.body: Keffin;A teleporter at Primum Landing in Reshanta.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Brialen
string.body: Briallen;A Teleporter at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add7] of Primum Landing in Reshanta. He is a sincere person.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Siana
string.body: Siana;A General Goods Merchant on the second floor of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_4] in Reshanta. She has the business sense of a Shugo.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Koag
string.body: Koag;A Potion Merchant on the second floor of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_4] in Reshanta. There is a rumor that he makes experimental potions and tests them on unsuspecting customers.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Kirhenjar
string.body: Kirhenzar;A warehouse manager on the first floor of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_4] in Reshanta. He is scared of the Abyss but was dragged there by his stubborn wife.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Fraiban
string.body: Fraiban;A Weapon Merchant on the first floor of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_4] in Reshanta. He is bad at running a store and will probably go bankrupt soon.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Baht
string.body: Bacht;An Armor Merchant on the first floor of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_4] in Reshanta. He enjoys silly jokes.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Lausan
string.body: Lawusan;A Shield Merchant on the first floor of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_4] in Reshanta. He thinks cheap and sturdy things are the best.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Bihugud
string.body: Bihugud;A Food Merchant on the second floor of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_4] in Reshanta. She is very good at catering for groups, but every now and then foreign substances are found in the meals she prepares.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Hogni
string.body: Hogni;A Manastone Remover on the second floor of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_4] in Reshanta. He is dangerously obsessed with Manastones.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ozur
string.body: Ozur;A Combat Administration Officer on the second floor of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_4] in Reshanta. He never speaks of private matters during work hours.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Spade
string.body: Spade;A Magic Administration Officer on the second floor of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_4] in Reshanta. His parents didn't like him very much.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ivaldi
string.body: Ivaldi;A Combat Administration Officer on the second floor of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_4] in Reshanta. He is rather stoic.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Kolga
string.body: Kolga;A Magic Administration Officer on the second floor of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_4] in Reshanta. She is a typical, no-nonsense Administration Officer

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_AB1_D1
string.body: Yourunerk;A trade broker on the first floor of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_4] in Reshanta. He has a rivalry with Tierunerk.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_AB1_D2
string.body: Tierunerk;A trade broker on the first floor of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_4] in Reshanta. He has a rivalry with Yourunerk.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Vigeland
string.body: Vernio;A warehouse manager on the first floor of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_4] in Reshanta. He believes that the pride of a warehouse manager is in maintaining a clean warehouse.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Glad
string.body: Ganud;A Protector of Primum Legionary at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_4] in Reshanta. He is obedient.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Igla
string.body: Igla;A Protector of Primum Legionary at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_4] in Reshanta. Originally from Vanahal, she came to the Abyss to further her career.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Edvar
string.body: Edvar;A Protector of Primum Legionary at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_4] in Reshanta. He is a terrible, terrible poet.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Kirten
string.body: Kirten;A Protector of Primum Legionary on the first floor of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_4] in Reshanta. He loves to drink, but as the Legion forbids drinking he makes do with juice instead.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Krog
string.body: Krog;A Protector of Primum Legionary on the first floor of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_4] in Reshanta. He collects pebbles as mementos from his travels.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Larbig
string.body: Larbig;A Protector of Primum Legionary on the first floor of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_4] in Reshanta. She hasn't been in the Abyss for long. She has yet to remember the names of all the fortresses.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Enno
string.body: Enno;An Archon of Dusk on the first floor of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_4] in Reshanta. She is a Templar who wishes she'd become a Gladiator instead.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Erik
string.body: Erik;An Archon of Dusk on the first floor of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_4] in Reshanta. He thinks very highly of himself.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Holm
string.body: Holm;An Abyss messenger who delivers messages between [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_4] and [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add7] in Reshanta. He is always very busy.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Konto
string.body: Konto;An Abyss messenger on the first floor of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_4] in Reshanta. He wants to be the fastest messenger around.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Scoda
string.body: Scoda;A Protector of Divinity on the second floor of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_4] in Reshanta. She blesses the troops with her prayers.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Huset
string.body: Huset;A Protector of Primum Legionary on the second floor of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_4] in Reshanta. He is resentful of the mailbox.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Pareten
string.body: Pareten;A Protector of Primum Legionary on the second floor of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_4] in Reshanta. She wishes she'd become a Priest.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Grunn
string.body: Grunn;An Abyss researcher on the second floor of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_4] in Reshanta. He is in Reshanta researching a theory.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Haug
string.body: Haug;A Daeva of Time and Space on the second floor of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_4] in Reshanta. He is a master of manipulating the Aether.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Altak
string.body: Altak;A Protector of Primum Legionary on the second floor of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_4] in Reshanta. He enjoys his out-of-the-way position.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Valter
string.body: Valter;A Protector of Primum Legionary on the second floor of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_4] in Reshanta. He often gets mistaken for High Priest Balder of Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Asmu
string.body: Asmu;A Protector of Primum Legionary guarding the entrance of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_4] in Reshanta. A typical Archon, unremarkable in every way.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Jue
string.body: Shue;A Protector of Primum Legionary guarding the entrance of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_4] in Reshanta. She is very conscious of her appearance.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Tern
string.body: Tern;A Protector of Primum Legionary wandering near [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_4] in Reshanta. He has health problems from patrolling all the time.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Bokbor
string.body: Bokbor;A Protector of Primum Legionary guarding the perimeter of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_4] in Reshanta. He is in awe of the magnificent sky inthe Abyss.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Bord
string.body: Bord;A Protector of Primum Legionary at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add7] of the Primum Landing in Reshanta. He misses his home town.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Vare
string.body: Vare;A Protector of Primum Legionary at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add7] of the Primum Landing in Reshanta. She has a lot of plans.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Veden
string.body: Veden;A Protector of Primum Legionary at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add7] of the Primum Landing in Reshanta. He is hardworking and diligent.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Hevonen
string.body: Hevonen;A Protector of Primum Legionary at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add7] of the Primum Landing in Reshanta. She is worried about her family.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Vis
string.body: Vis;A Protector of Primum Legionary patrolling the area between [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add7] and [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add9]. She is bored.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Mavn
string.body: Mavn;A Protector of Primum Legionary patrolling the area between the fortress and [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add7]. She is envious of her friends' successes.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Dort
string.body: Dort;A Protector of Primum Legionary at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add7]. She has a passionate interest in Tailoring.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Spyr
string.body: Spyr;A Quartermaster at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add9] in Reshanta. He is very frugal and reserved.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Fyra
string.body: Fyra;A quartermaster at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add9] in Reshanta. He generally doesn't think about anything other than food.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Blir
string.body: Blir;A quartermaster at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add9] of the Primum Landing in Reshanta. He is unhappy with Spyr and his stinginess.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Undran
string.body: Undran;A Protector of Primum Legionary at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add9] in Reshanta. She has a dirty mouth sometimes.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Rid
string.body: Rid;A Protector of Primum Legionary at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add9] in Reshanta. He skips meals sometimes and gets hungry later.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Brinn
string.body: Brinn;A Thunder Shout Legionary at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add8]. She has been resting for a while due to an injury and is now very eager for battle.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Svekk
string.body: Svekk;A Thunder Shout Legionary at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add8]. He is well-composed in battle.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Nug
string.body: Nug;A Thunder Shout Legionary at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add8]. He has difficulty with public speaking.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Himlen
string.body: Himlem;A Thunder Shout Legionary at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add8]. He is living his childhood dreams.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Andra
string.body: Andros;A Thunder Shout Legionary at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add8]. He has a lot of practice navigating the Abyss.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ingen
string.body: Ingen;A Thunder Shout Legionary at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add8]. She is rather cowardly.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Klasa
string.body: Klasa;A Thunder Shout Legionary at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add8]. Her blood boils when she thinks of battle.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Iva
string.body: Iva;A Thunder Shout Legionary at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add8]. She is very selfish.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Berg
string.body: Berg;A Shadow Judge at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add10]. He is investigating strange activity in the Abyss by asking questions of random passers-by.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ammu
string.body: Ammu;A Shadow Executor at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add10]. He shouts a lot and pushes people around.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Koska
string.body: Koska;A Shadow Executor at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add10]. He acts gentle on the outside, but is actually a very cruel person.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Leban
string.body: Leban;A training instructor at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add6]. He teaches about fortresses.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Licht
string.body: Vicht;A training instructor at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add6]. He teaches about Aetheric Fields.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Mont
string.body: Mont;A training instructor at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add6]. He teaches about Castle Gates.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Abend
string.body: Abend;A training instructor at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add6]. He teaches about Guardian Generals.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Brise
string.body: Brysa;A training instructor at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add6]. She teaches about artifacts.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Paus
string.body: Eldorey;A training instructor at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add6]. He teaches about Kisks.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Noiman
string.body: Noiman;A training instructor at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add6]. He teaches about the Dredgion.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Steinkel
string.body: Steinkel;An Abyss Contribution Recordkeeper on the first floor of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_4] in Reshanta. He issues weapons as rewards for Abyss Points.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Garnteia
string.body: Garantin;An Abyss Contribution Recordkeeper on the first floor of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_4] in Reshanta. He issues armor as rewards Abyss Points.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Lukea
string.body: Lukea;An Abyss Contribution Recordkeeper on the first floor of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_4] in Reshanta. She issues consumables as rewards Abyss Points.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Momi
string.body: Bephax;An Abyss Contribution Recordkeeper on the first floor of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_4] in Reshanta. He issues accessories as rewards Abyss Points.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_AB1_D3
string.body: Kaoranerk;A Shugo inventor outside [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_4]. He is trying to invent wings for Shugos.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Liudona
string.body: Riudona;An Abyss layer teleporter in the upper layer of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_56] in Reshanta. She is business-like.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Grimnir
string.body: Grimnir;A Protector of Primum Legionary on the upper layer of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_56] in Reshanta. He is a merciless man.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Glen
string.body: Glen;A Protector of Primum Legionary on the upper layer of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_56] in Reshanta. He is showing signs of a nervous breakdown.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Nineve
string.body: Nineve;A Protector of Primum Legionary on the upper layer of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_56] in Reshanta. She looks like a saint, but she is quite ferocious in battle.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Gilling
string.body: Gilling;A Protector of Primum Legionary on the upper layer of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_56] in Reshanta. He is plain but trustworthy.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Feroniad
string.body: Peroniad;An Abyss layer teleporter on the lower layer of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_56] in Reshanta. He is on the cutting edge of teleportation magic.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Naglfari
string.body: Naglfari;A Protector of Primum Legionary on the lower layer of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_56] in Reshanta. It is obvious to others that he has feelings for Dufa, but he thinks he is hiding it well.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Dainn
string.body: Dainn;A Protector of Primum Legionary on the lower layer of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_56] in Reshanta. War is the only thing on his mind.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Dufa
string.body: Dufa;A Protector of Primum Legionary on the lower layer of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_56] in Reshanta. She is cool and haughty.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Gymir
string.body: Gymir;A Protector of Primum Legionary on the lower layer of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_56] in Reshanta. He is worried about his skin.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Fias
string.body: Hwiath;An Abyss layer teleporter on the upper layer of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_57] in Reshanta. He is business-like.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Nidhoggr
string.body: Nidhoggr;A Protector of Primum Legionary on the upper layer of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_57] in Reshanta. He has a strong sense of responsibility.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Dagr
string.body: Dagr;A Protector of Primum Legionary on the upper layer of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_57] in Reshanta. He puts on airs and struts around, but he is a good fighter.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Nordri
string.body: Nordri;A Protector of Primum Legionary on the upper layer of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_57] in Reshanta. He respects the Elyos as enemies.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Delling
string.body: Delling;A Protector of Primum Legionary on the upper layer of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_57] in Reshanta. He really loves bread. He is also known as the Bread Boy.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Mure
string.body: Mure;An Abyss layer teleporter on the lower layer of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_57] in Reshanta. He is devoted to his duty.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Duneyr
string.body: Duneyr;A Protector of Primum Legionary on the lower layer of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_57] in Reshanta. He is a master of tactics.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Durasror
string.body: Rasror;A Protector of Primum Legionary on the lower layer of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_57] in Reshanta. He is hardworking and diligent.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Norn
string.body: Norn;A Protector of Primum Legionary on the lower layer of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_57] in Reshanta. She spends too much money modifying her gear.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Durin
string.body: Durin;A Protector of Primum Legionary on the lower layer of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_57] in Reshanta. He is a hard worker.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Asynja
string.body: Sinjah;A scout leader of the Red Hasia Legion dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_16]. She is a master of stealth.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Gagnrad
string.body: Gagrad;A Red Hasia Legionary dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_16]. He is very long-suffering.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Glati
string.body: Glati;A Red Hasia Legionary dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_16]. Sometimes she reads too much and gets confused.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ganglot
string.body: Ganglot;A priest dispatched to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_18]. He is a master undead-fighter, but is easily excited.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Gjalf
string.body: Gjalf;A Thunder Shout Legionary dispatched to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_18]. She is uncertain about serving Ganglot.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Mokkurkalfi
string.body: Mokkurkalfi;A warrior at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add19]. He used to be in the Red Hasia Legion, but left due to a difference of opinion.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Aslak
string.body: Aslak;A Centurion of the Red Hasia Legion dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_26]. He is an expert scout.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Goeldag
string.body: Goeldag;An adjutant of the Red Hasia Legion dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_26]. He is an excellent sorcerer.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Randrif
string.body: Randrif;A Red Hasia Legionary dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_26]. She possesses both wit and beauty.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Gudreg
string.body: Gudreg;A Red Hasia Legionary dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_26]. He is a master of poisons.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Gnad
string.body: Gnad;A Red Hasia Legionary dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_26]. He is a master of covert operations.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Amundi
string.body: Amundi;A Centurion of the Thunder Shout Legion dispatched to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_24]. He is very aggressive.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Gefjun
string.body: Gefjun;An adjutant of the Thunder Shout Legion dispatched to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_24]. She mourns her daughter's death.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Bui
string.body: Bui;A Thunder Shout Legionary dispatched to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_24]. He is concerned about Gefjun.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Helfrid
string.body: Helfrid;A Thunder Shout Legionary dispatched to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_24]. He is old and bitter.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ogmund
string.body: Ogmund;A Thunder Shout Legionary dispatched to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_24]. He has a plain personality.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Dullaha
string.body: Dullaha;A scout leader of the Red Hasia Legion at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add14]. He is a self-styled pragmatist who has absolutely no interest in history.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Greip
string.body: Greip;A Red Hasia Legionary at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add14]. She is a better scout than Dullaha, but was passed over for promotion.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Rota
string.body: Rota;A Red Hasia Legionary at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add14] of the Ruins of Roah in Reshanta. She keeps a close watch on the Elyos.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Finne
string.body: Midori;A scholar dispatched to the Ruins of Roah in Reshanta. She serves as an advisor to the Red Hasia at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add14].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Grabakr
string.body: Grabakr;A Daeva of Mineral dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add17]. People call him Rock-Head.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Dvergr
string.body: Dvergr;A Quartermaster dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add17]. He assists Grabakr and takes care of all of the odd jobs.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Muirica
string.body: Muirica;A Protector of Primum Legionary dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add17]. She has strange dreams sometimes.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Arnora
string.body: Arnora;A Protector of Primum Legionary dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add17]. He is prone to nightmares.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Rathgrid
string.body: Radgrid;A Centurion of the Thunder Shout Legion dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_32] in Reshanta. She may look soft, but she's a firm leader.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Laufey
string.body: Laufey;An adjutant of the Thunder Shout Legion dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_32] in Reshanta. She is lively and cheerful.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Goinn
string.body: Goinn;A Thunder Shout Legionary dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_32] in Reshanta. She is constantly competing with her older sister Moinn

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Modir
string.body: Modir;A Thunder Shout Legionary dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_32] in Reshanta. She has a bad memory.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Lodurr
string.body: Lodurr;A Thunder Shout Legionary dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_32] in Reshanta. He really hates the Elyos. No, really. More than that. More.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Rossjof
string.body: Rossjof;A Centurion of the Red Hasia Legion at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_29]. He is gruff but capable.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Grid
string.body: Grid;An adjutant of the Red Hasia Legion at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_29] in Reshanta. She loves square things.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Lofn
string.body: Lofn;A Red Hasia Legionary at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_29] in Reshanta. She uses flowery language, which bothers her comrades.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Lifprasir
string.body: Lifras;A Red Hasia Legionary at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_29] in Reshanta. She is gruff but secretly cares inside.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Magnair
string.body: Magnair;A Red Hasia Legionary at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_29] in Reshanta. He is sometimes indecisive.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Menglad
string.body: Menglad;A Centurion of the Protector of Primum Legion at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_36]. She says her name is Menglad because she "makes men glad."

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Modsognir
string.body: Modsognir;An adjutant of the Protector of Primum Legion at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_36]. He has a keen sense of smell.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Reginlief
string.body: Reginlief;A Protector of Primum Legionary at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_36] in Reshanta. She sometimes has strange fancies.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Moinn
string.body: Moinn;A Protector of Primum Legionary at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_36] in Reshanta. She treats everyone coldly, even her sister Moinn.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Geri
string.body: Geri;A Protector of Primum Legionary at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_36] in Reshanta. He seldom gets the chance to express his opinions.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Mist
string.body: Mist;A treasure hunter near [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_51] of the Ruins of Roah in Reshanta. She's surprisingly altruistic sometimes.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Vanadis
string.body: Vanadis;An ancient fiend that appears near [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_53] of the Ruins of Roah in Reshanta. It is filled with hatred.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ab1_1011_Quest_Da
string.body: Muelina;A staff operation officer inside the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_46] at the Eye of Reshanta.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ab1_1131_Quest_Da
string.body: Lirhel;A staff operation officer inside [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_23] in Reshanta.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ab1_1132_Quest_Da
string.body: Astar;A staff operation officer inside [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_20] in Reshanta.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ab1_1141_Quest_Da
string.body: Gudharten;A staff operation officer inside [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_13].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ab1_1211_Quest_Da
string.body: Herat;A staff operation officer inside [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_49] in Reshanta. She speaks roughly, but is a pleasant woman with a good heart.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ab1_1221_Quest_Da
string.body: Hildebrant;A staff operation officer inside [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_33].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ab1_1231_Quest_Da
string.body: Etzel;A staff operation officer inside [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_37].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ab1_1241_Quest_Da
string.body: Dehitine;A staff operation officer inside [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_30].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ab1_1251_Quest_Da
string.body: Snori;A staff operation officer inside [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_43].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Jafnhar
string.body: Jafnhar;There are people who have seen him locked up near [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_59].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Acestes
string.body: Acestes;Having infiltrated Azoturan Fortress, he is now spying on the Lepharists.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Peitho
string.body: Peitho;Having infiltrated Azoturan Fortress, she is now spying on the Lepharists.

string.body: Hippodamia;An overseer guarding the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Low_Wciel_SZ_All] deep in Siel's Western Fortress in Reshanta.

string.body: Labine;An overseer guarding the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Up_Rhoo_SZ_All] in Reshanta.

string.body: Poeas;An overseer guarding the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Up3_LaMiren_SZ_All] in Reshanta.

string.body: Kabara;An overseer guarding the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Up_Asteria_SZ_All] in Reshanta.

string.body: Iacchus;An ancient ring administration officer in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_2] in Reshanta.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ceres
string.body: Ceres;An ancient necklace administration officer in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_2] in Reshanta.

string.body: Philemon;An ancient scepter administration officer in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_2] in Reshanta.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Bergila
string.body: Bergila;An ancient crown administration officer in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_2] in Reshanta.

string.body: Srim;An overseer guarding the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Low_Wciel_SZ_All] deep in Siel's Western Fortress in Reshanta.

string.body: Lashik;An overseer guarding the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Up_Rhoo_SZ_All] in Reshanta.

string.body: Lifton;An overseer guarding the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Up3_Crotan_SZ_All] in Reshanta.
