string.name: STR_DIC_SEN_LF4_SensoryArea_Q11149A
string.body: Sulfur Geyser;A geyser in the Inggison Gravepit. It gushes out warm water high in sulfur content.

string.name: STR_DIC_SEN_LF4_SensoryArea_Q11149B
string.body: Pool Geyser;A geyser in the Inggison Gravepit. There is a pool around it which teems with life.

string.name: STR_DIC_SEN_LF4_SensoryArea_Q11149C
string.body: Rock Geyser;A geyser in the Inggison Gravepit. Hot water gushes out from the gap between the rocks.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_OBJ_IDElim_Cocoon
string.body: Writhing Cocoon;A cocoon made by insects inside Taloc to capture intruders. The Reian tribesmen Abyla and Engeius are trapped in these cocoons.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_IDNovice_Ore_cart
string.body: Aether Cart;A cart found inside Haramel. It is used to transport the produced Aether.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_IDNovice_Rough_Odum
string.body: Raw Odium;Pure raw Odum found in the Odium Strip Mine of Haramel.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_IDNovice_Burning_Odella
string.body: Processed Odella;Processed Odella found inside Haramel. It seems to be contaminated with a special chemical.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_IDNovice_DriedSam
string.body: Well-Dried Ginseng;Dried ginseng found in Haramel. You can prepare delicious ginseng soup with five of these.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_IDNovice_Jar
string.body: Huge Cauldron;A huge cauldron found in Haramel. You can prepare some delicious ginseng soup here by adding five dried ginseng.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_Closed_Cube
string.body: Severely Rusted Box;A box found at the top of the Haramel Tower, which is reached by using [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_Elevator_Lever]. It is said to contain valuable treasures of Hamerun.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_Instance_Entrance
string.body: Haramel Secret Entrance;A secret entrance in the Cantas Coast that leads to Haramel.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_Instance_Entrance_Da
string.body: Haramel Secret Passage;A secret passage in the Mau's secret cave that leads to Haramel.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_Supply_Box
string.body: Lionel's Medicine Box;A box containing medicines made by Lionel.

string.name: STR_DIC_SEN_LF1a_SensoryArea_Q18500
string.body: Suspicious Relic Site;A relic site located on the Cantas Coast in Verteron. It looks to be the source of the suspicious Odium.

string.name: STR_DIC_SEN_DF1a_SensoryArea_Q28500
string.body: Abandoned Relic Site;A relic site located in Impetusium. It looks to be the source of the discarded Odium.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_DF4_Q21072
string.body: Trace of Svasuth;It indicates that the bard Svasuth had been to the Gelkmaros Falls.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_DF4_shugobody_Q21136
string.body: Berokin;A Shulack inventor who used to live in Nunglark Village.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_DF4_Q21248
string.body: Balaur Limbcleaver;A weapon made by Drakan researchers at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF4_SZ_C5_Lab].

string.name: STR_DIC_SEN_DF4_SensoryArea_Q21249
string.body: Naduka Biolab Entrance;The entrance to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF4_SZ_C5_Lab].

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_LF4_patient_1
string.body: Limping Daeva;An injured Daeva in the Inggison Illusion Fortress. He was injured during a dredgion attack.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_LF4_patient_2
string.body: Concussed Daeva;An injured Daeva in the Inggison Illusion Fortress. He was injured during a dredgion attack.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_LF4_patient_3
string.body: Backache Daeva;An injured Daeva in the Inggison Illusion Fortress. He was injured during a dredgion attack.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_Elevator_Lever
string.body: Tower Lift;A device that takes you to a higher level within the Haramel Tower.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_Ab1_1011_TreasureGate_Li
string.body: Aratus;The keeper of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Core_SZ_All] located deep in the Divine Fortress in Reshanta.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_Ab1_1011_TreasureGate_Da
string.body: Gwal;The keeper of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Core_SZ_All] located deep in the Divine Fortress in Reshanta.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_Laum
string.body: Laum;An armor craftsman who wanders around Elysea. He is very skilled but doesn't like to show off. Recently, he's been rumored to be staying in the Teminon Landing.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_Darkhum
string.body: Darkhum;An armor craftsman who wanders around in Asmodae. He is very skilled, but became bitter about everything when he failed to get any recognition. Recently he's been heard to be staying in the Primum Landing.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_IDAbRe_Core_ShugoExhausted_Q30263
string.body: Fallen Shugo;A Shugo who went to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Core_SZ_All] searching for treasure, but failed to return safely and ended up imprisoned in The Storm Cave.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_Shugo_AB1_L8
string.body: Aurunerk;A greedy and devious Shugo in the Teminon Landing in Reshanta. For some reason, he is in a state of constant fear.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_Shugo_AB1_D4
string.body: Ickulnerk;A Shugo in the Primum Landing in Reshanta, who is infamous for getting into all sorts of trouble due to his gullible nature. For some reason, he is in a state of constant fear.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_Letia
string.body: Letia;A Daeva found to the east of the Elyos Square in Sanctum. She loves pets and has several in her care.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_Silke
string.body: Silke;A Daeva found in the Pandaemonium Plaza. She loves pets and has several in her care.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_Unos
string.body: Unos;A pet merchant found to the east of the Elyos Square in Sanctum. Pet eggs bought from Unos can be hatched with the help of a Pet Minder and kept as pets.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_Katin
string.body: Katin;A pet merchant found in the Pandaemonium Plaza. Pet eggs bought from Katin can be hatched with the help of a Pet Minder and kept as pets.

string.name: STR_DIC_SEN_LF4_SensoryArea_Q11076A
string.body: Illusion Fortress Windstream;A Windstream found near the Inggison Illusion Fortress. It starts near [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Jienia].

string.name: STR_DIC_SEN_LF4_SensoryArea_Q11076B
string.body: Illusion &Phanoe Windstream;A Windstream that extends from Illusion Fortress Windstream. It leads to the Phanoe Valley.

string.name: STR_DIC_SEN_LF4_SensoryArea_Q11076C
string.body: Phanoe &Taloc Windstream;A turbulent Windstream that flows over the Phanoe Valley. It leads to Taloc's Hill.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_Vafuth
string.body: Faruth;An Archon investigating wind paths on the ridge between the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_A6] and [%dic:STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_A2].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_Kotia
string.body: Kotia;A Daeva who came to help with the Daeva's Day festival. She is found in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_Kahlen
string.body: Kahlen;A Daeva who came to help with the Daeva's Day festival. She is found in : [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_OP].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_Regan
string.body: Regan;A Daeva who came to help with the Daeva's Day festival. She is found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_A1].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_Bethell
string.body: Bethell;A Daeva who came to help with the Daeva's Day festival. She is found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_1].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_Will
string.body: Willow;A Daeva who came to help with the Daeva's Day festival. She is found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_OP].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_Festa
string.body: Festa;A Daeva who came to help with the Daeva's Day festival. She is found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_A].

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_Q47000
string.body: Ward Orb;A magical device for guarding the fortress. It is found near the Altgard Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_Q47003
string.body: Ward Globe;A magical device for guarding the fortress. It is found near the Morheim Ice Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_Q47006
string.body: Field Amplifier;A device that reinforces the Aetheric Field. It is found near the Morheim Observatory.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LF2_FOBJ_Q37114a
string.body: Kaidan Altar;An altar found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_K]. When a [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Li_35_45] and a [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Mentor] transform into Balaur at the altar, the Kaidan Head Priest appears.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LF2_FOBJ_Q37114b
string.body: Krall Tribute Chest;The treasure that the Kaidan Krall pay to the Balaur. If [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Li_35_45] speaks to the Kaidan Head Priest, you can receive the Tribute Chest containing the small fortune.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_DF2_FOBJ_Q47105a
string.body: Ice Claw Altar;An altar built by the Ice Claw tribe to offer tribute to the Balaur. An Ice Claw Head Priest will approach if Asmodian Daevas disguise themselves as Drakan here.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_DF2_FOBJ_Q47105b
string.body: Mau Tribute Chest;Tribute from the Ice Claw tribe to the Balaur. It is said to hold valuable Mau treasures.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LF1a_FOBJ_Q37000
string.body: Tainted Inina;A toxic Inina in the Ellun River in Verteron.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LF2_FOBJ_Q37003
string.body: Hunting Blind;A yurt in the Manduri Forest, covered in leaves and disguising [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF2_DQ_LehparAs_43_An]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LF2_FOBJ_Q37006
string.body: Screened Hideout;A leaf-covered yurt on the Lankusis Plateau that [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF2_DQ_DAssassin_43_An]s live in.

string.name: STR_DIC_DF4_SensoryArea_Q21080A
string.body: Gelkmaros Fortress Windstream;A Windstream that leads from the Gelkmaros Fortress to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_A2]. It starts in an area in front of [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Vedrfonir].

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_DF4_FOBJ_Q20020
string.body: Naduka Corpse;A Draconute corpse in the Antagor Battlefield. It was a casualty of the crashed Dredgion.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_Minis
string.body: Minis;He's in charge of the Harvest Revel, and is waiting near [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA30] for someone to help get the festivities back on track.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_Tali
string.body: Tali;He's in charge of the Harvest Revel, and is waiting near [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_1] for someone to help get the festivities back on track.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_Sonaran
string.body: Sonaran;A young Daeva excited by Solorius. She is drinking in the atmosphere at [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA31].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_Mayer
string.body: Mayer;A young Daeva excited by Solorius. She is drinking in the atmosphere at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_3].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_LC1_XmasEvent_Santa
string.body: Portzebnerk;He visited [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA31] to organize Solorius. He is run off his feet with festival duties.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_Shugo_LF4_3
string.body: Squeegenerk;A Shugo who is taking part in Solorius as a volunteer. Unusually for a shugo, he refuses to get paid, and keeps running between [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA21], [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA10], and [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09] to hide.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_DC1_XmasEvent_Rudolf
string.body: Rangidax;He visited [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_3] to organize Solorius. He looks a little tired from all his efforts.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_Shugo_Peddler_Df4_01
string.body: Zubinerk;A Shugo who is taking part in Solorius as a volunteer. Unusually for a shugo, he refuses to get paid, and keeps running between [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_26], [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_19], and [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_1] to hide.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_Lotus
string.body: Thourak;One of the Fayrefolk who is visiting [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA31]. They say he has Charm Cards of great value for any Daeva who speaks to him.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_Metrano
string.body: Metrano;One of the Fayrefolk who is visiting [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_3]. They say he has Charm Cards of great value for any Daeva who speaks to him.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_Harmonan
string.body: Tirrian;One of the Fayrefolk who is visiting [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA31]. She has a game that may improve the fortunes of those who are unsatisfied with their Charm Cards.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_Druike
string.body: Druike;One of the Fayrefolk who is visiting [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_3]. She has a game that may improve the fortunes of those who are unsatisfied with their Charm Cards.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_Namor
string.body: Namor;A Daeva in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA31] who is helping give out boxed lunches for the New Year Event.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_Nepor
string.body: Nepor;A Daeva in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_3] who is helping give out boxed lunches for the New Year Event.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ionse
string.body: Ionse;An Administrative Retainer at the Anangke Excavation Camp in Theobomos.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Yujinius
string.body: Yujinius;An Administrative Retainer to Changarunerk in Heiron.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDStation_FOBJ_Dr_CM

string.body: Balaur Data Crystal;A Balaur crystal for recording information. While Daevas use books and written documents, Balaur prefer crystals.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDStation_FOBJ_BOX
string.body: Seal Stamped Box;A box in the Aturam Sky Fortress Warehouse Zone. It bears a Balaur stamp meaning it contains Reian Tribe Relics.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDStation_FOBJ_POWER
string.body: New Surkana;A state-of-the-art Surkana for crafting the latest model of Dredgion.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDStation_FOBJ_TOWER1
string.body: Dredgion Generator;A huge device for controlling Surkana in the Dredgion Command Area of Aturam Sky Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDStation_ShulackAirplane
string.body: Steam Tachysphere;A small airship made by Popuchin. It posesses weapons powerful enough to defeat even Drakan.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_NPC_Bharakha
string.body: Maduka's Spirit;Formerly a Drakan retainer of Raksha, Maduka betrayed his lord. Unable to escape Raksang before the Seal was set, he was changed into a Mau and killed by Raksha loyalists. His ghost haunts Raksang in a rage.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_NPC_Dracan_s
string.body: Nasuram;A Raksha Legionary who joined Maduka's treasonous plot. He was trapped by Raksha's Seal and wanders Raksang as a ghost.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Horian
string.body: Umrian;He was the first Reian to enter Raksang through Arza's Corridor, but there has been no news since he left. He awaits you between Terror's Vault and Torment's Forge.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Miss_drakan
string.body: The Dell Witch;Nobody is sure why this Drakan lingers in a cave in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T2_A2]. Those in Drakan form can use the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T2_S4] to find her residence.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF4b_FOBJ_CrystalYun

string.name: STR_DIC_N_OBJ_OldCube
string.body: Ancient Cube;A very old cube that belongs to [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Shugo6]. It was lost somewhere in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA07].

string.body: Orph's Body;It lies where Orph fell in the Avad Mine. You can send the body back into the Aether using a Combustion Crystal.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF4b_FOBJ_Q41593A

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF4a_Giantwar
string.body: Petralith Fragment;A fragment of an ancient Petralith. Because it has taken on sacred meaning for Sarpan Calydon, it probably can be found in a [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF4a_21509all].

string.name: STR_DIC_FOBJ_Q21517a
string.body: Missing Door;From a refugee wagon, it's covered in large hoofprints. There are few hooved creatures that big in Sarpan, except the Calydon.

string.name: STR_DIC_FOBJ_soil_Q41164
string.body: Moldering Leaves;A mound of leaves in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A1] that seems somehow... different. It gives off a healthy, invigorating aroma.

string.name: STR_DIC_FOBJ_halfcorpse
string.body: Dead Hornskull;They are often found in the eastern oasis of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A1], where many Hornskull go to die. It is said that these bodies contain beneficial compounds.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Q41301_baby
string.body: Young Pagati;A juvenile Pagati, still dependent on its mother and not yet aggressive. Pagati brood in the highlands around the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_D_03].

string.body: Vallack;The Red Hasia Legion's teleporter in Reshanta. You can teleport to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAb1_MiniCastle_SZ] from Morheim via Vallack.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF2_Rogun
string.body: Rogan;The Gray Wind Legion's teleporter in Reshanta. You can teleport to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAb1_MiniCastle_SZ] from Eltnen via Rogan.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF2_Kelmar
string.body: Kelmar;A Red Hasia Legion instructor in Reshanta. He is dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_OP] to find a Daeva for a mission in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAb1_MiniCastle_SZ_D].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF2_Brando
string.body: Brunto;A Gray Wind Legion instructor in Reshanta. He is dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_OP] to find a Daeva for a mission in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAb1_MiniCastle_SZ_L].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_EVENT_Cebath
string.body: Cebath;A manager at the cafe in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_Housing_lf_personal_agora].

string.body: Hanes;An employee at the cafe in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_Housing_df_personal_agora].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDEvent01_In_NPC
string.body: Indianerk;A Shugo adventurer who wants to retrieve ancient relics before the Pillagers get to them. Look for him in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA31], [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_OP], on [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_1], or in Gelkmaros Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDEvent01_In_NPC_Da
string.body: Alberto Einshudison;A skeptical Daeva who leads a group at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_1] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_0].

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_Octorung
string.body: Octobrunerk;Shugo collecting [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80284A] to brew beer in Sanctum or Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_Reklov
string.body: Reklov;Brewmaster who exchanges [%dic:STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_COIN_INGREDIENT] for [%dic:STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_COIN_REKLOV]s in Sanctum or Pandaemonium. Use this ticket after the beer is brewed and you can buy valuable items such as beer for restoring energy of repose.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_Nitram
string.body: Nitram;Brewmaster who exchanges [%dic:STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_COIN_INGREDIENT] for [%dic:STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_COIN_NITRAM]s in Sanctum or Pandaemonium. Use this ticket after the beer is drafted and you can buy valuable items such as beer for recovering the energy of repose.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_Eimaj
string.body: Eimaj;Brewmaster who exchanges [%dic:STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_COIN_INGREDIENT] for [%dic:STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_COIN_EIMAJ]s in Sanctum or Pandaemonium. Use this ticket after the beer is brewed and you can buy valuable items such as beer for restoring energy of repose.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Berou
string.body: Berou;A Reian tribesman in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SV_6021] who excaped from the Igdel Research Center.

string.body: Kahrun;A leader revered by the Reian Tribe.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDTiamat_Ariana
string.body: Ariana;Formerly an advisor at the Rentus Base, she joined the Tiamat Stronghold infiltration operation after Vasharti's defeat. She can be found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_R2] or [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_S1].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDTiamat_Sorus
string.body: Sorus;Former leader of the Rentus Base reinforcements who joined the Tiamat Stronghold infiltration operation. He can be found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_R2] or [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_S1].

string.body: Garnon;IDTiamat

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Bhasha
string.body: Frightening Vhasha;A brilliant Balaur prophet currently confined to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_S4_1] for predicting Tiamat's death.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDTiamat_Drakan_Surama_1
string.body: Captured Drakan Scientist;Surama's captive servants scattered throughout [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_S4_1].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDTiamat_Murugan_1
string.body: Murugan the Loyal;Surama's faithful servant. He mourns for Surama's death in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_S4_3].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDTiamat_Surama_1
string.body: Surama the Traitor;Former chief of the Esoterrace Secret Laboratory, currently confined to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_S4_1] for plotting to assassinate Tiamat.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDTiamat_NPC_Tiamat
string.body: Tiamat;The 5th Dragon Lord. You can find Tiamat in the Dragon Lord's Refuge or the Portal to the Throne of Blood.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDTiamat_Kaisinel_1
string.body: Kaisinel;One of the five Empyrean Lords in Elysea. He is the Lord of Illusion.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDTiamat_Marchutan_1
string.body: Marchutan;One of the five Empyrean Lords in Asmodae. He is the Fate Lord.

string.body: Israphel;IDTiamat

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDTiamat_FOBJ_Teleport_S6
string.body: Tahabata's Statue;A huge statue standing in the middle of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_S1]. Apparently, it's also a teleporter that can take you to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_S6].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDTiamat_FOBJ_Model
string.body: Model Terath Dredgion;The [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_S3] contains projections of the dredgions to help plan their movements.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDTiamat_FOBJ_GravityController
string.body: Gravity Control Device;IDTiamat

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDTiamat_FOBJ_Scroll
string.body: Tahabata Legion's Orders;A set of orders located somewhere in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_S5_1]. It contains a plot that began the Dark Poeta problem.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDTiamat_FOBJ_Dagger
string.body: Grave Curse Dagger;A dagger located in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_S6] that contains such a powerful curse it can't be spoken aloud.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDTiamat_FOBJ_Li_Statue
string.body: Elyos Hero's Statue;A stone statue found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_S6]. Tiamat makes these from the souls of vanquished foes.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDTiamat_FOBJ_Da_Statue
string.body: Asmodian Hero's Statue;A stone statue found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_S6]. Tiamat makes these from the souls of vanquished foes.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Pino
string.body: Pino;A flight transporter in Tiamaranta.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Litzof
string.body: Luchis;A flight transporter in Tiamaranta.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ellano
string.body: Euvano;A centurion sent to the Legions Board in Sanctum. He is widely known as trustworthy.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Benad
string.body: Benard;A Balaur combat officer sent to the Legions Board in Sanctum. He is know for his hatred of the Balaur.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Morad
string.body: Morad;An Abyss combat officer sent to the Legions Board in Sanctum. His strategic acumen in Abyss battles is well known.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ceana
string.body: Cienna;An Elyos combat officer sent to the Legions board in Sanctum. She is renowned for her fierce defenses agains Asmodian attacks on Elysea.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Famien
string.body: Famien;Rewards Daevas who perform tasks for the Legion. She is located near the Legions Board in Sanctum.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Bcerleno
string.body: Celleno;A centurion sent to the Pandaemonium Legions Board. He desires to bring prosperity to the legion.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Sarban
string.body: Sarban;A combat officer dispatched to the Pandaemonium Legions Board. He seeks fight with the Balaur wherever he can.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Anonte
string.body: Anonte;An Abyss officer sent to the Pandaemonium Legions Board. She dislikes the recklessness of the Abyss.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Kellin
string.body: Kelen;An Asmodae combat officer assigned to the Pandaemonium Legions Board. She is bored by her current duties.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Venoti
string.body: Venoti;A legion reward officer assigned to the Pandaemonium Legions Board. She has a lot of experience as a Steward.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Q30710_hero
string.body: Gabelline;It's possible she is the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_IDTiamat_FOBJ_Li_Statue] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_S6].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Q30760_hero
string.body: Hakelan;It's possible he is the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_IDTiamat_FOBJ_Da_Statue] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_S6].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDTiamat_Kahrun_6
string.body: Kahrun;He was thrown into the past during negotiations with Tiamat. He returned to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_T6] after Tiamat's death.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDTiamat_FOBJ_Drakan_Armor
string.body: Vershaka's Statue;Touching it will awaken Vershaka's spirit and temporarily transform you into a Drakan.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDTiamat_Drakan_Medal_Rw
string.body: Narkun the Loyal;Surama's faithful servant. He is working undercover at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_S6] smuggling items from the Tiamat Legion.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDTiamat_1_FOBJ_Entrance
string.body: Entrance to the Tiamat Stronghold;An entrance to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_R1]. located North of Tiamaranta's Eye.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDTiamat_2_FOBJ_Entrance
string.body: Entrance to the Dragon Lord's Refuge;An entrance leading to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_T1], located in the center of Tiamaranta's Eye.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Solon
string.body: Seleon;A Guardian dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_SV_5011] in Katalam when Sillus Fortress is captured.

string.body: Ulla;An Archon dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_SV_5011] in Katalam when Sillus Fortress is captured.

string.body: Atika;A Guardian in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SV_6011] when the Elyos control it. She'd like Resco's help with taking control of the Void Cube.

string.name: STR_DIC_LDF5b_resco_G_LHF
string.body: Resco;A Guardian at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SV_6011] when the Elyos control it. She has a superior attitude and doesn't like Atika much.

string.name: STR_DIC_LDF5a_Marke_E
string.body: Marke;A Guardian Detachment Medic at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_L]. She's got more important things to do than socializing.

string.name: STR_DIC_LDF5a_Tiryns_Commander
string.body: Tirins;Military Governor of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_L]. He finds it creepy that you're willing to follow any order.

string.name: STR_DIC_LDF5a_Rimo_E
string.body: Remao;A medic in the Archon Battlegroup taking care of the wounded Archons at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_D].

string.body: Vard;The Commander of the Archon Battlegroup at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_D] aiming to capture Katalam for the Asmodians.

string.body: Umut;A Reian in the Katalam Prairie Fortress who managed to escape from the Idgel Research Center.

string.body: Nieber;An Archon dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SV_6011] in Danaria investigating the Void Cube. He appears when the Asmodians occupy Silona Fortress.

string.body: Valvrin;Faun's subordinate and part of the Redfang Squad. He collects data from the investigation into the Beritra Army. He also performs missions to expand the Guerilla Squad's territory in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_B2].

string.body: Narubtum;One of Tiamat's former researchers. He is working with Ide in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_F]. He feels guilt for turning his friends into zombies.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5b_Bottle_Q39712

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5A_Pepe_E
string.body: Tribunus Pippus;A Tribunus with the Guardian Detachment's Beritra's Bane Legion. He is constantly busy performing Pantager's tasks, and he has subordinates across Katalam. Find him at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_L] in Katalam.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5A_Portis_E
string.body: Chief Priest Pantager;A High Priest with the Priest Bureau. He leads the Pantager Guard and has subordinates across Katalam. Find him at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_L] in Katalam.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5A_Stelman_E
string.body: Senior Tribunus Stellman;A Senior Tribunus with the Archon Battlegroup. He leads Stellman's Guard and has subordinates across Katalam. Find him in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_D] in Katalam.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5A_Phone_E
string.body: Captain Faun;The Captain of the Redfang Squad, a specialized branch of the Archon Battlegroup. His small band can be found throughout Katalam. Find him in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_D] in Katalam.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDAsteria_IU_IN_NPC01
string.body: Otherworldly Pucas;You can find these fairies recruiting Daevas to save [%dic:STR_DIC_N_IDAsteria_IU_IU_NPC01]. If you're Elyos, they're in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA31], [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_OP_A1], and [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_L]. If you're Asmodian, they're in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_1], [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_OP_A2], and [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_D].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDAsteria_IU_IU_NPC01
string.body: IU;Yume, the Queen of Dreams, was captured by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDASTERIA_NMD_03] to create a gateway into the real world.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDAsteria_IU_TELEPORT_NPC01
string.body: Aseda;One of the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_IDAsteria_IU_IN_NPC01]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDAsteria_IU_FOBJ01
string.body: Solid Iron Chain;The iron chain that seals [%dic:STR_DIC_N_IDAsteria_IU_WORLD_IU_NPC01] inside the cage. Destroying this chain will alert the Nightmare Circus and allow Yume to assist you in combat.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Under_Hadius_E
string.body: Hadius;An Elyos dispatched to Idian Depths. He is the slow but passionate subordinate of [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Under_Kurius_E].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Under_Kurius_E
string.body: Kurius;An Elyos captain dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_LDF5_SZ_M1]. He commands the Elyos operation in Idian Depths. He always gets the job done and takes a strong hand with [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Under_Hadius_E].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Under_Dures_E
string.body: Duros;A direct subordinate to [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Under_Hadius_E] who is keenly following the battle against the Balaur in Idian Depths.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Under_Liponia_E
string.body: Liponia;An ancient civilization researcher investigating the history and relics of the bygone Danuar. She is the subordinate of [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Under_Kurius_E].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Under_Brief_E
string.body: Brif;An Asmodian captain dispatched to the Idian Depths commanding the operation there. As [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Under_Oturu_E]'s twin, he volunteered for the Idian Depths operation to redeem his name.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Under_Oturu_E
string.body: Otur;A composed and meticulous Asmodian dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_LDF5_SZ_M1]. As [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Under_Brief_E]'s twin, he volunteered out of worry for his elder brother.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Under_Merde_E
string.body: Nona;A direct subordinate of [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Under_Brief_E] keenly following the battle against the Balaur in Idian Depths.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Under_Nibella_E
string.body: Maeve;An ancient civilization researcher investigating the tombstones and relics of the Danuar. She is subordinate to [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Under_Oturu_E] but shows more interest in her own work.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Under_Broringring_E
string.body: Nedzelinerk;President of the Cuperine Development Union found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_LDF5_SZ_M1].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Under_Pudirung_E
string.body: Pudirunerk;A food supply manager who takes pride in his personal brand of foodstuffs. He can be found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_LDF5_SZ_M1].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Under_Rashiv_E
string.body: Rashiv;An officer of the Beritra Army captured by the Tiamat remnants. He is full of vindictiveness.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Under_Gritt_E
string.body: Mesanepada;An officer of Tiamat's forces captured by Beritra's Army. He seems to know lots of secrets.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_OBJ_LDF5_Under_FOBJ_T2_Document
string.body: Classified Document;Mesanepada's secret document left on the desk.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_OBJ_LDF5_Under_FOBJ_T2_Grave
string.body: Sealed Danuar Tomb;An old tomb of the Danuar that bears a warning.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_OBJ_LDF5_Under_FOBJ_RuneSlate_1
string.body: Old Danuar Stone Slab;A stone slab that has an ancient legend drawn on it. It was found on the path leading toward the temple.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_OBJ_LDF5_Under_FOBJ_RuneSlate_2
string.body: Worn Danuar Stone Slab;A stone slab that has an ancient legend drawn on it. It was found on the path leading toward the tower.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_OBJ_LDF5_Under_FOBJ_A1_Plant
string.body: Katalluna;A peculiar plant only found in Idian Depths.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Under_Acterun_E
string.body: Actorun;A suspicious Shugo who seems to be wounded.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_OBJ_LDF5_Under_FOBJ_Idium
string.body: Subterranean Idium Lode;Idium which can be found in Idian Depths. It must be purer than the Idium above ground.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Avsada_E
string.body: Avsadar;One of Tiamat's old soldiers, who is being held in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_L] in Katalam. He seems to know something important.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Egant_E
string.body: Egant;One of Tiamat's old soldiers, who is being held at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_D] in Katalam. He seems to know something important.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Under_Seller_Cera
string.body: Shukrunrunerk;A Ceramium Medal Steward who was dispatched to Idian Depths. He may help you convert Ceramium medals.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Under_Timarchus_E
string.body: Timarchus;A Daeva in the Idian Depths.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Klaf_E
string.body: Fregarth;An Asmodian Archon with information about Beritra's forces.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Chaea_G
string.body: Kaia;Overseeing the reconstruction of Sillus Fortress, she appears only when the Elyos have control of it.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Tenisian_G
string.body: Thracius;The manager of Pradeth Fortress. He shows up when the Elyos have the fortress under control and is worried about maintenance issues.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Resco_G
string.body: Resco;She's the most awe-inspiring Daeva in the land. A paragon of her people.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_OP_L_Dike_E
string.body: Pennan;Kaisinel's Agent. She knows something about your three month nap.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Under_Rumela_E
string.body: Rumela;She scouts the Idian Depths, but takes a break to give special missions to special Daevas between 6 p.m. and 2 a.m.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Under_Undgankt_E
string.body: Undgankt;An Archon of Dusk who watches for Beritra in the Idian Depths.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Latis_E
string.body: Latis;A very put-upon Elyos who may know something important about Beritra's forces.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Sigmund_G
string.body: Siggy;A great leader at Sillus Fortress when it's under Asmodian control.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Kaimir_G
string.body: Kveldulf;He appears in Pradeth Fortress when Asmodae controls it.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Niber_G
string.body: Nieber;He knows the way into the void. Meet him in Silona Fortress when Asmodae controls it.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_OP_D_Skuldun_E
string.body: Skuldun;Marchutan's Agent. He likes to think he's every Asmodian's big brother… with all the imbalance of power that implies.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Under_Hultum_E
string.body: Hultum;Meet him in around the Idian Depths between 6 p.m. to 2 a.m.

string.body: Spherical Mystic Keystone;Opens a door somewhere in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5_Under_02_all].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_OBJ_IDF5_U2_Switch_6
string.body: Pyramidal Mystic Keystone;Opens a door somewhere in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5_Under_02_all].

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_STR_IDVritra_FOBJ_Ancient_warmachine
string.body: Rusted Prototype;A rested-out shell in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDVritra_Base_all] suspected to be a Hyperion prototype.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Amalde_E
string.body: Amalde;In [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_E3], she's asking for qualified volunteers to scout the Sauro Supply Base.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Kanix_E
string.body: Kanix;Guardian Detachment information officer that can be found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_A_01] of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance]. Holds a grudge against the Beritra Legion of the Sauro Supply Base for having killed his comrades. He came here after the passage to the Sauro Supply Base in Danaria was blocked.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Sibeldum_E
string.body: Sibeldum;In [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_E3], he needs courageous volunteers to gather information on the Sauro Supply Base.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Giriltia_E
string.body: Giriltia;Archon Battlegroup information officer that can be found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_F_01] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance]. She wants to finish the work related to the Sauro Supply Base as soon as possible. She came here after the passage to the Sauro Supply Base in Danaria was blocked.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDLDF5_Under_02_Alkatron_E
string.body: Alkatron;An expedition member found inside the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5_Under_02_all] which can be reached through the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_OBJ_IDLDF5_Under_02_Entrance_In]. He is part of the Archon Battlegroup.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDLDF5_Under_02_Dintanum_E
string.body: Dintanum;He can give you advice on the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5_Under_02_all], which you reach via [%dic:STR_DIC_N_OBJ_IDLDF5_Under_02_Entrance_In].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_OBJ_IDLDF5_Under_02_Entrance_In
string.body: Danuar Sanctuary Teleporter;A teleport device east of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_LDF5_SZ_T2]. It connects to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5_Under_02_all].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_OBJ_IDVritra_Base_Enter
string.body: Sauro Supply Base Corridor;A corridor that the Daeva left open in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance]% after the corridor in Danaria was blocked. It connects with [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDVritra_Base_all]%.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Lv11_SpecialSeller
string.body: Amage;The Elyos Field Design Distributor dispatched to Icethorn base who sells designs for crafting the crystal of a special dimension. He appears only when Icethorn base is captured.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Dv11_SpecialSeller
string.body: Haunvig;The Asmodian Field Design Distributor dispatched to Icethorn base who sells designs for crafting the crystal of a special dimension. He appears only when Icethorn base is captured.

string.body: Theana;An Elyos agent who guards Ophidan Bridge.

string.body: Rohellein;An Asmodian agent who guards Ophidan Bridge.

string.body: Dream Faeries;These Faeries can be found recruiting Daevas to save [%dic:STR_DIC_N_IDAsteria_IU_WORLD_IU_NPC01]. If you're Elyos, she is in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA31]. If you're Asmodian, she is in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_1].

string.body: Yume;Yume, the Queen of Dreams, was captured by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDASTERIA_WORLD_NMD_03] to create a gateway into the real world.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF4b_Yupitinea_E
string.body: Protector Oriata;A legendary figure who protects Siel's relics. She can be found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_OP_A4] in Tiamaranta and is known to possess an ability that can control every type of power there is.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF1a_Ribanon_E

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Javlantia

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_IDAbGateD2_FOBJ_IdDevice

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDYupitinea

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDF5_U3_FOBJ_Box_Fill
string.body: Protruded Idium;The energy source of shield generators. Transparent Idium pieces can be obtained from it.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDF5_U3_Defence_01
string.body: Eastern Power Generator of the Protective Shield;A power generator located in the eastern part of the Illuminary Obelisk. You can use the Transparent Idium Pieces obtained from the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_IDF5_U3_FOBJ_Box_Fill] to charge the generator to Phase 3.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Fortress_Kidisyan_E
string.body: Kisian;The captain of the scout band that was sent to investigate Kaldor. He seems worried.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF4_Advance_Guiltan_E
string.body: Girtan;A surviving member of the Kahrun Escorts. Girtan knows where Kahrun is.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Fortress_Hyunmurung_E
string.body: Hymrunerk;A Shugo inventor and business manager that Goldrine Ltd. has sent to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A2_Start] for its new businesses in Kaldor.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Fortress_Muderungrung_E
string.body: Derunerk;A Shugo inventor and business manager that Goldrine Ltd. has sent to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A1_Start] for its new businesses in Kaldor. This Shugo believes in the "safety first" policy.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF5_Fortress_FOBJ_Q10101a
string.body: Invasion Corridor 702;A dimensional gate in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SensoryArea_Q10100] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A5] that the Beritra Army has opened by using the Power Generators. It seems to lead to somewhere.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF5_Fortress_FOBJ_Q20101a
string.body: Invasion Corridor 701;A dimensional gate in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SensoryArea_Q20100] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A4] that the Beritra Army has opened by using Power Generators. It seems to lead to somewhere.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_IDLDF4Re_01_Q_FOBJ_Q10101b
string.body: Invasion Corridors 96-100;Dimensional gates in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF4Re_01_Q_SensoryArea_Q10101] of Linkgate Foundry that the Beritra Army opened using Power Generator. You do not know where they lead.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF4_Advance_FOBJ_Q10101a
string.body: Power Generator 31;A power generator often found in the main Beritra bases in Levinshor. It looks like a device that opens the Invasion Corridor leading to 'Zone 31' in Atreia.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF4_Advance_FOBJ_Q10101b
string.body: Power Generator 41;A power generator often found in the main Beritra bases in Levinshor. It looks like a device that opens the Invasion Corridor leading to 'Zone 41' in Atreia.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF4_Advance_FOBJ_Q20101a
string.body: Power Generator 33;A power generator often found in the main Beritra bases in Levinshor. It looks like a device that opens the Invasion Corridor leading to 'Zone 33' in Atreia.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF4_Advance_FOBJ_Q20101b
string.body: Power Generator 43;A power generator often found in the main Beritra bases in Levinshor. It looks like a device that opens the Invasion Corridor leading to 'Zone 43' in Atreia.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Fortress_Alphion_E
string.body: Alphioh;A Kaldor Detachment Captain found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A2_Start]. Alphioh is determined to fight for the Elyos to the end.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Fortress_Fendia_E
string.body: Feria;An ecologist who volunteered to come to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A2_Start]. Feria is investigating the unique ecology of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Fortress_Pintz_E
string.body: Feroz;A Kaldor Detatchment Commander sent by the military and found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A1_Start]. Feroz is determined to fight for the Asmodians to the end.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Fortress_Naiya_E
string.body: Naiya;An ecologist who volunteered to come to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A1_Start]. Naiya is investigating the unique ecology of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Fortress_Village_Guard01_L
string.body: Caetess;A vice captain in the Elyos Expedition who appears when the Elyos capture [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A1_v01] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A2].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Fortress_Village_Guard02_L
string.body: Milda;A vice captain in the Elyos Expedition who appears when the Elyos capture [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A2_v02] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A1].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Fortress_Village_Guard01_D
string.body: Vidarr;A vice captain in the Asmodian Detachment who appears when the Asmodian capture [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A1_v01] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A2].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Fortress_Village_Guard02_D
string.body: Tortius;A vice captain in the Asmodian Detachment who appears when the Asmodian capture [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A2_v02] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A1].

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF5_Fortress_FOBJ_A5_Vritramachine
string.body: Abandoned Power Generator;A power generator abandoned by the Beritra Army. It seems to be broken.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF5_Fortress_FOBJ_A4_Vritramachine
string.body: Deserted Power Generator;A power generator deserted by the Beritra Army. It seems to be broken.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF5_Fortress_FOBJ_B1_DeadTree_a
string.body: Scorched Tree;A tree found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_B1]. Unlike other trees, it seems to have been burned for a specific purpose.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF5_Fortress_FOBJ_B1_DeadTree_b
string.body: Cindery Tree;A tree found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_B1]. Unlike other trees, it seems to have been burned for a specific purpose.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF5_Fortress_FOBJ_B1_DeadTree_c
string.body: Burnt Tree;A tree found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_B1]. Unlike other trees, it seems to have been burned for a specific purpose.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Teleporter_C1_N
string.body: Poprunerk;A company teleportation guide in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_C1]. He teleports players to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A1_Start] of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Teleporter_G1_N
string.body: Tarunerk;A company teleportation guide in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_G1]. He teleports players to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A2_Start] of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF2_Tree_Bellumus_Q24120A
string.body: Belemu's Advocate;A talking Gnarl found in [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Bellumushill] in Morheim. The spokesperson assists Elder Belumu and speaks on his behalf.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF2_LycanPrisoner_Q24123A
string.body: Ishidanti;A Silver Mane Mau locked up in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_E4_2] prison in Morheim.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_DF2_Book_Q24122
string.body: Old Workbook;A report written by Pagimkin, who used to investigate missing Daeva cases. It was found next to the body of Pagimkin in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_D5_ID].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF4_Advance_L_Kahrun
string.body: Kahrun;Kahrun disappeared along with the Empyrean Lord, but he has been spotted in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_A_01] in Levinshor. He must be hiding somewhere to recover from a serious injury.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF4_Advance_D_Kahrun
string.body: Kahrun;Kahrun disappeared along with the Empyrean Lord, but he has been spotted in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_F_01] in Levinshor. He must be hiding somewhere to recover from a serious injury.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_IDLDF4Re_01_Q_Door
string.body: Containment Barrier;The energy of the Balaurs is spreading from behind this door. It may be a good idea to open it.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_NPC_event_cube
string.body: Kongarunerk;A master crafter of Lustrous Cubes. He can be found in either Sanctum or Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_E_A2_Id_Q10100_L
string.body: Detectable Zone;A zone in Kaldor with an Ide concentration that you can detect with [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_10100b].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_E_A1_Id_Q20100_D
string.body: Danger Zone;A zone in Kaldor with an Ide concentration that you can detect with [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_20100b]. It is believed that dangerous Ide residue remains in this zone.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF4_Advance_Helgund_E
string.body: Yasan;The Darkfate Legion Tribunus in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_OP_D] who commands the Asmodian Levinshor Detachment.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF4_Advance_Elger_E
string.body: Eljer;The Bonesinger Legion Tribunus in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_OP_L] who commands the Elyos Levinshor Expedition.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDLDF4_Re_01_Aitu_E
string.body: Aitu;An Archon of Dusk dispatched to the Linkgate Foundry for an investigation.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDLDF4_Re_01_Ctesibius_E
string.body: Ketesivius;A Daeva of Zephyr dispatched to the Linkgate Foundry for an investigation. Ketesivius is more like a researcher than a spy.

string.body: Cadmar;An escort who appears when a Panesterra Fortress Battle takes place.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_GAb1_Sub_Geowin_E

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDLDF5_Fortress_Re_Thales_E
string.body: Talle;An intelligence unit member in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5_Fortress_Re]. He is monitoring the movements of the Beritra Army and the Asmodians.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDLDF5_Fortress_Re_Seide_E
string.body: Salade;An intelligence unit member in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5_Fortress_Re]. He is monitoring the movements of the Beritra Army and the Elyos.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_DF1A_Lehpar_Order
string.body: Suspicious Document;A document in a house near [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_5_1].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF4_Advance_Leander
string.body: Enther;A staff officer of the Levinshor Expedition who assists Tribunus Eljer.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF4_Advance_Torka_E
string.body: Tosca;An officer in the Levinshor Expedition who oversees the passage to Gelkmaros. Tosca is very active and enjoys fighting.

string.body: Asara;An officer in the Asmodian Levinshor Detachment who oversees the passage to Inggison.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF3_Zoser_E
string.body: Dojer;A member of Captain Hinden's crew who still maintains his watch over the Anair Lighthouse.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_E_LDF5b_E_invisible_Q13400

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF5b_FOBJ_A4_Vritramachine_L_1

string.name: STR_DIC_N_2011_L_Teleport_NPC_V47

string.name: STR_DIC_N_GAb1_Quest_E
string.body: Heteron;An administrator in the Panesterra Operation inside the Panesterra fortress. Controls the operation to capture and occupy the four Panesterra territories;Belus, Aspida, Atanatos, and Disillon.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Corridor_D_MainQuest_E
string.body: Halia;An Asmodian officer in charge of Balaurea affairs. Halia stays in the Hall of Fame of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_Arena_D_Lobby] and deals with the missions that take place in Balaurea.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Corridor_D_PangeaQuest_E
string.body: Eldran;The Asmodian officer in charge of Panesterra affairs. Eldran stays in the Hall of Fame of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_Arena_D_Lobby] and deals with the missions related with Panesterra and Beritra's Grand Invasion.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Corridor_L_MainQuest_E
string.body: Adrass;The Elyos officer in charge of Balaurea affairs. Adrass stays in the Hall of Fame of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_Arena_L_Lobby] and deals with the missions that take place in Balaurea.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Corridor_L_PangeaQuest_E
string.body: Perna;An Elyos officer in charge of Balaurea affairs. Perna stays in the Hall of Fame of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_Arena_L_Lobby] and deals with the missions related with Panesterra and Beritra's Grand Invasion.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Damiring_E
string.body: Dirinerk;A secret inspector dispatched by Goldrine Ltd. to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_D] in Katalam to investigate the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDShulackShip_02].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDShulack_Rose_Ent_1FD_E

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDShulack_Rose_Ent_2FD_E

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Sokorung_E
string.body: Sorunerk;An investigator for the Cuperine Development Union sent to supply [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_C2_1] with goods.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Posorung_E

string.body: Kelopas;A teleporter in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_L]. Kelopas teleports players to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_OP_L] in Levinshor.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_ZoneTeleporter_D
string.body: Kiundis;A teleporter in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_D]. Kiundis teleports players to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_OP_D] in Levinshor.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF4_Advance_FOBJ_Portal_Q10101a
string.body: Aetherbrak Invasion Corridor;A dimensional gate in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_A_01] in Levinshor that the Beritra Army has opened by using the Invasion Power Generator. It seems to lead to somewhere.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF4_Advance_FOBJ_Portal_Q20101a
string.body: Stonepike Invasion Corridor;A dimensional gate in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_F_01] in Levinshor that the Beritra Army has opened by using a Power Generator. You are not sure where it leads.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_IDLDF4Re_01_Q_FOBJ_Portal_Q10101a
string.body: Secret Zone Invasion Corridor;A dimensional gate in the Secret Zone of the Linkgate Foundry that the Beritra Army has opened by using a Power Generator. It seems to lead to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDLDF4_Re_01_Ditono_E
string.body: Spy Ditono;A member of the Kahrun Escorts who infiltrated the Linkgate Foundry disguised as Drakan. On Kahrun's command, he is working to uncover the Beritra Army's plan.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF4_Advance_Florrick_E
string.body: Floric;An ancient civilization researcher at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_OP_L] in Levinshor. Floric is researching the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_IDLDF5_Under_03].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF4_Advance_Gatener_E
string.body: Gartner;An ancient civilization researcher at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_OP_D] in Levinshor. Gartner is researching the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_IDLDF5_Under_03].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Fortress_7011_Therenoa_L_E
string.body: Terenoa;A fortress administrator who appears when the Elyos capture [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_7011]. The administrator deals with various fortress tasks.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Fortress_7011_Phillipa_D_E
string.body: Falfyr;A fortress administrator who appears when the Asmodians capture [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_7011]. The administrator deals with various fortress tasks.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Fortress_7011_Gantis_L_E
string.body: Gantis;A fortress administrator who appears when the Elyos capture [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_7011]. The administrator deals with various fortress tasks.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Fortress_7011_Banuan_D_E
string.body: Banuan;A fortress administrator who appears when the Asmodians capture [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_7011]. The administrator deals with various fortress tasks.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Fortress_7011_Benia_L_L_E
string.body: Venia;The fortress chief of staff who appears when the Elyos capture [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_7011]. The chief of staff gives special missions to the brigade general of the legion that currently occupies the fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Fortress_7011_Salonte_D_L_E
string.body: Salonte;The fortress chief of staff who appears when the Asmodian capture [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_7011]. The chief of staff gives special missions to the brigade general of the legion that currently occupies the fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Fortress_Reton_E
string.body: Leton;A detachment support officer who appears in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A2_Start] when the Elyos fail to capture [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_7011]. The officer supports the soldiers dispatched to Kaldor.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Fortress_Yivatu_E
string.body: Ibatu;A detachment support officer who appears in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A2_Start] when the Asmodian fail to capture [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_7011]. The officer supports the soldiers dispatched to Kaldor.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Fortress_Named_Spawn_FOBJ
string.body: Anoha's Sword;A huge Danuar relic that can be found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_D1]. Although it still contains terrifying power and energy, its chipped and tarnished blade shows its age.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Fortress_Anoha_Dead_E
string.body: Commander Anoha;The becalmed soul of a great Danuar hero who appears after you defeat [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Fortress_Boss_Anoha_65_Al].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF3_Anaxa_E
string.body: Anaxa;A Reaper Squad member watching the dimensional gate that leads to the Draupnir Cave near [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_E3] .

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF1A_Brodir_E
string.body: Brodir;An Archon hiding at the entrance to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_14].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF1A_Anmuring_E
string.body: Anmurnerk;A Shugo of the Black Cloud Traders observing Skurv at the entrance of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_14].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF3_Alberihi_E
string.body: Alberich;A Drakan Punisher watching the entrance of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_H].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF2_Flamyar_E
string.body: Flamyar;A Fire Spirit waiting outside the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_toDF2_DFlame] in Morheim. It is a loyal servant of Agnita.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF4_Advance_Sopeia_E
string.body: Sopheia;An adjutant of the Protectors who assists the Agent in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_V01] when winning in an Agent battle.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF4_Advance_Syrot_E
string.body: Sirot;An adjutant of the Protectors who assists the Agent in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_V01] when winning in an Agent battle.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF1a_Schwanz_E
string.body: Shezen;An Archon watchman investigating the Haramel Secret Passage in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_25]. He is unhappy that he was dispatched alone to such a remote place.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF3_Kurochin_E
string.body: Kurochinerk;A Black Cloud Traders envoy dispatched to New Heiron Gate. His tremendous responsibility keeps him constantly on edge.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF3_Brot_E
string.body: Broha;A Shadow Executor who used to guard the entrance to the Shadow Court. He seems to have come to Beluslan Fortress to find someone.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF3_Soraringring_E
string.body: Sorinerk;A Shugo of the Tigraki Workshop dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_004] in Heiron. She is anxious to win fame and acclaim by obtaining new information.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF3_Chocorung_E
string.body: Chocorunerk;A Shugo from the Tigraki Workshop dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_G2_3] in Beluslan.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF2a_Oflisma_E
string.body: Ohelah;A weapon expert dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2B_SZ_B4_2] in Theobomos. He knows everything about weapons.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF4_Advance_Out_AB
string.body: Abyss Portal;A dimensional gate through which you can travel from Levinshor to the Abyss. They are located west of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_D_01] and south of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_G_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF4_Advance_FOBJ_Q13706
string.body: Lost Bag;A bag containing a report written by an advance party that infiltrated Kaldor.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF4_Advance_FOBJ_Q23706
string.body: Missing Bag;A bag containing a report written by an advance party that infiltrated Kaldor.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF4_Advance_Out_DF4
string.body: Gelkmaros Portal;A way to infiltrate Gelkmaros from Levinshor.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF4_Advance_Renitis_E
string.body: Reni;An information officer at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_OP_L] in Levinshor.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF4_Advance_Ekthe_E
string.body: Ecte;An information officer at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_OP_D] in Levinshor.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Fortress_Fitreung_E
string.body: Pitrunerk;A union member in Kaldor. He installed the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_IDLDF5_Under_Rune_L_Entrance_In] at the request of Daevas.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_IDF5_RP_L_Entrance_In
string.body: Infinity Shard Corridor;A corridor located south of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_V01] in Levinshor.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_IDLDF5_Under_Rune_L_Entrance_In
string.body: Danuar Reliquary Corridor;A corridor located under the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A3] bridge in Kaldor.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_GACHA
string.body: Lukrunerk;A Shugo looking for Daevas carrying [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_80615a]s in Sanctum and Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_event_randrian
string.body: Landrian;She and her husband are both hard workers. They're giving their best for their family to have a good life.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_event_madareke
string.body: Madareke;She and her husband are both hard workers. They're giving their best for their family to have a good life.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_LDF5b_Hoanon_E
string.body: Canas;An informant from the Golden Feather Legion. He is found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_C2_1] and provides information on Ophidan Bridge, the Danuar Sanctuary, and Sauro Supply Base.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_LDF5b_Gronte_E
string.body: Gronte;An informant from the Redfang Squad. He is found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_B1_1] and provides information on Ophidan Bridge, the Danuar Sanctuary, and Sauro Supply Base.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_Arena_L_clobby_Rhea_E
string.body: Lena;A support instructor in the Wisplight Abbey. She helps with the dispatching of Daevas.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_Arena_D_clobby_Melrania_E
string.body: Melanka;A support instructor in the Fatebound Abbey. She helps with the dispatching of Daevas.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_Arena_L_clobby_01_Entrance_In
string.body: Atreia Defense Portal;A portal that leads to the entrances of Draupnir Cave, Theobomos Lab, Adma Stronghold, and Dark Poeta.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_Arena_L_clobby_02_Entrance_In
string.body: Balaurea Advance Portal;A portal that leads to the entrances of Taloc's Hollow, Udas Temple, and Beshmundir Temple.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_Arena_clobby_03_Entrance_In
string.body: Balaurea Advance Corridor;A portal that leads to the entrances of Aturam Sky Fortress, Rentus Base, Tiamat Stronghold, and Dragon Lord's Refuge.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_Arena_clobby_04_Entrance_In
string.body: Balaurea Frontier Portal;A portal that leads to the entrances of Danuar Sanctuary, Ophidan Bridge, Linkgate Foundry, Illuminary Obelisk, and Sauro Supply Base.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_Arena_D_clobby_01_Entrance_In
string.body: Atreia Defense Portal;A portal that leads to the entrances of Draupnir Cave, Theobomos Lab, Adma Stronghold, and Dark Poeta.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_Arena_D_clobby_02_Entrance_In
string.body: Balaurea Advance Portal;A portal that leads to the entrances of Taloc's Hollow, Udas Temple, and Beshmundir Temple.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_Shugo_LF2a_25
string.body: Banarinrinerk;A Shugo in the Latheron Coast Base Camp, and a member of the Meniherk Excavation Union. He's very interested in the ruins of Theobomos.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_Arena_L_clobby_Entrance_In
string.body: Wisplight Abbey Teleport Statue;A teleport statue in Sanctum used to reach the Wisplight Abbey. It requires an Abbey Return Stone for activation.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_Arena_D_clobby_Entrance_In
string.body: Fatebound Abbey Teleport Statue;A teleport statue in Pandaemonium used to reach the Fatebound Abbey. It requires an Abbey Return Stone for activation.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF5_Nimrod_E
string.body: Nimrod;A Daeva of the Expedition in charge of the mission to infiltrate Aturam Sky Fortress and guards the dimensional gate that leads to it.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF5_Haldor_E
string.body: Haldor;Commander of the Expedition in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_OP_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF5_Nineveh_E
string.body: Nineveh;A Daeva of the Expedition in charge of the mission to infiltrate Aturam Sky Fortress and guards the dimensional gate that leads to it.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LF4_FOBJ_Q10031A
string.body: Obelisk Support;A support for the Obelisk in the Obelisk Valley. No Obelisk has been installed on it yet.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LF4_FOBJ_Q10035A
string.body: Canyon Entry Controller;An entry control device installed by the Balaur at the Inggison Silentera Entrance.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LF4_QuestArea_Q10035
string.body: Inggison Silentera Entrance;An entrance that leads to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF4_Underpass_door].

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LF4_SensoryArea_Q10035A
string.body: Angrief Gate;An Elyos gate that leads from Inggison Outpost to the Angrief Ruins.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_GAb1_Sub_Fuen_E
string.body: Pasha;An informant dispatched to Transidium Annex. He appears when Ahserion is defeated.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_IDSweep_IN_NPC03
string.body: Magarunerk;A Keeper of the Shugo Emperor's Vault and friend to Indinerk Jonakak.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_IDSweep_IN_NPC01
string.body: Indinerk Jonakak's Secret Passage;A secret passage that leads to the Shugo Emperor's Vault. The vault has been taken over and is being ransacked by Shulacks.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_IDSweep_IN_NPC02
string.body: Indinerk Jonakak;A flustered-looking Shugo who seeks help.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_IDSweep_IN_NPC04
string.body: Guardrunerk;A keeper of the Shugo Emperor's Vault who fled from the intruding Shulacks.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF5_CogelHogan_E
string.body: Cogelhogan;An information officer who guides those who have joined the Expedition for the first time.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF5_Bonat_E
string.body: Bonat;A Centurion of the Expedition who assists Commander Haldor on the mission.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF5_Nixie_E
string.body: Nixie;An ancient civilization scholar who joined the Expedition. She is soft-spoken and often stops to think during conversation. Despite her manner of speech, she is more enthusiastic and active than anyone, driven by her passion for research.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_DF5_FOBJ_Q20501a
string.body: Crumbled Ruins;A ruin site near the place where Nixie discovered the ancient ruin pieces.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_DF5_FOBJ_Q20501b
string.body: Destroyed Balaur Ruins;A ruin site containing ruins with similar patterns to the ancient ruin pieces Nixie found. It is severely damaged and obtaining credible information will be difficult.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_DF5_FOBJ_Q20501c
string.body: Intact Balaur Ruins;A ruin site where there is a good chance to identify the ancient ruin pieces that Nixie found. It is barely damaged and the chance of obtaining decent information is good.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF5_TiamatArmy_Corpse_Q20501a
string.body: Putrid Balaur Corpse;A foul smelling Drakan corpse found next to the intact ruins.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF5_Walqule_E
string.body: Walque;An Expedition sentry post chief who wants to support the scholars who join the Expedition.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF5_Kronag_E
string.body: Kronag;A Reian civilization scholar. He is grateful to the Asmodians who helped his people and, unexpectedly, trusts the biologist [%dic:STR_DIC_N_DF5_Kanovi_E].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF5_Kanovi_E
string.body: Kanovi;An Asmodian biologist. When he concentrates on something, such as his research, he becomes oblivious to everything else. It's a wonder how he managed to win the trust of [%dic:STR_DIC_N_DF5_Kronag_E].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF5_Muratun_E
string.body: Muratun;A Tejhi Elder who came to seek help from the Asmodians, but they refused to talk with him. He now waits at a hideout and is being attacked by hostile Tejhi.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF5_Batuga_E
string.body: Batuga;A Tejhi emissary who came with Muratun to seek help from the Asmodians, but they refused to talk. He now waits somewhere near the Asmodian base.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF5_Engrid_E
string.body: Engrid;An ancient civilization scholar who is decidedly competent.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF5_Egzen_E
string.body: Egzen;An Enshar Watcher Captain. She strives to become a great Archon.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF5_Xeikun_E
string.body: Xeikun;An Expedition sentry post chief who is very curious about the happenings in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF5].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF5_Jalturan_E
string.body: Jalturan;A Tejhi Elder who assisted the Asmodians and visited one of their villages to seek help, at the behest of Muratun. However, he wasn't welcomed and has been lingering near the village.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF5_Cnut_E
string.body: Cenute;An Expedition Captain who is suspicious by nature, but tends to have strong faith once his questions are answered.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF5_Maleite_E
string.body: Malite;An Expedition scout who is keeping an eye on the movements of Beritra's forces.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF5_TiamatSealGuard_Q20505a
string.body: Field Wardens Bodyguard Corpse;A bodyguard of the Field Wardens who was attacked by Beritra forces.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF5_TiamatSeal_Q20505a
string.body: Field Warden Corpse;A member of the Field Wardens who seems to have been carrying something when attacked by Beritra forces.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF5_Sefrimnir_E
string.body: Sefrim;An Expedition centurion found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_OP_03].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF5_Julia_E
string.body: Julia;A Search Captain who, despite her appearance and gentle speech, is actually a veteran Archon on a mission to infiltrate the Eracus Desert in Eltnen.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF5_Vard_E
string.body: Vard;A Support Corps Governor. Although he lost many Daevas during Beritra's Invasion, Marchutan reappointed him as Governor for his achievements in Katalam.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF5_Theodoricus_E
string.body: Theodoricus;A man known as a prophet. He is humble in introducing himself, but he has the superb ability to read the flow of aether and can predict what is to come.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF5_Daruku_E
string.body: Daruku;A Tejhi who came to help the Asmodians. He is annoyed by the Shugos' constant request to negotiate.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF5_Bakun_E
string.body: Bakorn;A Tejhi tracer trained to track the energy trickling out from the Cold Crystal.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF5_Gilgamesh_E
string.body: Gilgamesh;He was displeased with Tiamat's rise to Dragon Lord and organized a resistance force, but he was defeated, cursed, and became an undead Drakan in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF5].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF5_Jadun_E
string.body: Jadun;A searcher who has gone missing while on a mission.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF5_Nubes_E
string.body: Nubes;An Aequis Expedition information officer dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_OP_01] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF5_Atmos_E
string.body: Atmis;An Aequis Expedition Governor in charge of investigating [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5] and establishing the Expedition in the region. Found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_OP_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF5_Mosphera_E
string.body: Mosphera;An Aequis Expedition member investigating [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_B_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LF5_FOBJ_Broken_Wedgestone_Q10501a
string.body: Collapsed Ruins;A ruin site marked on the map that Mosphera gave you. Found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_B_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LF5_FOBJ_Tiamat_SealWatcher_Q10501a
string.body: Ancient Balaur Corpse;A corpse marked on the map that Mosphera gave you. Found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_B_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF5_Nixkaion_E
string.body: Nixkon;An archaeologist investigating the history of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5]. Found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_Village_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF5_Nixkaion_Disguise_E
string.body: Nixkon in Hiding;An archaeologist dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5]. He infiltrated the Black Fin tribe to investigate their ecology and history.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LF5_FOBJ_Soil_Creep_Q10502a
string.body: Loose Soil;Lumps of soil found all over [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_C_01]. Can be used as research materials on tectonic changes.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LF5_FOBJ_Ancient_Fossil_Q10502a
string.body: Ancient Creature Fossil;The fossil of an ancient creature found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_C_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF5_Eukraton_E
string.body: Eukraton;A Second Aequis Expedition Captain in charge of maintaining order in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5] and providing support to additional expeditions. Found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_OP_02].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF5_Euvia_E
string.body: Euvia;A mysterious flower expert investigating [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_D_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF5_SensoryArea_Q10503
string.body: Aetheric Field Stone of Earth;Tiamat's sealing stone. It is guarded by Tiamat's Aetheric Field Defenders. Found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_D_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF5_Astrape_E
string.body: Atrape;An Aequis Expedition member in charge of tracking Beritra forces in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5]. Found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_Village_02].

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LF5_FOBJ_Broken_Slate_Q10504a
string.body: Cracked Oath Slate;An old, cracked slate with writing on it that is difficult to identify. Found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_E_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF5_Averse_E
string.body: Averse;An Aequis Expedition member in charge of espionage in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5]. Found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_Village_03].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF5_Erinos_E
string.body: Erinos;An undercover investigator who infiltrated Beritra's guard post to gather information. Found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_F_01].

string.body: Beritra Invasion Corridor;An invasion corridor under manufacture by the Beritra Army. There is intel that it can send people directly to the location where Tiamat's secret treasure is hidden.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_koschei
string.body: Immortal King Koshei; Arrived from The Netherworld with a band of criminals. He has recently begun restoring his power with the apparent intention to take over Atreia. He is a god of immortality, but it is said that [%dic:STR_DIC_key_world_event_Koschei_Niddle] can neutralize his power.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_Matroskin
string.body: Cat Matroskin; A cat that was accidently brought along when [%dic:STR_DIC_N_event_koschei] came from The Netherworld to Atreia. Just wants to go home.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_event_Rusbox
string.body: Wooden Treasure Box; A box in which [%dic:STR_DIC_key_world_event_Koschei_Niddle] is hidden. Tucked away to avoid discovery.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_event_koscheiego
string.body: Immortal King Koshei's Clone;Created by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_event_koschei] when gathering his energy in an attempt to conquer Atreia. Can be neutralized through [%dic:STR_DIC_key_world_event_Koschei_Niddle].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF5_Dike_E
string.body: Rike;One of Kaisinel's Agents in charge of protecting Cygnea on behalf of Lord Kaisinel.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF5_Efaion_E
string.body: Epaion;A Daeva belonging to Kaisinel's Wings. He is in charge of protecting Cygnea with Rike and supplying Daevanion equipment.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF5_Agon_E
string.body: Argon;A Daeva belonging to Kaisinel's Wings. He is in charge of protecting Cygnea with Rike and supplying Daevanion equipment.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF5_Machina_E
string.body: Machina;A Daeva belonging to Kaisinel's Wings. Helps Argon in Cygnea.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF5_Nephoria_E
string.body: Nephoria;A Daeva belonging to Kaisinel's Wings. Is completing a mission in Cygnea. Nephoria may be found near [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LF5_CtoP1_Telepot_L].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF5_Frestelle_E
string.body: Prestelle;A Daeva belonging to Kaisinel's Wings. Is completing a mission in Cygnea. May be found taking the Windstream between [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_E_01] and [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_P2_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF5_Skuldun_E
string.body: Skuldun;A Senior Agent of Marchutan. She's been in charge of protecting Balaurea ever since Lord Marchutan went missing.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF5_Fachmann_E
string.body: Fachmann;A Daeva belonging to Marchutan's Iron Mace. Helps protect Enshar with Skuldun and supply Daevanion equipment.

string.body: Pipirinerk;The Shugo delegate of the Black Cloud Traders in Heiron. He is such a good looking Shugo and everyone loves him.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF3_Konaching_E
string.body: Konachinerk;The delegate of the Black Cloud Traders in Heiron. His nerves are on edge because of his heavy responsibilities.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF3_Nakaching_E

string.body: Halfrinerk;The Shugo delegate of the Black Cloud Traders in Beluslan. He is the youngest in the delegation and takes care of miscellaneous work.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF3_Muguring_E
string.body: Mugurinerk;The Shugo delegate of the Black Cloud Traders in Beluslan. He is an opportunist and often leaves his group to join one that can be more beneficial to him.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF3_Hasiroong_E

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Pernos_60
string.body: Pernos;Since [%username] lost their family on the Day of the Tempest, Pernos raised them together with Roye. Pernos now spends most of his time writing history books at his small home in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA02].

string.body: Daminu;Chieftain of the Elim Tribe of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA04] in Poeta. He is the ruler of the forest. Playing Daminu's Flute teleports you to Daminu.
