string.body: Centurion Vergelan;A Facebound Legion Centurion who leads the Asmodians dispatched to the Sillentera Corridor. A warm-hearted soul, despite being reserved.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDUnderpass_Solo_Vergelan_02
string.body: Tired Vergelan;A Facebound Legion Centurion who leads the Asmodians dispatched to the Sillentera Corridor. Utterly exhausted after fierce battles with the Elyos Centurion, Asinelli.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDUnderpass_Solo_Asinelli
string.body: Centurion Asinelli;A Centurion from the Wisplight Legion who leads the Elyos dispatched to the Sillentera Corridor. A remarkably level-headed person who will carry out their mission at any and all costs.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDUnderpass_Solo_Vergelan_Hunt
string.body: Vergelan of the Fatebound Legion;A Centurion from the Fatebound Legion who leads the Asmodians dispatched to the Sillentera Corridor.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDUnderpass_Solo_Asinelli_Hunt
string.body: Asinelli of the Wisplight Legion;A Centurion from the Wisplight Legion who leads the Elyos dispatched to the Sillentera Corridor.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_DF5_FOBJ_Q72200
string.body: Lost Backpack;Millar's lost backpack containing spare parts for an Artificial Aether Generator.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF5_Milak_E
string.body: Millar;An Artificial Aether Generator Supervisor who has been dispatched to Enshar.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF7_Seiran_E
string.body: Seiran;A Special Training Instructor in Lakrum from Sanctum. Enlists Daevas to train in an Arena or Dredgion.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF7_Mwatti_E
string.body: Mwati;A Special Training Instructor in Lakrum from Pandaemonium. Enlists Daevas to train in an Arena or Dredgion.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Event_2018_Newyear_L_01
string.body: Starving Magpie; Orphaned magpie babies found in Sanctum who can't forage for food.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Event_2018_Newyear_D_01
string.body: Hungry Magpie; Orphaned magpie babies found in Pandaemonium that can't forage for food.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF7_Shugo_Cuberin_E
string.body: Qubrinerk;A Shugo who researches Cubics made from cubes infused with refined Aether that can increase the wielder's strength. When the Shulacks took over her lab, she escaped to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_G] in Lakrum.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDCubic_Shugo_Cuberin_Start_E
string.body: Qubrinerk Preparing for Combat;A Shugo who researches Cubics made from cubes infused with refined Aether that can increase a wielder's strength. She is preparing to take back her Cubic Lab from the Shulacks.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDCubic_Shugo_Cuberin_End_E
string.body: Happy Qubrinerk;A Shugo who researches Cubics made from cubes infused with refined Aether that can increase a wielder's strength. Qubrinerk appears when Madrukin and her group are defeated and the Cubic Lab is taken back.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDCubic_Entrance
string.body: Cubic Lab Gatekeeper;A Gatekeeper Shugo for [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDCubic]. She is very scared and will sometimes appear near the Lakrum base only when the Elyos or the Asmodians have taken over the base and she feels that it is safe.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_WORLD_EDUEVENT_SWEETROONG
string.body: Sweetrunerk;A handsome and sweet Shugo who is in a loving relationship with Loverunerk.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_WORLD_EDUEVENT_LOVEROONG
string.body: Loverunerk;A cute and beautiful Shugo who is in a loving relationship with Sweetrunerk.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_WORLD_EDUEVENT_LOSTLOVEROONG
string.body: Lost Loverunerk;The beloved of Sweetrunerk. She followed a pretty butterfly and lost her way.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDF7_Ere_Hans_E
string.body: Hans;A member of the Advance Unit of the Lifekeeper Legion. Whatever made Hans flee has also robbed him of his mind.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDF7_Ere_Putio_E
string.body: Putio;A member of the Advance Unit of the Veilbreaker Legion. Whatever made Putio flee has also robbed him of his mind.

string.name: STR_DIC_SEN_IDF7_Ere_SensoryArea_Q62810b
string.body: Aion's Holy Artifact Enshrinement Location;A sacred relic known to contain the Power of Genesis. It is enshrined deep inside [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDF7_Ere].

string.name: STR_DIC_SEN_IDF7_Ere_SensoryArea_Q62811a
string.body: Ereshkigal is Attempting to Take Control of the Holy Artifact;Ereshkigal has cast a spell on Aion's Holy Artifact and offered Daevas as sacrifices in order to change the Power of Genesis in the Holy Artifact to the Power of Destruction.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF7_Pandora_Main_L_E

string.name: STR_DIC_SEN_LF3_ItemUseArea_Q39915
string.body: Bollvig's Territory;Refers to the area ranging from [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_F3] to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_015] and [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_F5]. Use [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_39915a] to lift the curse cast on these lands.

string.name: STR_DIC_SEN_LF4_ItemUseArea_Q39932
string.body: Hanarkand;The location where [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_39932a] must be installed. The power of Aether can drive out the Balaur.

string.name: STR_DIC_SEN_LF4_ItemUseArea_Q39946
string.body: Shulack Cliff Village;You can weaken Shulacks in this village by installing [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_39946a].

string.name: STR_DIC_SEN_DF3_ItemUseArea_Q49915
string.body: Alukina's Territory;Refers to the area ranging from [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_E5] to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_E3] and [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_E2]. It is said that [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_49915a] uncovers the hidden Golden Trumpet Temple.

string.name: STR_DIC_SEN_DF4_ItemUseArea_Q49932

string.body: Argon;A Guardian Contribution Officer. Dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_LOP1], this Daeva will be away on other business from 12 AM to 12 PM on Mondays.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF7_Meridune_E
string.body: Meridune;An Archon Contribution Officer. Dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_DOP1], this Daeva will be away on other business from 12 AM to 12 PM on Mondays.

string.body: Illusia;Yustiel's messenger. Dispatched to Illumiel Brawl by Lady Yustiel to investigate the flow of Aether.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDF7_Ere_Prison_Nepilim_02
string.body: Cursed Veilenthrone Statue;The protector of Western Veilenthrone, [%dic:STR_DIC_N_IDF7_Ere_Prison_Nepilim_03_Before] was petrified into a statue by Ereshkigal. You can summon [%dic:STR_DIC_N_IDF7_Ere_Prison_Nepilim_03] by using [%dic:STR_DIC_I_idf7_ere_stone_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDF7_Ere_Prison_Nepilim_01
string.body: Zarba;The eastern protector of the Lakrum Underground Temple [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDF7_Ere]. After losing the east oracle chamber to the Balaur, Zarba was confined in the Cold Prison.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDF7_Ere_Prison_Nepilim_03_Before
string.body: Arbo;The western protector of the Lakrum Underground Temple [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDF7_Ere]. Ereshkigal's curse has turned Arbo into stone.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDF7_Ere_Prison_Nepilim_03

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_PandoraRaid_BodyGuard_Boss_Li
string.body: Incomplete Lekran;A weapon developed by the Pandora Development Agency based on the Ancient Guardian Weapon Tetranon. It is highly unstable.

string.body: Unstable Lekran;A weapon developed by the Pandora Development Agency based on the Ancient Archon Weapon Tetranon. It is highly unstable.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF7_Shugo_Cuberin_L_E
string.body: Master Craftsman Qubrinerk;A Shugo who crafts Cubics by infusing them with refined Aether to increase the wielder's strength. Can be found at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_LOP1] in Lakrum.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF7_Shugo_Cuberin_D_E
string.body: Grandmaster Qubrinerk;A Shugo who crafts Cubics by infusing them with refined Aether to increase the wielder's strength. Can be found at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_DOP1] in Lakrum.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF8_Obes_E
string.body: Obess;A centurion for the Lifekeepers. Currently carrying out a mission to support Daevas who want to enter [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF8_Lorona_E
string.body: Lorona;An Information Officer who is in charge of promoting [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Stella_Industry] and the registration of newly dispatched Daevas. Currently helping Elyos Daevas enter [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF8_B1_Manutt_E
string.body: Manute;The captain of the troop running the clean-up operation in [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Rega]. Can be found at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_B1].

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF8_FOBJ_Stella_Box_Q60601a
string.body: Stellin Support Box;A box that contains [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_60601a]. Can be found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_LOP].

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_IDF8_Mission01_FOBJ_Entrance_L
string.body: Suspicious Cave Entrance;A cave entrance that is guarded by [%dic:STR_DIC_E_B_D3_Lega_L_All]. It seems to be connected to something important. Can be found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_B3].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDF8_Mission01_Inanna_E
string.body: Fighting Girl;An unknown girl who is fighting the Regatus Drakan at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDF8_Mssion01].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF8_Donas_E
string.body: Donas;An indecisive and lazy Guardian Captain who was dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8] by the Elyos military. Can be found between 9 AM and 6 PM at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP1]. During all other times, he is not at his post.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF8_Shulack_Stellaky_E
string.body: Steraki;A Shulack employee of Stellin Industries. Can be found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP1].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF8_G1_Manutt_E
string.body: Strange Manute;The former squad leader who was discovered at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_G2]. There are rumors that he deserted after the mop-up operation. He looks different than before.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_IDF8_Mission02_FOBJ_Entrance_L
string.body: Door with Drakan Handprints;A door discovered at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_G1]. Bloody Drakan hand prints are starkly visible on one side. There are rumors that [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF8_Mission_Drakan_Boss_03_Al] was seen nearby.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDF8_Mission02_Inanna02_E
string.body: Mindless Inanna;The shock from the explosion of [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Tiamat_Crown] has separated Inanna's mind from her body. She doesn't look right. Can be found at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDF8_Mssion02].

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_IDF8_Mission02_FOBJ_Inanna_Inside_In
string.body: Mind Fissure;A fissure that was created when Inanna's mind was separated from her body. It looks like a gap that leads to Inanna's mind.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDF8_Mission02_Shulack_Tellakiki_E
string.body: Terakiki;Auditor for Stellin Industries. Dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDF8_Mssion02] to retrieve Tiamat's crown (a Balaur Lord relic) and to keep an eye on Inanna.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDF8_Mission02_Inanna01_E
string.body: Tracker Inanna;The same [%dic:STR_DIC_N_IDF8_Mission01_Inanna_E] that you met in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDF8_Mssion01]. She is chasing after [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF8_Mission_Drakan_Boss_03_Al] at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDF8_Mssion02] to help her friend in Stellin Industries.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF8_OP_Inanna_E
string.body: Recovering Inanna;You have reunited with Inanna after she was defeated at the Vishaka hideout. She remembers that you rescued her from her own mind and is now quite fond of you. Currently visiting [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP1_Rest].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF8_Moogle_Bumbum_Soon_E
string.body: BuBu Soon;Timid and scared. After losing his home during The Scarring, he had been wandering aimlessly until he entered the protection of Stellin Industries. He is currently staying at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP1_Rest].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF8_FOBJ_OfficerPaper_Q60603a
string.body: Secretary General's Documents;These documents were drafted by the Secretary General of Stellin Industries and contain detailed records on the members who entered [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP1_Rest]. Can be found at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP1_Rest] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP1].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF8_F_Inanna_L_E
string.body: Hiding Inanna;Inanna was looking for traces of BuBu Soon's friend Muratan and came to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_F_L_Mission]. The shocking sight of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_F_L_Mission] has made it difficult for her to act.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF8_FOBJ_F_Report_Q60603a
string.body: Laboratory 1 Research Log;A document that contains the research from Laboratory 1 of the Temporary ST Laboratory, where ST-IX side effects were researched. It contains details on the objectives, subjects, and results of the tests. Can be found at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_F_L_Mission].

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF8_FOBJ_F_Report_Q60603b
string.body: Laboratory 2 Research Log;A document that contains the research from Laboratory 2 of the Temporary ST Laboratory, where ST-IX side effects were researched. It contains details on the objectives, subjects, and results of the tests. Can be found at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_F_L_Mission].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF8_Lycan_Muratan_L_E
string.body: Suffering Muratan;The missing friend of BuBu Soon. It seems he was forcefully taken from [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP1_Rest] to the Temporary NK Laboratory and used for Stellin Industries experiments. Can be found at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_F_L_Mission].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF8_F_Khyle_E
string.body: Investigator Kyle;A member of the Guardians and younger brother to Manute. After Manute disappeared, he became suspicious of [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Stella_Industry] and [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Naki6] and came to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_F_L_Mission] to investigate.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF8_OP_Khyle_E
string.body: Assistant Kyle;He was once a member of the Guardians but when his brother Manute disappeared, he became suspicious of [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Stella_Industry] and [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Naki6]. Currently seeking the truth through persistent investigation. Can be found at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP1].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF8_Shulack_Stellkin_E
string.body: Stulkin;A Shulack employee who was dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Naki6] by order of Stellin Industries. He is in charge of solving the problems between the aboriginal tribe [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Snuwa] that stole [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_E_L_Mission] and Stellin Industries.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF8_FOBJ_E_Report_Q60604a
string.body: Dropped Report;A report that was being drafted by the Shulack Stulkin who was given an important post by Stellin Industries. It is probably a document he wanted to send to the Stella headquarters. Stulkin was distracted and dropped it at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_E_L_Mission].

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_IDF8_Mission03_FOBJ_Entrance_L
string.body: Suspicious Drain;The drain of a suspicious path the Stellin Industries employees secretly use. It is probably used to move [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Lord_Legacy]. Can be found at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_D].

string.body: Box with the Balaur Lord's Legacy;A box in which Stellin Industries stores the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Lord_Legacy] that they retrieved in Demaha. Can be found near [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_IDF8_Mission03_FOBJ_Entrance_L].

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF8_FOBJ_Stella_Box02

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_IDF8_Mission03_FOBJ_Stella_Box01
string.body: ST-IX Primary Material Chest;It contains the same [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Lord_Legacy] as the Balaur Lord's Legacy Chest that can be found at the entrance to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDF8_Mission03]. The box has a label that reads 'ST-IX Primary Material Chest', so it probably contains the materials to make [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Naki6]. Can be found at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDF8_Mission03_Step4].

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_IDF8_Mission03_FOBJ_Stella_Box02
string.body: ST-IX Extraction Tube;A tube that transfers the Balaur Lord's power after it has been extracted from the primary material, Balaur Lord's Legacy. It separates the pure power which is the core of ST-IX and the remaining residue. Can be found at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDF8_Mission03_Step7].

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_IDF8_Mission03_FOBJ_Stella_Box03
string.body: Balaur Test Tube;A test tube that contains a Balaur test subject. You cannot tell what tests were being done to it. Can be found at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDF8_Mission03_Step9].

string.body: Mysterious Shugo Prisoner;A mysterious slave named Benirunerk that you meet while escaping. He is trapped in the technology lab of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDF8_Mission04] and is a skilled engineer.

string.body: Engineer Benirunerk;Another escaped prisoner that Inanna rescued. It seems he already had escape plans of his own.
